    public function __construct($ip_radius_server = '127.0.0.1', $shared_secret = '', $radius_suffix = '', $udp_timeout = 5, $authentication_port = 1812, $accounting_port = 1813) {
        $this->_ip_radius_server = $ip_radius_server;
        $this->_shared_secret = $shared_secret;
        $this->_radius_suffix = $radius_suffix;
        $this->_udp_timeout = $udp_timeout;
        $this->_authentication_port = $authentication_port;
        $this->_accounting_port = $accounting_port;
        $this->_attributes_to_send = [];
        $this->_attributes_received = [];
        $this->_debug_mode = false;
        $this->debug_text = [];
        $this->_last_error_code = 0;
        $this->_last_error_message = '';
    }

    public function AccessRequest($username = '', $password = '', $udp_timeout = 0, $state = NULL) {
        $this->SetUsername($username);
        $this->SetPassword($password);
        if ($udp_timeout > 0) {
            $this->SetUdpTimeout($udp_timeout);
        }
        $this->GenerateRequestAuthenticator();
        $this->SetPacketCodeToSend(1); // Access-Request
        $this->SetAttribute(1, $this->_username); // User-Name
        $this->SetAttribute(2, $this->_password); // User-Password
        if ($state !== NULL) {
            $this->SetAttribute(24, $state); // State
        }
        $this->ClearLastError();
        $this->ClearDataReceived();
        $this->ClearDataToSend();
        $this->_socket_to_server = fsockopen('udp://' . $this->_ip_radius_server, $this->_authentication_port, $errno, $errstr, $this->_udp_timeout);
        if (!$this->_socket_to_server) {
            $this->_last_error_code = $errno;
            $this->_last_error_message = $errstr;
            return false;
        }
        stream_set_timeout($this->_socket_to_server, $this->_udp_timeout);
        $packet = $this->BuildPacket();
        fwrite($this->_socket_to_server, $packet);
        $response = fread($this->_socket_to_server, 4096);
        fclose($this->_socket_to_server);
        if ($response === false) {
            $this->_last_error_code = 1;
            $this->_last_error_message = 'No response from server';
            return false;
        }
        $this->ParseResponse($response);
        return $this->_radius_packet_received == 2; // Access-Accept
    }

    public function SetIpRadiusServer($ip_radius_server) {
        $this->_ip_radius_server = $ip_radius_server;

    }

        $this->_username = $username . $this->_radius_suffix;
    }

    public function SetPassword($password = '') {
        $this->_password = $password;
    }

    public function SetNasIpAddress($nas_ip_address = '') {
        $this->_nas_ip_address = $nas_ip_address;
    }

    public function SetNasPort($nas_port = 0) {
        $this->_nas_port = $nas_port;
    }

    public function SetPacketCodeToSend($packet_code) {
        $this->_radius_packet_to_send = $packet_code;
    }

    public function SetAttribute($attribute_type, $attribute_value) {
        $this->_attributes_to_send[] = ['type' => $attribute_type, 'value' => $attribute_value];
    }

    public function GetNextIdentifier() {
        return ($this->_identifier_to_send = ($this->_identifier_to_send + 1) % 256);
    }

    public function GenerateRequestAuthenticator() {
        $this->_request_authenticator = random_bytes(16);
    }

    public function DecodeAttribute($attribute_raw_value, $attribute_type) {
        // Implement attribute decoding based on type
    }

    public function ClearLastError() {
        $this->_last_error_code = 0;
        $this->_last_error_message = '';
    }

    public function ClearDataToSend() {
        $this->_attributes_to_send = [];
    }

    public function ClearDataReceived() {
        $this->_attributes_received = [];
    }

    private function BuildPacket() {
        $packet = chr($this->_radius_packet_to_send);
        $packet .= chr($this->GetNextIdentifier());
        $length = 20 + strlen($this->_username) + strlen($this->_password);
        $packet .= pack('n', $length);
        $packet .= $this->_request_authenticator;
        foreach ($this->_attributes_to_send as $attribute) {
            $packet .= chr($attribute['type']);
            $packet .= chr(2 + strlen($attribute['value']));
            $packet .= $attribute['value'];
        }
        return $packet;
    }

    private function ParseResponse($response) {
        $this->_radius_packet_received = ord($response[0]);
        $this->_identifier_received = ord($response[1]);
        $length = unpack('n', substr($response, 2, 2))[1];
        $this->_response_authenticator = substr($response, 4, 16);
        $attributes = substr($response, 20, $length - 20);
        while (strlen($attributes) > 0) {
            $type = ord($attributes[0]);
            $length = ord($attributes[1]);
            $value = substr($attributes, 2, $length - 2);
            $this->_attributes_received[] = ['type' => $type, 'value' => $value];
            $attributes = substr($attributes, $length);
        }
    }
}

    public function __construct($ip_radius_server = '127.0.0.1', $shared_secret = '', $radius_suffix = '', $udp_timeout = 5, $authentication_port = 1812, $accounting_port = 1813) {
        $this->_ip_radius_server = $ip_radius_server;
        $this->_shared_secret = $shared_secret;
        $this->_radius_suffix = $radius_suffix;
        $this->_udp_timeout = $udp_timeout;
        $this->_authentication_port = $authentication_port;
        $this->_accounting_port = $accounting_port;
        $this->_attributes_to_send = [];
        $this->_attributes_received = [];
        $this->_debug_mode = false;
        $this->debug_text = [];
        $this->_last_error_code = 0;
        $this->_last_error_message = '';
    }

    public function AccessRequest($username = '', $password = '', $udp_timeout = 0, $state = NULL) {
        $this->SetUsername($username);
        $this->SetPassword($password);
        if ($udp_timeout > 0) {
            $this->SetUdpTimeout($udp_timeout);
        }
        $this->GenerateRequestAuthenticator();
        $this->SetPacketCodeToSend(1); // Access-Request
        $this->SetAttribute(1, $this->_username); // User-Name
        $this->SetAttribute(2, $this->_password); // User-Password
        if ($state !== NULL) {
            $this->SetAttribute(24, $state); // State
        }
        $this->ClearLastError();
        $this->ClearDataReceived();
        $this->ClearDataToSend();
        $this->_socket_to_server = fsockopen("udp://{$this->_ip_radius_server}", $this->_authentication_port, $errno, $errstr, $this->_udp_timeout);
        if (!$this->_socket_to_server) {
            $this->_last_error_code = $errno;
            $this->_last_error_message = $errstr;
            return false;
        }
        stream_set_timeout($this->_socket_to_server, $this->_udp_timeout);
        $packet = $this->BuildPacket();
        fwrite($this->_socket_to_server, $packet);
        $response = fread($this->_socket_to_server, 4096);
        fclose($this->_socket_to_server);
        if ($response === false) {
            $this->_last_error_code = -1;
            $this->_last_error_message = 'No response from server';
            return false;
        }
        $this->ParseResponse($response);
        return $this->_radius_packet_received == 2; // Access-Accept
    }

    public function SetIpRadiusServer($ip_radius_server) {
        $this->_ip_radius_server = $ip_radius_server;
    }

        $this->_nas_ip_address = $nas_ip_address;
    }

        $this->_nas_port = $nas_port;
    }

        $this->_radius_packet_to_send = $packet_code;
    }

    public function SetAttribute($attribute_type, $attribute_value) {
        $this->_attributes_to_send[] = ['type' => $attribute_type, 'value' => $attribute_value];
    }

    public function GetNextIdentifier() {
        return ++$this->_identifier_to_send % 256;
    }

    public function GenerateRequestAuthenticator() {
        $this->_request_authenticator = random_bytes(16);
    }

    public function DecodeAttribute($attribute_raw_value, $attribute_type) {
        // Implement attribute decoding based on type
    }

    public function ClearLastError() {
        $this->_last_error_code = 0;
        $this->_last_error_message = '';
    }

    public function ClearDataToSend() {
        $this->_attributes_to_send = [];
    }

    public function ClearDataReceived() {
        $this->_attributes_received = [];
    }

    private function BuildPacket() {
        $packet = chr($this->_radius_packet_to_send);
        $packet .= chr($this->GetNextIdentifier());
        $length = 20 + strlen($this->_username) + strlen($this->_password);
        $packet .= pack('n', $length);
        $packet .= $this->_request_authenticator;
        foreach ($this->_attributes_to_send as $attribute) {
            $packet .= chr($attribute['type']);
            $packet .= chr(2 + strlen($attribute['value']));
            $packet .= $attribute['value'];
        }
        return $packet;
    }

    private function ParseResponse($response) {
        $this->_radius_packet_received = ord($response[0]);
        $this->_identifier_received = ord($response[1]);
        $this->_response_authenticator = substr($response, 4, 16);
        $attributes = substr($response, 20);
        while (strlen($attributes) > 0) {
            $type = ord($attributes[0]);
            $length = ord($attributes[1]);
            $value = substr($attributes, 2, $length - 2);
            $this->_attributes_received[] = ['type' => $type, 'value' => $value];
            $attributes = substr($attributes, $length);
        }
    }
}

    }

    private $_last_error_message;

    public function __construct($ip_radius_server = '127.0.0.1', $shared_secret = '', $radius_suffix = '', $udp_timeout = 5, $authentication_port = 1812, $accounting_port = 1813) {
        $this->_ip_radius_server = $ip_radius_server;
        $this->_shared_secret = $shared_secret;
        $this->_radius_suffix = $radius_suffix;
        $this->_udp_timeout = $udp_timeout;
        $this->_authentication_port = $authentication_port;
        $this->_accounting_port = $accounting_port;
    }

    public function AccessRequest($username = '', $password = '', $udp_timeout = 0, $state = NULL) {
        $this->SetUsername($username);
        $this->SetPassword($password);
        if ($udp_timeout > 0) {
            $this->SetUdpTimeout($udp_timeout);
        }
        $this->GenerateRequestAuthenticator();
        $this->SetPacketCodeToSend(1); // Access-Request
        $this->SetAttribute(1, $this->_username); // User-Name
        $this->SetAttribute(2, $this->_password); // User-Password
        $this->ClearLastError();
        $this->ClearDataReceived();
        $this->_socket_to_server = fsockopen('udp://' . $this->_ip_radius_server, $this->_authentication_port, $errno, $errstr, $this->_udp_timeout);
        if (!$this->_socket_to_server) {
            $this->_last_error_code = $errno;
            $this->_last_error_message = $errstr;
            return false;
        }
        stream_set_timeout($this->_socket_to_server, $this->_udp_timeout);
        $packet = $this->BuildPacket();
        fwrite($this->_socket_to_server, $packet);
        $response = fread($this->_socket_to_server, 4096);
        fclose($this->_socket_to_server);
        if ($response === false) {
            $this->_last_error_code = -1;
            $this->_last_error_message = 'No response from server';
            return false;
        }
        $this->ParseResponse($response);
        return $this->_radius_packet_received == 2; // Access-Accept
    }

        $this->_ip_radius_server = $ip_radius_server;
    }

        $this->_nas_ip_address = $nas_ip_address;
    }

    public function SetNasPort($nas_port = 0) {
        $this->_nas_port = $nas_port;
    }

    public function SetPacketCodeToSend($packet_code) {
        $this->_radius_packet_to_send = $packet_code;
    }

    public function SetAttribute($attribute_type, $attribute_value) {
        $this->_attributes_to_send[] = ['type' => $attribute_type, 'value' => $attribute_value];
    }

    public function GetNextIdentifier() {
        return ++$this->_identifier_to_send;
    }

    public function GenerateRequestAuthenticator() {
        $this->_request_authenticator = random_bytes(16);
    }

    public function DecodeAttribute($attribute_raw_value, $attribute_type) {
        // Implement attribute decoding based on type
    }

    public function ClearLastError() {
        $this->_last_error_code = null;
        $this->_last_error_message = null;
    }

    public function ClearDataToSend() {
        $this->_attributes_to_send = [];
    }

    public function ClearDataReceived() {
        $this->_attributes_received = [];
    }

    private function BuildPacket() {
        $packet = chr($this->_radius_packet_to_send);
        $packet .= chr($this->GetNextIdentifier());
        $length = 20 + array_sum(array_map(function($attr) { return 2 + strlen($attr['value']); }, $this->_attributes_to_send));
        $packet .= pack('n', $length);
        $packet .= $this->_request_authenticator;
        foreach ($this->_attributes_to_send as $attr) {
            $packet .= chr($attr['type']) . chr(2 + strlen($attr['value'])) . $attr['value'];
        }
        return $packet;
    }

    private function ParseResponse($response) {
        $this->_radius_packet_received = ord($response[0]);
        $this->_identifier_received = ord($response[1]);
        $this->_response_authenticator = substr($response, 4, 16);
        $attributes = substr($response, 20);
        while (strlen($attributes) > 0) {
            $type = ord($attributes[0]);
            $length = ord($attributes[1]);
            $value = substr($attributes, 2, $length - 2);
            $this->_attributes_received[] = ['type' => $type, 'value' => $this->DecodeAttribute($value, $type)];
            $attributes = substr($attributes, $length);
        }
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP class that implements HTTP client functionality using Symfony's HTTP client components to handle HTTP requests and responses.

Class Description: The HttpClientKernel class is an implementation of HttpKernelInterface that provides HTTP client capabilities using Symfony's HTTP client components. It handles HTTP requests by sending them to a remote server and returning the response, supporting various request methods, headers, cookies, and body content (including form data and file uploads).

Attributes:
- client: [HttpClientInterface] - The Symfony HTTP client instance used to send requests

Methods:
- __construct(?HttpClientInterface $client = null) -> [void] - Initializes the HTTP client. If no client is provided, creates a default HttpClient instance. Throws an exception if the HttpClient component is not installed.
- handle(Request $request, int $type = HttpKernelInterface::MAIN_REQUEST, bool $catch = true) -> [Response] - Processes an HTTP request by sending it to the target server and returns the response. Handles headers, cookies, and request body preparation.
- getBody(Request $request) -> [?AbstractPart] - Prepares the request body content. Returns null for GET/HEAD requests, a TextPart for raw content, or a FormDataPart for form data including file uploads. Throws an exception if the Mime component is not installed when needed.
- getHeaders(Request $request) -> [array] - Extracts and formats headers from the request object, including cookies, into an array suitable for the HTTP client.

<?php

use Symfony\Component\HttpClient\HttpClient;
use Symfony\Component\HttpClient\HttpClientInterface;
use Symfony\Component\HttpFoundation\Request;
use Symfony\Component\HttpFoundation\Response;
use Symfony\Component\HttpKernel\HttpKernelInterface;
use Symfony\Component\Mime\Part\AbstractPart;
use Symfony\Component\Mime\Part\TextPart;
use Symfony\Component\Mime\Part\FormDataPart;

class HttpClientKernel implements HttpKernelInterface
{
    private $client;

    public function __construct(?HttpClientInterface $client = null)
    {
        if (null === $client) {
            if (!class_exists(HttpClient::class)) {
                throw new \RuntimeException('The Symfony HTTP client component is not installed.');
            }
            $client = HttpClient::create();
        }
        $this->client = $client;
    }

    public function handle(Request $request, int $type = HttpKernelInterface::MAIN_REQUEST, bool $catch = true): Response
    {
        $options = [
            'headers' => $this->getHeaders($request),
            'body' => $this->getBody($request),
        ];

        $response = $this->client->request(
            $request->getMethod(),
            $request->getUri(),
            $options
        );

        return new Response(
            $response->getContent(),
            $response->getStatusCode(),
            $response->getHeaders(false)
        );
    }

    private function getBody(Request $request): ?AbstractPart
    {
        if (in_array($request->getMethod(), ['GET', 'HEAD'])) {
            return null;
        }

        if ($request->request->count() > 0 || $request->files->count() > 0) {
            if (!class_exists(FormDataPart::class)) {
                throw new \RuntimeException('The Symfony Mime component is not installed.');
            }

            $formData = array_merge($request->request->all(), $request->files->all());
            return new FormDataPart($formData);
        }

        return new TextPart($request->getContent());
    }

    private function getHeaders(Request $request): array
    {
        $headers = [];
        foreach ($request->headers->all() as $name => $values) {
            $headers[$name] = implode(', ', $values);
        }

        if ($request->cookies->count() > 0) {
            $headers['Cookie'] = http_build_query($request->cookies->all(), '', '; ');
        }

        return $headers;
    }
}

class HttpClientKernel implements HttpKernelInterface
{

    {

                throw new \RuntimeException('The Symfony HttpClient component is not installed.');
            }
            $client = HttpClient::create();
        }

    }

    public function handle(Request $request, int $type = self::MAIN_REQUEST, bool $catch = true): Response
    {
        $method = $request->getMethod();
        $url = $request->getUri();
        $headers = $this->getHeaders($request);
        $body = $this->getBody($request);

        $options = [
            'headers' => $headers,
            'body' => $body ? $body->bodyToIterable() : null,
        ];

        $httpResponse = $this->client->request($method, $url, $options);

        return new Response(
            $httpResponse->getContent(false),
            $httpResponse->getStatusCode(),
            $httpResponse->getHeaders(false)
        );
    }

    {
        if (in_array($request->getMethod(), ['GET', 'HEAD'])) {
            return null;
        }

        if ($request->request->count() > 0 || $request->files->count() > 0) {
            if (!class_exists(FormDataPart::class)) {
                throw new \RuntimeException('The Symfony Mime component is not installed.');
            }
            $formData = array_merge($request->request->all(), $request->files->all());
            return new FormDataPart($formData);
        }

        return new TextPart($request->getContent());
    }

    private function getHeaders(Request $request): array
    {
        $headers = [];
        foreach ($request->headers->all() as $name => $values) {
            foreach ($values as $value) {
                $headers[] = "$name: $value";
            }
        }

        $cookies = [];
        foreach ($request->cookies->all() as $name => $value) {
            $cookies[] = "$name=$value";
        }
        if ($cookies) {
            $headers[] = 'Cookie: ' . implode('; ', $cookies);
        }

        return $headers;
    }
}

        $httpResponse = $this->client->request($method, $url, $options);

            $httpResponse->getStatusCode(),
            $httpResponse->getHeaders(false)
        );
    }

    private function getBody(Request $request): ?AbstractPart
    {
        $method = $request->getMethod();

        if (in_array($method, ['GET', 'HEAD'])) {

            if (!class_exists(FormDataPart::class)) {
                throw new \RuntimeException('Symfony Mime component is not installed.');
            }
            $formData = array_merge($request->request->all(), $request->files->all());
            $formDataPart = new FormDataPart($formData);
            return $formDataPart;
        }

        return new TextPart($request->getContent());
    }

    private function getHeaders(Request $request): array
    {
        $headers = [];
        foreach ($request->headers->all() as $name => $values) {
            foreach ($values as $value) {

        if ($request->cookies->count() > 0) {
            $cookies = [];
            foreach ($request->cookies->all() as $name => $value) {
                $cookies[] = "$name=$value";
            }
            $headers[] = 'Cookie: ' . implode('; ', $cookies);
        }

        return $headers;
    }
}

            $httpResponse->getStatusCode(),
            $httpResponse->getHeaders(false)

Instruction:
Task Description: Implement a UDP scraper class for interacting with BitTorrent trackers to scrape torrent statistics using UDP protocol.

Class Description: UdpScraper is a class that handles communication with BitTorrent trackers via UDP protocol to retrieve scrape information (seeders, leechers, downloads) for given torrent info hashes. It manages socket connections, transaction IDs, and packet formatting according to the UDP tracker protocol.

Attributes:
- currentConnectionId: [string] - The connection ID received from the tracker after initial connection
- transactionId: [int] - The current transaction ID used for request/response tracking
- socket: [resource|null] - The UDP socket resource for communication
- timeout: [int] - Socket timeout in seconds for send/receive operations

Methods:
- scrape([Tracker $tracker, array $hashes]) -> [array] - Main method to scrape multiple torrent hashes by splitting them into chunks
- scrapeChunk([Tracker $tracker, array $hashes]) -> [array] - Scrapes a chunk of torrent hashes (max 74 at a time)
- initSocket() -> [resource] - Initializes and returns a UDP socket
- connect([string $domain, int $port]) -> [void] - Connects the socket to the tracker
- generateTransactionId() -> [void] - Generates a random transaction ID
- startTransaction() -> [void] - Initiates connection with the tracker and establishes connection ID
- scrapeHashes([array $hashes]) -> [array] - Sends scrape request for given hashes and processes response
- request([string $packet, int $readLength]) -> [string] - Sends packet and reads response with timeout
- closeSocket() -> [void] - Closes the socket and resets connection state
- checkError([string $response]) -> [void] - Checks for and handles error responses from tracker
unmatched_results:
<?php

class UdpScraper {
    private $currentConnectionId;
    private $transactionId;
    private $socket;
    private $timeout = 10;

    public function scrape($tracker, $hashes) {
        $results = [];
        $chunks = array_chunk($hashes, 74);
        foreach ($chunks as $chunk) {
            $results = array_merge($results, $this->scrapeChunk($tracker, $chunk));
        }
        return $results;
    }

    private function scrapeChunk($tracker, $hashes) {
        $this->initSocket();
        $this->connect($tracker->domain, $tracker->port);
        $this->startTransaction();
        $results = $this->scrapeHashes($hashes);
        $this->closeSocket();
        return $results;
    }

    private function initSocket() {
        $this->socket = socket_create(AF_INET, SOCK_DGRAM, SOL_UDP);
        socket_set_option($this->socket, SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVTIMEO, ['sec' => $this->timeout, 'usec' => 0]);
    }

    private function connect($domain, $port) {
        socket_connect($this->socket, $domain, $port);
    }

    private function generateTransactionId() {
        $this->transactionId = random_int(0, 0x7fffffff);
    }

    private function startTransaction() {
        $this->generateTransactionId();
        $packet = pack('N2', 0x41727101980, $this->transactionId);
        $response = $this->request($packet, 16);
        $this->currentConnectionId = substr($response, 8, 8);
    }

    private function scrapeHashes($hashes) {
        $this->generateTransactionId();
        $packet = $this->currentConnectionId . pack('N', 2) . pack('N', $this->transactionId);
        foreach ($hashes as $hash) {
            $packet .= pack('H*', $hash);
        }
        $response = $this->request($packet, 8 + 12 * count($hashes));
        $this->checkError($response);
        return $this->parseScrapeResponse($response, count($hashes));
    }

    private function request($packet, $readLength) {
        socket_send($this->socket, $packet, strlen($packet), 0);
        socket_recv($this->socket, $response, $readLength, MSG_WAITALL);
        return $response;
    }

    private function closeSocket() {
        socket_close($this->socket);
        $this->socket = null;
        $this->currentConnectionId = null;
        $this->transactionId = null;
    }

    private function checkError($response) {
        $action = unpack('N', substr($response, 0, 4))[1];
        if ($action == 3) {
            $error = substr($response, 8);
            throw new Exception("Tracker error: $error");
        }
    }

    private function parseScrapeResponse($response, $hashCount) {
        $results = [];
        for ($i = 0; $i < $hashCount; $i++) {
            $offset = 8 + $i * 12;
            $seeders = unpack('N', substr($response, $offset, 4))[1];
            $completed = unpack('N', substr($response, $offset + 4, 4))[1];
            $leechers = unpack('N', substr($response, $offset + 8, 4))[1];
            $results[] = ['seeders' => $seeders, 'completed' => $completed, 'leechers' => $leechers];
        }
        return $results;
    }
}

class Tracker {
    public $domain;
    public $port;

    public function __construct($domain, $port) {
        $this->domain = $domain;
        $this->port = $port;
    }
}

    }

    private function scrapeHashes(array $hashes) {
        $this->generateTransactionId();
        $packet = $this->currentConnectionId . pack('N', 2) . pack('N', $this->transactionId);
        foreach ($hashes as $hash) {
            $packet .= pack('H*', $hash);
        }
        $response = $this->request($packet, 8 + 12 * count($hashes));

    private function request($packet, $readLength) {

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP function that implements a basic TCP socket server capable of handling client connections, executing commands, and managing directory changes.

Function Description: The function starts a TCP socket server on a specified port, accepts client connections, and provides an interactive shell-like interface. It handles 'cd' commands for directory navigation, 'exit'/'quit' commands for termination, and executes other system commands. The server sends command outputs and current working directory information back to the client.

Input:
- $port: integer - The port number to bind the server socket to
- $wpxf_disabled: array - List of disabled functions/callables
- $wpxf_exec: callable - Function to execute system commands

Output: None (The function runs indefinitely until the client disconnects or sends an exit command)
matched_results:
<?php

function startTcpServer($port, $wpxf_disabled, $wpxf_exec) {
    set_time_limit(0);
    ob_implicit_flush();

    $sock = socket_create(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, SOL_TCP);
    if ($sock === false) {
        echo "socket_create() failed: reason: " . socket_strerror(socket_last_error()) . "\n";
        return;
    }

    if (socket_bind($sock, '0.0.0.0', $port) === false) {
        echo "socket_bind() failed: reason: " . socket_strerror(socket_last_error($sock)) . "\n";
        return;
    }

    if (socket_listen($sock, 5) === false) {
        echo "socket_listen() failed: reason: " . socket_strerror(socket_last_error($sock)) . "\n";
        return;
    }

    do {
        $msgsock = socket_accept($sock);
        if ($msgsock === false) {
            echo "socket_accept() failed: reason: " . socket_strerror(socket_last_error($sock)) . "\n";
            break;
        }

        $cwd = getcwd();
        $welcome = "Welcome to the PHP TCP Server. Type 'exit' or 'quit' to disconnect.\n";
        socket_write($msgsock, $welcome, strlen($welcome));

        do {
            $prompt = "$cwd> ";
            socket_write($msgsock, $prompt, strlen($prompt));

            $buf = socket_read($msgsock, 2048, PHP_NORMAL_READ);
            if ($buf === false) {
                echo "socket_read() failed: reason: " . socket_strerror(socket_last_error($msgsock)) . "\n";
                break;
            }

            $buf = trim($buf);
            if ($buf == 'exit' || $buf == 'quit') {
                break;
            }

            if (substr($buf, 0, 3) == 'cd ') {
                $dir = substr($buf, 3);
                if (chdir($dir)) {
                    $cwd = getcwd();
                } else {
                    $error = "Failed to change directory to $dir\n";
                    socket_write($msgsock, $error, strlen($error));
                }
            } else {
                if (in_array($buf, $wpxf_disabled)) {
                    $error = "Command '$buf' is disabled.\n";
                    socket_write($msgsock, $error, strlen($error));
                } else {
                    $output = $wpxf_exec($buf);
                    socket_write($msgsock, $output, strlen($output));
                }
            }
        } while (true);

        socket_close($msgsock);
    } while (true);

    socket_close($sock);
}

<?php

function startTcpServer($port, $wpxf_disabled, $wpxf_exec) {
    set_time_limit(0);
    ob_implicit_flush();

    $address = '0.0.0.0';
    $sock = socket_create(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, SOL_TCP);
    socket_bind($sock, $address, $port);
    socket_listen($sock);

    while (true) {
        $client = socket_accept($sock);
        $cwd = getcwd();

        while (true) {
            socket_write($client, "$cwd> ");
            $input = trim(socket_read($client, 2048, PHP_NORMAL_READ));

            if (in_array($input, ['exit', 'quit'])) {
                socket_close($client);
                break;
            }

            if (strpos($input, 'cd ') === 0) {
                $dir = substr($input, 3);
                if (chdir($dir)) {
                    $cwd = getcwd();
                } else {
                    socket_write($client, "Failed to change directory to $dir\n");
                }
                continue;
            }

            if (!in_array('exec', $wpxf_disabled)) {
                $output = $wpxf_exec($input);
                socket_write($client, $output);
            } else {
                socket_write($client, "Command execution is disabled\n");
            }
        }
    }

    socket_close($sock);
}

function startTcpServer($port, $wpxf_disabled, $wpxf_exec) {

    }

    }

    if (socket_listen($sock, 5) === false) {
        die("socket_listen() failed: " . socket_strerror(socket_last_error($sock)) . "\n");
    }

    do {
        if (($msgsock = socket_accept($sock)) === false) {
            echo "socket_accept() failed: " . socket_strerror(socket_last_error($sock)) . "\n";

            if (false === ($buf = socket_read($msgsock, 2048, PHP_NORMAL_READ))) {

            if (!$buf = trim($buf)) {

                    if (@chdir($dir)) {
                        $cwd = getcwd();
                        $response = "Directory changed to $cwd\n";
                    } else {

            socket_write($msgsock, $response, strlen($response));
        } while (true);

    } while (true);

    socket_listen($sock);

    while (true) {
        $client = socket_accept($sock);
        $cwd = getcwd();

        while (true) {
            socket_write($client, "$cwd> ");
            $input = trim(socket_read($client, 2048, PHP_NORMAL_READ));

            if (in_array($input, ['exit', 'quit'])) {
                break;
            }

            if (strpos($input, 'cd ') === 0) {
                $dir = substr($input, 3);
                if (chdir($dir)) {
                    $cwd = getcwd();
                } else {
                    socket_write($client, "Failed to change directory to $dir\n");
                }
                continue;
            }

            if (!in_array('exec', $wpxf_disabled)) {
                $output = $wpxf_exec($input);
                socket_write($client, $output);
            } else {
                socket_write($client, "Command execution is disabled\n");
            }
        }

        socket_close($client);
    }

function startTcpSocketServer($port, $wpxf_disabled, $wpxf_exec) {
    set_time_limit(0);
    ob_implicit_flush();

    $sock = socket_create(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, SOL_TCP);
    if ($sock === false) {
        echo "socket_create() failed: reason: " . socket_strerror(socket_last_error()) . "\n";
        return;
    }

    if (socket_bind($sock, '0.0.0.0', $port) === false) {
        echo "socket_bind() failed: reason: " . socket_strerror(socket_last_error($sock)) . "\n";
        return;
    }

    if (socket_listen($sock, 5) === false) {
        echo "socket_listen() failed: reason: " . socket_strerror(socket_last_error($sock)) . "\n";
        return;
    }

    do {
        $msgsock = socket_accept($sock);
        if ($msgsock === false) {
            echo "socket_accept() failed: reason: " . socket_strerror(socket_last_error($sock)) . "\n";
            break;
        }

        $cwd = getcwd();
        $welcome = "Welcome to the PHP TCP Server. Type 'exit' or 'quit' to disconnect.\n";
        socket_write($msgsock, $welcome, strlen($welcome));

        do {
            $prompt = "$cwd> ";
            socket_write($msgsock, $prompt, strlen($prompt));

            $buf = socket_read($msgsock, 2048, PHP_NORMAL_READ);
            if ($buf === false) {
                echo "socket_read() failed: reason: " . socket_strerror(socket_last_error($msgsock)) . "\n";
                break;
            }

            $buf = trim($buf);
            if ($buf == 'exit' || $buf == 'quit') {
                break;
            }

            if (strpos($buf, 'cd ') === 0) {
                $dir = substr($buf, 3);
                if (chdir($dir)) {
                    $cwd = getcwd();
                } else {
                    $error = "Failed to change directory to $dir\n";
                    socket_write($msgsock, $error, strlen($error));
                }
                continue;
            }

            if (in_array($buf, $wpxf_disabled)) {
                $error = "Command '$buf' is disabled.\n";
                socket_write($msgsock, $error, strlen($error));
                continue;
            }

            $output = $wpxf_exec($buf);
            socket_write($msgsock, $output, strlen($output));

        } while (true);

        socket_close($msgsock);
    } while (true);

    socket_close($sock);
}

function startTcpSocketServer($port, $wpxf_disabled, $wpxf_exec) {
    set_time_limit(0);

    $address = '0.0.0.0';
    $sock = socket_create(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, SOL_TCP);
    if ($sock === false) {
        echo "socket_create() failed: reason: " . socket_strerror(socket_last_error()) . "\n";
        return;
    }

    if (socket_bind($sock, $address, $port) === false) {
        echo "socket_bind() failed: reason: " . socket_strerror(socket_last_error($sock)) . "\n";
        return;
    }

    if (socket_listen($sock, 5) === false) {
        echo "socket_listen() failed: reason: " . socket_strerror(socket_last_error($sock)) . "\n";
        return;
    }

    do {
        $msgsock = socket_accept($sock);
        if ($msgsock === false) {
            echo "socket_accept() failed: reason: " . socket_strerror(socket_last_error($sock)) . "\n";
            break;
        }

        $cwd = getcwd();
        $welcome = "Welcome to the PHP TCP Socket Server.\n";
        $welcome .= "Type 'exit' or 'quit' to disconnect.\n";
        $welcome .= "Current directory: $cwd\n";
        socket_write($msgsock, $welcome, strlen($welcome));

        do {
            $buf = socket_read($msgsock, 2048, PHP_NORMAL_READ);
            if ($buf === false) {
                echo "socket_read() failed: reason: " . socket_strerror(socket_last_error($msgsock)) . "\n";
                break;
            }

            $buf = trim($buf);
            if ($buf == 'exit' || $buf == 'quit') {
                break;
            }

            if (strpos($buf, 'cd ') === 0) {
                $dir = substr($buf, 3);
                if (in_array('chdir', $wpxf_disabled)) {
                    $response = "chdir function is disabled.\n";
                } else {
                    if (chdir($dir)) {
                        $cwd = getcwd();
                        $response = "Directory changed to $cwd\n";
                    } else {
                        $response = "Failed to change directory to $dir\n";
                    }
                }
            } else {
                if (in_array('exec', $wpxf_disabled)) {
                    $response = "exec function is disabled.\n";
                } else {
                    $output = $wpxf_exec($buf);
                    $response = $output . "\n";
                }
            }

            socket_write($msgsock, $response, strlen($response));
        } while (true);

        socket_close($msgsock);
    } while (true);

    socket_close($sock);
}

Task Description: Create a PHP class that implements a JSON-RPC client using Swoole's coroutine-based TCP client for asynchronous communication with a JSON-RPC server. The class should handle connection management, request/response serialization, and middleware processing.

Class Description: The Connection class provides a JSON-RPC client implementation using Swoole's coroutine client for TCP communication. It manages the connection lifecycle, handles JSON-RPC protocol serialization/deserialization, and supports middleware processing for requests.

Attributes:
- host: [string] - The hostname or IP address of the JSON-RPC server
- port: [int] - The port number of the JSON-RPC server
- timeout: [float] - Connection timeout in seconds
- callTimeout: [float] - Timeout for RPC calls in seconds
- middleware: [array] - Array of middleware objects to process requests
- client: [Swoole\Coroutine\Client] - The Swoole coroutine client instance (protected)

Methods:
- __construct([array $config = []]) -> [void] - Constructor that initializes the connection with optional configuration
- connect() -> [void] - Establishes a TCP connection to the JSON-RPC server
- call([Request $request]) -> [Response] - Sends a JSON-RPC request and returns the response, processing through middleware
- close() -> [void] - Closes the connection to the server
- recv([float $timeout = -1]) -> [string] - Receives data from the server with optional timeout (protected)
- send([string $data]) -> [void] - Sends data to the server (protected)

<?php

use Swoole\Coroutine\Client;

class Connection
{
    protected $host;
    protected $port;
    protected $timeout;
    protected $callTimeout;
    protected $middleware;
    protected $client;

    public function __construct(array $config = [])
    {
        $this->host = $config['host'] ?? '127.0.0.1';
        $this->port = $config['port'] ?? 80;
        $this->timeout = $config['timeout'] ?? 5.0;
        $this->callTimeout = $config['callTimeout'] ?? 5.0;
        $this->middleware = $config['middleware'] ?? [];
        $this->client = new Client(SWOOLE_SOCK_TCP);
    }

    public function connect(): void
    {
        if (!$this->client->connect($this->host, $this->port, $this->timeout)) {
            throw new \RuntimeException("Failed to connect to {$this->host}:{$this->port}");
        }
    }

    public function call(Request $request): Response
    {
        $data = json_encode($request);
        foreach ($this->middleware as $middleware) {
            $data = $middleware->process($data);
        }
        $this->send($data);
        $response = $this->recv($this->callTimeout);
        return json_decode($response, true);
    }

    public function close(): void
    {
        $this->client->close();
    }

    protected function recv(float $timeout = -1): string
    {
        $data = $this->client->recv($timeout);
        if ($data === false) {
            throw new \RuntimeException("Failed to receive data");
        }
        return $data;
    }

    protected function send(string $data): void
    {
        if ($this->client->send($data) === false) {
            throw new \RuntimeException("Failed to send data");
        }
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a WebSocket server in PHP using stream_socket_server that handles client connections, processes requests, and sends responses.

Class Description: The Server class implements a WebSocket server that listens for incoming connections, handles client requests through callbacks, and manages socket communication. It supports non-blocking operations and provides hooks for custom logic.

Attributes:
- host: string - The host address to bind the server to
- port: int - The port number to listen on
- output: OutputInterface - Interface for debug and status output
- stop: bool - Flag to control server shutdown
- socket: resource - The main server socket resource
- clientSockets: array - Array of connected client sockets
- afterCallback: Closure - Callback executed after server starts
- tickerCallback: Closure - Periodic callback during server loop
- routerCallback: Closure - Request routing callback

Methods:
- __construct(string $host, int $port, OutputInterface $output) -> void - Initializes server with host, port and output interface
- checkRequiredExtensionsExists() -> void - Validates required PHP extensions are loaded
- run() -> void - Starts the server main loop
- createServerSocket() -> resource - Creates and configures the server socket
- updatePort() -> void - Updates the port number from actual socket binding
- acceptNewConnections() -> void - Accepts new client connections
- handleClientRequests() -> void - Processes requests from connected clients
- readClientRequest(resource $clientSocket) -> string - Reads complete request from client
- parseRequest(string $request) -> array - Parses request into path and payload
- sendResponse(resource $clientSocket, Response $response) -> void - Sends formatted response to client
- closeClientSocket(resource $clientSocket, int $key) -> void - Closes and removes client socket
- afterRun(Closure $param) -> void - Sets after-start callback
- ticker(Closure $param) -> void - Sets periodic tick callback
- router(Closure $param) -> void - Sets request routing callback
- stop() -> void - Signals server to stop

<?php

class Server
{
    private string $host;
    private int $port;
    private OutputInterface $output;
    private bool $stop = false;
    private $socket;
    private array $clientSockets = [];
    private Closure $afterCallback;
    private Closure $tickerCallback;
    private Closure $routerCallback;

    public function __construct(string $host, int $port, OutputInterface $output)
    {
        $this->host = $host;
        $this->port = $port;
        $this->output = $output;
        $this->checkRequiredExtensionsExists();
    }

    private function checkRequiredExtensionsExists(): void
    {
        if (!extension_loaded('sockets')) {
            throw new RuntimeException('The sockets extension is required.');
        }
    }

    public function run(): void
    {
        $this->socket = $this->createServerSocket();
        $this->updatePort();

        if ($this->afterCallback) {
            ($this->afterCallback)();
        }

        while (!$this->stop) {
            $this->acceptNewConnections();
            $this->handleClientRequests();

            if ($this->tickerCallback) {
                ($this->tickerCallback)();
            }

            usleep(10000); // Sleep for 10ms to prevent CPU overload
        }

        fclose($this->socket);
    }

    private function createServerSocket()
    {
        $socket = stream_socket_server("tcp://{$this->host}:{$this->port}", $errno, $errstr);
        if (!$socket) {
            throw new RuntimeException("Failed to create socket: $errstr ($errno)");
        }
        stream_set_blocking($socket, false);
        return $socket;
    }

    private function updatePort(): void
    {
        $address = stream_socket_get_name($this->socket, false);
        $parts = explode(':', $address);
        $this->port = (int)end($parts);
    }

    private function acceptNewConnections(): void
    {
        $clientSocket = @stream_socket_accept($this->socket, 0);
        if ($clientSocket) {
            stream_set_blocking($clientSocket, false);
            $this->clientSockets[] = $clientSocket;
        }
    }

    private function handleClientRequests(): void
    {
        foreach ($this->clientSockets as $key => $clientSocket) {
            $request = $this->readClientRequest($clientSocket);
            if ($request === '') {
                $this->closeClientSocket($clientSocket, $key);
                continue;
            }

            [$path, $payload] = $this->parseRequest($request);
            $response = ($this->routerCallback)($path, $payload);
            $this->sendResponse($clientSocket, $response);
        }
    }

    private function readClientRequest($clientSocket): string
    {
        $request = '';
        while ($buffer = @fread($clientSocket, 1024)) {
            $request .= $buffer;
        }
        return $request;
    }

    private function parseRequest(string $request): array
    {
        $lines = explode("\r\n", $request);
        $path = $lines[0];
        $payload = end($lines);
        return [$path, $payload];
    }

    private function sendResponse($clientSocket, Response $response): void
    {
        fwrite($clientSocket, (string)$response);
    }

    private function closeClientSocket($clientSocket, int $key): void
    {
        fclose($clientSocket);
        unset($this->clientSockets[$key]);
    }

    public function afterRun(Closure $param): void
    {
        $this->afterCallback = $param;
    }

    public function ticker(Closure $param): void
    {
        $this->tickerCallback = $param;
    }

    public function router(Closure $param): void
    {
        $this->routerCallback = $param;
    }

    public function stop(): void
    {
        $this->stop = true;
    }
}

        $this->output->write("Connection closed.");
    }

    public function afterRun(Closure $param): void {
        $this->afterCallback = $param;
    }

    public function ticker(Closure $param): void {
        $this->tickerCallback = $param;
    }

    public function router(Closure $param): void {
        $this->routerCallback = $param;
    }

    public function stop(): void {
        $this->stop = true;
    }
}

<?php

interface OutputInterface {
    public function write(string $message): void;
}

class Server {
    private string $host;
    private int $port;
    private OutputInterface $output;
    private bool $stop = false;
    private $socket;
    private array $clientSockets = [];
    private Closure $afterCallback;
    private Closure $tickerCallback;
    private Closure $routerCallback;

    public function __construct(string $host, int $port, OutputInterface $output) {
        $this->host = $host;
        $this->port = $port;
        $this->output = $output;
        $this->checkRequiredExtensionsExists();
    }

    private function checkRequiredExtensionsExists(): void {
        if (!extension_loaded('sockets')) {
            throw new RuntimeException('The sockets extension is required.');
        }
    }

    public function run(): void {
        $this->socket = $this->createServerSocket();
        $this->updatePort();

        if ($this->afterCallback) {
            ($this->afterCallback)();
        }

        while (!$this->stop) {
            $this->acceptNewConnections();
            $this->handleClientRequests();

            if ($this->tickerCallback) {
                ($this->tickerCallback)();
            }

            usleep(10000); // Sleep for 10ms to prevent CPU overload
        }

        fclose($this->socket);
    }

    private function createServerSocket() {
        $socket = stream_socket_server("tcp://{$this->host}:{$this->port}", $errno, $errstr);
        if (!$socket) {
            throw new RuntimeException("Could not create server socket: $errstr ($errno)");
        }
        stream_set_blocking($socket, 0);
        return $socket;
    }

    private function updatePort(): void {
        $name = stream_socket_get_name($this->socket, false);
        $parts = explode(':', $name);
        $this->port = (int)array_pop($parts);
    }

    private function acceptNewConnections(): void {
        $clientSocket = @stream_socket_accept($this->socket, 0);
        if ($clientSocket) {
            stream_set_blocking($clientSocket, 0);
            $this->clientSockets[] = $clientSocket;
        }
    }

    private function handleClientRequests(): void {
        foreach ($this->clientSockets as $key => $clientSocket) {
            $request = $this->readClientRequest($clientSocket);
            if ($request === '') {
                $this->closeClientSocket($clientSocket, $key);
                continue;
            }

            [$path, $payload] = $this->parseRequest($request);
            $response = ($this->routerCallback)($path, $payload);
            $this->sendResponse($clientSocket, $response);
        }
    }

    private function readClientRequest($clientSocket): string {
        $request = '';
        while ($buffer = @fread($clientSocket, 1024)) {
            $request .= $buffer;
        }
        return $request;
    }

    private function parseRequest(string $request): array {
        $lines = explode("\r\n", $request);
        $path = '';
        $payload = '';

        if (isset($lines[0])) {
            $parts = explode(' ', $lines[0]);
            $path = $parts[1] ?? '';
        }

        $payload = end($lines);
        return [$path, $payload];
    }

    private function sendResponse($clientSocket, $response): void {
        fwrite($clientSocket, $response);
    }

    private function closeClientSocket($clientSocket, int $key): void {
        fclose($clientSocket);
        unset($this->clientSockets[$key]);
    }

    public function afterRun(Closure $param): void {
        $this->afterCallback = $param;
    }

    public function ticker(Closure $param): void {
        $this->tickerCallback = $param;
    }

    public function router(Closure $param): void {
        $this->routerCallback = $param;
    }

    public function stop(): void {
        $this->stop = true;
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a function that executes a shell command and captures its output using PHP's proc_open for inter-process communication.

Function Description: The function executes a given shell command as a subprocess and returns its standard output. It handles both string and array command formats, manages Windows code page settings if applicable, and ensures proper cleanup of resources. The function returns null if proc_open is unavailable or if process creation fails.

Input: 
- $command: string|array - The shell command to execute, either as a string or array of arguments

Output: 
- ?string - The captured standard output from the command, or null if execution failed
matched_results:
<?php

function executeShellCommand($command): ?string {
    if (!function_exists('proc_open')) {
        return null;
    }

    $descriptorspec = [
        0 => ["pipe", "r"],  // stdin is a pipe that the child will read from
        1 => ["pipe", "w"],  // stdout is a pipe that the child will write to
        2 => ["pipe", "w"]   // stderr is a pipe that the child will write to
    ];

    $process = proc_open($command, $descriptorspec, $pipes);

    if (!is_resource($process)) {
        return null;
    }

    fclose($pipes[0]);  // Close the stdin pipe

    $output = stream_get_contents($pipes[1]);
    fclose($pipes[1]);

    $errorOutput = stream_get_contents($pipes[2]);
    fclose($pipes[2]);

    $return_value = proc_close($process);

    if ($return_value !== 0) {
        return null;
    }

    return $output;
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a function that generates an image from a DOT script using the Graphviz `dot` command-line tool through inter-process communication in PHP.

Function Description: The function takes a DOT script and an image type as input, executes the `dot` command with the specified type, and returns the generated image data. It handles the subprocess communication using pipes for stdin, stdout, and stderr, ensuring proper resource cleanup and error handling.

Input: 
- $dot_script: string - The DOT language script to be processed by Graphviz
- $type: string - The output image type (e.g., 'png', 'svg', 'jpg')

Output: 
- Returns: string - The binary data of the generated image
- On error: Prints error message to stderr and exits the program
matched_results:
<?php
function generateGraphImage($dot_script, $type) {
    $descriptorspec = [
        0 => ["pipe", "r"],  // stdin
        1 => ["pipe", "w"],  // stdout
        2 => ["pipe", "w"]   // stderr
    ];

    $process = proc_open("dot -T$type", $descriptorspec, $pipes);

    if (!is_resource($process)) {
        fwrite(STDERR, "Failed to open process\n");
        exit(1);
    }

    fwrite($pipes[0], $dot_script);
    fclose($pipes[0]);

    $image_data = stream_get_contents($pipes[1]);
    fclose($pipes[1]);

    $error_output = stream_get_contents($pipes[2]);
    fclose($pipes[2]);

    $return_value = proc_close($process);

    if ($return_value !== 0) {
        fwrite(STDERR, "Graphviz error: $error_output\n");
        exit(1);
    }

    return $image_data;
}
?>

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP class that manages a subprocess using proc_open, providing methods to initialize, communicate with, and terminate the process, while handling errors and resource cleanup.

Class Description: The ProcessStream class manages a subprocess execution through pipes for stdin, stdout, and stderr communication. It handles process initialization, error checking, and proper resource cleanup.

Attributes:
- command: string - The command to be executed in the subprocess
- stream: resource - The process resource created by proc_open
- in: resource - The stdin pipe for writing to the subprocess
- out: resource - The stdout pipe for reading from the subprocess

Methods:
- setCommand(string $command) -> void - Sets the command to be executed by the subprocess
- initialize() -> void - Starts the subprocess, sets up communication pipes, and checks for startup errors
- terminate() -> void - Closes all pipes and terminates the subprocess
- getReadConnectionDescription() -> string - Returns a description of the process connection (for logging/debugging)
unmatched_results:
<?php

class ProcessStream {
    private $command;
    private $stream;
    private $in;
    private $out;
    private $err;

    public function setCommand(string $command): void {
        $this->command = $command;
    }

    public function initialize(): void {
        $descriptorspec = [
            0 => ["pipe", "r"],  // stdin
            1 => ["pipe", "w"],  // stdout
            2 => ["pipe", "w"]   // stderr
        ];

        $this->stream = proc_open($this->command, $descriptorspec, $pipes);

        if (!is_resource($this->stream)) {
            throw new Exception("Failed to start the subprocess.");
        }

        $this->in = $pipes[0];
        $this->out = $pipes[1];
        $this->err = $pipes[2];
    }

    public function terminate(): void {
        if (is_resource($this->in)) {
            fclose($this->in);
        }
        if (is_resource($this->out)) {
            fclose($this->out);
        }
        if (is_resource($this->err)) {
            fclose($this->err);
        }
        if (is_resource($this->stream)) {
            proc_close($this->stream);
        }
    }

    public function getReadConnectionDescription(): string {
        return stream_get_meta_data($this->out)['uri'];
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a function that retrieves Git tag information from a specified directory using subprocess communication via pipes.

Function Description: The function checks if a given directory is a Git repository (by checking for .git folder) and then executes the 'git describe --tags' command to get the latest tag information. It handles subprocess communication using pipes for stdout and stderr, properly manages resources, and returns the tag information or false if unsuccessful.

Input: 
- $path (string): The filesystem path to check for Git repository information

Output:
- Returns either:
  - (string) The trimmed output from 'git describe --tags' command if successful

    - The subprocess cannot be created
    - The command returns a non-zero exit code

<?php
function getGitTagInfo($path) {
    if (!is_dir($path . '/.git')) {
        return false;
    }

    $descriptorspec = [
        1 => ['pipe', 'w'],  // stdout is a pipe that the child will write to
        2 => ['pipe', 'w']   // stderr is a pipe that the child will write to
    ];

    $process = proc_open('git describe --tags', $descriptorspec, $pipes, $path);

    if (!is_resource($process)) {
        return false;
    }

    $stdout = stream_get_contents($pipes[1]);
    $stderr = stream_get_contents($pipes[2]);

    fclose($pipes[1]);
    fclose($pipes[2]);

    $return_value = proc_close($process);

    if ($return_value !== 0) {
        return false;
    }

    return trim($stdout);
}
?>

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP class that manages subprocess execution using proc_open, handling input/output through pipes, with support for timeouts and temporary files.

Class Description: The DefaultPhpProcess class provides functionality to execute subprocesses in PHP using proc_open, managing standard input/output/error streams through pipes. It supports timeout handling, environment variable configuration, and temporary file usage for large inputs.

Attributes:
- tempFile: [string|null] - Path to temporary file used for storing input when needed
- stdin: [string|null] - Standard input content for the subprocess
- env: [array|null] - Environment variables to pass to the subprocess
- timeout: [int|null] - Maximum execution time in seconds before terminating the subprocess

Methods:
- runJob(string $job, array $settings = []): array - Executes a job with optional settings, returns output
  Input: 
    - $job: [string] - The input content for the subprocess
    - $settings: [array] - Additional execution settings
  Output: [array] - Associative array containing 'stdout' and 'stderr' output

- getHandles(): array - Returns additional stream handles for the subprocess
  Output: [array] - Array of stream handles

- runProcess(string $job, array $settings): array - Internal method to execute the subprocess
  Input:
    - $job: [string] - The input content
    - $settings: [array] - Execution settings
  Output: [array] - Associative array containing 'stdout' and 'stderr'

- process(resource $pipe, string $job): void - Writes job content to the input pipe
  Input:
    - $pipe: [resource] - The input pipe resource
    - $job: [string] - Content to write

- cleanup(): void - Cleans up temporary resources (files)
  
- useTemporaryFile(): bool - Determines whether to use temporary files for input
  Output: [bool] - True if temporary files should be used
matched_results:
<?php

class DefaultPhpProcess {
    private $tempFile = null;
    private $stdin = null;
    private $env = null;
    private $timeout = null;

    public function __construct($stdin = null, $env = null, $timeout = null) {
        $this->stdin = $stdin;
        $this->env = $env;
        $this->timeout = $timeout;
    }

    public function runJob(string $job, array $settings = []): array {
        return $this->runProcess($job, $settings);
    }

    private function getHandles(): array {
        return [
            ['pipe', 'r'],
            ['pipe', 'w'],
            ['pipe', 'w']
        ];
    }

    private function runProcess(string $job, array $settings): array {
        $descriptors = $this->getHandles();
        $process = proc_open($job, $descriptors, $pipes, null, $this->env);

        if (!is_resource($process)) {
            throw new \RuntimeException('Could not create process.');
        }

        if ($this->useTemporaryFile()) {
            $this->tempFile = tempnam(sys_get_temp_dir(), 'proc');
            file_put_contents($this->tempFile, $job);
            $this->process(fopen($this->tempFile, 'r'), $job);
        } else {
            $this->process($pipes[0], $job);
        }

        fclose($pipes[0]);

        $stdout = stream_get_contents($pipes[1]);
        fclose($pipes[1]);

        $stderr = stream_get_contents($pipes[2]);
        fclose($pipes[2]);

        $status = proc_close($process);

        $this->cleanup();

        return [
            'stdout' => $stdout,
            'stderr' => $stderr,
            'status' => $status
        ];
    }

    private function process($pipe, string $job): void {
        fwrite($pipe, $job);
        fclose($pipe);
    }

    private function cleanup(): void {
        if ($this->tempFile && file_exists($this->tempFile)) {
            unlink($this->tempFile);
        }
    }

    private function useTemporaryFile(): bool {
        return strlen($this->stdin) > 1024 * 1024;
    }
}

class DefaultPhpProcess
{
    private $tempFile = null;
    private $stdin = null;
    private $env = null;
    private $timeout = null;

    public function __construct($stdin = null, $env = null, $timeout = null)
    {
        $this->stdin = $stdin;
        $this->env = $env;
        $this->timeout = $timeout;
    }

    public function runJob(string $job, array $settings = []): array
    {
        return $this->runProcess($job, $settings);
    }

    private function getHandles(): array
    {
        return [
            ['pipe', 'r'],
            ['pipe', 'w'],
            ['pipe', 'w']
        ];
    }

    private function runProcess(string $job, array $settings): array
    {
        $descriptors = $this->getHandles();
        $process = proc_open($job, $descriptors, $pipes, null, $this->env);

        if (!is_resource($process)) {
            throw new Exception("Unable to start process.");
        }

        if ($this->useTemporaryFile()) {
            $this->process($pipes[0], $job);
        } else {
            fwrite($pipes[0], $job);
        }
        fclose($pipes[0]);

        $stdout = stream_get_contents($pipes[1]);
        fclose($pipes[1]);

        $stderr = stream_get_contents($pipes[2]);
        fclose($pipes[2]);

        $status = proc_close($process);

        if ($this->timeout !== null && $status === -1) {
            throw new Exception("Process timed out.");
        }

        $this->cleanup();

        return ['stdout' => $stdout, 'stderr' => $stderr];
    }

    private function process(resource $pipe, string $job): void
    {
        if ($this->useTemporaryFile()) {
            $this->tempFile = tempnam(sys_get_temp_dir(), 'proc');
            file_put_contents($this->tempFile, $job);
            $file = fopen($this->tempFile, 'r');
            stream_copy_to_stream($file, $pipe);
            fclose($file);
        } else {
            fwrite($pipe, $job);
        }
    }

    private function cleanup(): void
    {
        if ($this->tempFile !== null && file_exists($this->tempFile)) {
            unlink($this->tempFile);
        }
    }

    private function useTemporaryFile(): bool
    {
        return strlen($this->stdin) > 1024 * 1024; // Use temp file for input larger than 1MB
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP class that implements HTTP client functionality using Symfony's HTTP client components to handle HTTP requests and responses.

Class Description: The `HttpClientKernel` class is a Symfony HTTP client implementation that handles HTTP requests by sending them to a server and processing the responses. It supports various request methods, headers, cookies, and body content (including form data and file uploads).

Attributes:
- client: [HttpClientInterface] - The Symfony HTTP client instance used to send requests

Methods:
- __construct([HttpClientInterface $client = null]) -> [void] - Initializes the HTTP client. If no client is provided, creates a new instance. Requires Symfony HTTP client component.
- handle([Request $request], [int $type = HttpKernelInterface::MAIN_REQUEST], [bool $catch = true]) -> [Response] - Processes an HTTP request, sends it using the client, and returns the response. Handles headers, cookies, and request body.
- getBody([Request $request]) -> [AbstractPart|null] - Prepares the request body content. Returns null for GET/HEAD requests, TextPart for raw content, or FormDataPart for form data including files.
- getHeaders([Request $request]) -> [array] - Prepares request headers including cookies from the request object. Returns an array of headers.

<?php

use Symfony\Component\HttpClient\HttpClient;
use Symfony\Component\HttpClient\HttpClientInterface;
use Symfony\Component\HttpFoundation\Request;
use Symfony\Component\HttpFoundation\Response;
use Symfony\Component\Mime\Part\AbstractPart;
use Symfony\Component\Mime\Part\TextPart;
use Symfony\Component\Mime\Part\FormDataPart;
use Symfony\Component\HttpKernel\HttpKernelInterface;

class HttpClientKernel implements HttpKernelInterface
{
    private HttpClientInterface $client;

    public function __construct(HttpClientInterface $client = null)
    {
        $this->client = $client ?? HttpClient::create();
    }

    public function handle(Request $request, int $type = HttpKernelInterface::MAIN_REQUEST, bool $catch = true): Response
    {
        $url = $request->getUri();
        $method = $request->getMethod();
        $headers = $this->getHeaders($request);
        $body = $this->getBody($request);

        $options = [
            'headers' => $headers,
            'body' => $body ? $body->bodyToString() : null,
        ];

        $response = $this->client->request($method, $url, $options);

        return new Response($response->getContent(), $response->getStatusCode(), $response->getHeaders());
    }

    private function getBody(Request $request): ?AbstractPart
    {
        if (in_array($request->getMethod(), ['GET', 'HEAD'])) {
            return null;
        }

        if ($request->getContentType() === 'form') {
            return new FormDataPart($request->request->all());
        }

        return new TextPart($request->getContent());
    }

    private function getHeaders(Request $request): array
    {
        $headers = [];
        foreach ($request->headers->all() as $key => $values) {
            $headers[$key] = implode(', ', $values);
        }

        $cookies = $request->cookies->all();
        if (!empty($cookies)) {
            $headers['Cookie'] = http_build_query($cookies, '', '; ');
        }

        return $headers;
    }
}

namespace App\Http;

use Symfony\Component\HttpClient\HttpClient;
use Symfony\Component\HttpClient\HttpClientInterface;
use Symfony\Component\HttpKernel\HttpKernelInterface;
use Symfony\Component\HttpFoundation\Request;
use Symfony\Component\HttpFoundation\Response;
use Symfony\Component\Mime\Part\AbstractPart;
use Symfony\Component\Mime\Part\TextPart;
use Symfony\Component\Mime\Part\FormDataPart;

class HttpClientKernel implements HttpKernelInterface
{
    private $client;

    public function __construct(HttpClientInterface $client = null)
    {
        $this->client = $client ?: HttpClient::create();
    }

    public function handle(Request $request, int $type = HttpKernelInterface::MAIN_REQUEST, bool $catch = true): Response
    {
        $method = $request->getMethod();
        $url = $request->getUri();
        $headers = $this->getHeaders($request);
        $body = $this->getBody($request);

        $options = [
            'headers' => $headers,
            'body' => $body,
        ];

        $response = $this->client->request($method, $url, $options);

        return new Response(
            $response->getContent(),
            $response->getStatusCode(),
            $response->getHeaders(false)
        );
    }

    private function getBody(Request $request): ?AbstractPart
    {
        $method = $request->getMethod();

        if (in_array($method, ['GET', 'HEAD'])) {
            return null;
        }

        $content = $request->getContent();
        $files = $request->files->all();
        $formData = $request->request->all();

        if (!empty($files) || !empty($formData)) {
            return new FormDataPart(array_merge($formData, $files));
        }

        return new TextPart($content);
    }

    private function getHeaders(Request $request): array
    {
        $headers = [];
        foreach ($request->headers->all() as $name => $values) {
            $headers[$name] = implode(', ', $values);
        }

        $cookies = $request->cookies->all();
        if (!empty($cookies)) {
            $headers['Cookie'] = http_build_query($cookies, '', '; ');
        }

        return $headers;
    }
}

use Symfony\Component\HttpClient\HttpClient;
use Symfony\Contracts\HttpClient\HttpClientInterface;
use Symfony\Component\HttpFoundation\Request;
use Symfony\Component\HttpFoundation\Response;
use Symfony\Component\Mime\Part\AbstractPart;
use Symfony\Component\Mime\Part\TextPart;
use Symfony\Component\Mime\Part\FormDataPart;
use Symfony\Component\HttpKernel\HttpKernelInterface;

class HttpClientKernel implements HttpKernelInterface
{
    private HttpClientInterface $client;

    public function __construct(HttpClientInterface $client = null)
    {
        $this->client = $client ?? HttpClient::create();
    }

    public function handle(Request $request, int $type = HttpKernelInterface::MAIN_REQUEST, bool $catch = true): Response
    {
        $method = $request->getMethod();
        $url = $request->getUri();
        $headers = $this->getHeaders($request);
        $body = $this->getBody($request);

        $options = [
            'headers' => $headers,
            'body' => $body ? $body->bodyToIterable() : null,
        ];

        $httpResponse = $this->client->request($method, $url, $options);

        return new Response(
            $httpResponse->getContent(),
            $httpResponse->getStatusCode(),
            $httpResponse->getHeaders(false)
        );
    }

    private function getBody(Request $request): ?AbstractPart
    {
        if (in_array($request->getMethod(), ['GET', 'HEAD'])) {
            return null;
        }

        if ($request->request->count() > 0 || $request->files->count() > 0) {
            $formData = array_merge($request->request->all(), $request->files->all());
            return new FormDataPart($formData);
        }

        return new TextPart($request->getContent());
    }

    private function getHeaders(Request $request): array
    {
        $headers = [];
        foreach ($request->headers->all() as $name => $values) {
            foreach ($values as $value) {
                $headers[] = "$name: $value";
            }
        }

        foreach ($request->cookies->all() as $name => $value) {
            $headers[] = "Cookie: $name=$value";
        }

        return $headers;
    }
}

use Symfony\Component\HttpClient\HttpClient;
use Symfony\Component\HttpClient\HttpClientInterface;
use Symfony\Component\HttpFoundation\Request;
use Symfony\Component\HttpFoundation\Response;
use Symfony\Component\Mime\Part\AbstractPart;
use Symfony\Component\Mime\Part\TextPart;
use Symfony\Component\Mime\Part\FormDataPart;
use Symfony\Component\HttpKernel\HttpKernelInterface;

class HttpClientKernel implements HttpKernelInterface
{
    private $client;

    public function __construct(HttpClientInterface $client = null)
    {
        $this->client = $client ?: HttpClient::create();
    }

    public function handle(Request $request, int $type = HttpKernelInterface::MAIN_REQUEST, bool $catch = true): Response
    {
        $method = $request->getMethod();
        $url = $request->getUri();
        $headers = $this->getHeaders($request);
        $body = $this->getBody($request);

        $options = [
            'headers' => $headers,
            'body' => $body ? $body->toString() : null,
        ];

        $response = $this->client->request($method, $url, $options);

        return new Response(
            $response->getContent(),
            $response->getStatusCode(),
            $response->getHeaders(false)
        );
    }

    private function getBody(Request $request): ?AbstractPart
    {
        $method = $request->getMethod();
        if (in_array($method, ['GET', 'HEAD'])) {
            return null;
        }

        $content = $request->getContent();
        if ($request->headers->get('Content-Type') === 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded') {
            return new TextPart($content);
        }

        $formData = [];
        foreach ($request->request->all() as $name => $value) {
            $formData[$name] = $value;
        }

        foreach ($request->files->all() as $name => $file) {
            $formData[$name] = $file->getContent();
        }

        return new FormDataPart($formData);
    }

    private function getHeaders(Request $request): array
    {
        $headers = [];
        foreach ($request->headers->all() as $name => $values) {
            $headers[$name] = implode(', ', $values);
        }

        foreach ($request->cookies->all() as $name => $value) {
            $headers['Cookie'] = $name . '=' . $value;
        }

        return $headers;
    }
}

class HttpClientKernel implements HttpKernelInterface
{
    private $client;

    public function __construct(HttpClientInterface $client = null)
    {
        $this->client = $client ?? HttpClient::create();
    }

    public function handle(Request $request, int $type = HttpKernelInterface::MAIN_REQUEST, bool $catch = true): Response
    {
        $method = $request->getMethod();
        $url = $request->getUri();
        $headers = $this->getHeaders($request);
        $body = $this->getBody($request);

        $options = [
            'headers' => $headers,
            'body' => $body ? $body->toString() : null,
        ];

        $response = $this->client->request($method, $url, $options);

        return new Response(
            $response->getContent(),
            $response->getStatusCode(),
            $response->getHeaders(false)
        );
    }

    private function getBody(Request $request): ?AbstractPart
    {
        if (in_array($request->getMethod(), ['GET', 'HEAD'])) {
            return null;
        }

        if ($request->headers->get('Content-Type') === 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded') {
            return new TextPart($request->getContent());
        }

        if ($request->headers->get('Content-Type') === 'multipart/form-data') {
            return new FormDataPart($request->request->all());
        }

        return new TextPart($request->getContent());
    }

    private function getHeaders(Request $request): array
    {
        $headers = [];
        foreach ($request->headers->all() as $name => $values) {
            $headers[$name] = implode(', ', $values);
        }

        $cookies = [];
        foreach ($request->cookies->all() as $name => $value) {
            $cookies[] = sprintf('%s=%s', $name, $value);
        }

        if ($cookies) {
            $headers['Cookie'] = implode('; ', $cookies);
        }

        return $headers;
    }
}
