Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP class that handles HTTP requests to the OpenAI API using cURL, with support for different content types, streaming, and proxy configuration.

Class Description: The OpenAi class is designed to interact with OpenAI's API by sending HTTP requests. It manages API keys, content types, headers, and request configurations. The class supports both JSON and multipart/form-data content types, allows for request streaming, and can be configured to use a proxy.

Attributes:

engine: string - The default OpenAI engine to use (default: "davinci")
model: string - The default model for completions (default: "text-davinci-002")
chatModel: string - The default model for chat completions (default: "gpt-3.5-turbo")
assistantsBetaVersion: string - The version for assistants API (default: "v1")
headers: array - Array of HTTP headers to be sent with requests
contentTypes: array - Mapping of content types to their header strings
timeout: int - cURL timeout in seconds (default: 0)
stream_method: object - Callback method for streaming responses
customUrl: string - Custom base URL to override the default OpenAI API URL
proxy: string - Proxy server address if needed
curlInfo: array - Information about the last cURL request

Methods:

__construct: __construct(string $OPENAI_API_KEY) -> void - Initializes the class with the OpenAI API key and sets default headers
sendRequest: sendRequest(string $url, string $method, array $opts = []) -> bool|string - Sends an HTTP request to the specified URL with given method and options
baseUrl: baseUrl(string &$url) -> void - Modifies the base URL if a custom URL is set

<?php

class OpenAi {
    private $engine = "davinci";
    private $model = "text-davinci-002";
    private $chatModel = "gpt-3.5-turbo";
    private $assistantsBetaVersion = "v1";
    private $headers = [];
    private $contentTypes = [
        'json' => 'application/json',
        'multipart' => 'multipart/form-data'
    ];
    private $timeout = 0;
    private $stream_method = null;
    private $customUrl = '';
    private $proxy = '';
    private $curlInfo = [];

    public function __construct(string $OPENAI_API_KEY) {
        $this->headers = [
            "Authorization: Bearer $OPENAI_API_KEY",
            "Content-Type: application/json"
        ];
    }

    public function sendRequest(string $url, string $method, array $opts = []) {
        $this->baseUrl($url);
        $ch = curl_init();

        $options = [
            CURLOPT_URL => $url,
            CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
            CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => $this->timeout,
            CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => $this->headers,
            CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => strtoupper($method)
        ];

        if (!empty($opts['data'])) {
            if ($this->headers['Content-Type'] === $this->contentTypes['json']) {
                $options[CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS] = json_encode($opts['data']);
            } else {
                $options[CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS] = $opts['data'];
            }
        }

        if (!empty($this->proxy)) {
            $options[CURLOPT_PROXY] = $this->proxy;
        }

        if (!empty($this->stream_method)) {
            $options[CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION] = $this->stream_method;
        }

        curl_setopt_array($ch, $options);
        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        $this->curlInfo = curl_getinfo($ch);

        if (curl_errno($ch)) {
            $response = false;
        }

        curl_close($ch);
        return $response;
    }

    private function baseUrl(string &$url) {
        if (!empty($this->customUrl)) {
            $url = $this->customUrl . parse_url($url, PHP_URL_PATH);
        }
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP class for making HTTP requests using cURL with support for various HTTP methods, streaming, authentication, and proxy configuration.

Class Description: The RequestCore class provides a comprehensive wrapper around PHP's cURL functions to simplify HTTP requests. It supports GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, and HEAD methods, handles authentication, manages request/response headers and bodies, supports streaming for large files, and includes proxy configuration.

Attributes:
- request_url: string - The URL to send the request to
- request_headers: array - Associative array of request headers
- request_body: string - The request body content
- response: string - The complete response from the server
- response_headers: array - Parsed response headers
- response_body: string - The response body content
- response_code: int - HTTP response status code
- response_info: array - Additional cURL response information
- curl_handle: resource - The cURL handle resource
- method: string - HTTP method (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, HEAD)
- proxy: array|null - Proxy configuration details
- username: string|null - Authentication username
- password: string|null - Authentication password
- curlopts: array|null - Additional cURL options
- debug_mode: bool - Whether to enable debug mode
- request_class: string - Class name for request objects
- response_class: string - Class name for response objects
- useragent: string - User agent string
- read_file: string|null - File path for reading data
- read_stream: resource|null - Stream resource for reading data
- read_stream_size: int|null - Size of read stream
- read_stream_read: int - Bytes read from stream
- write_file: string|null - File path for writing data
- write_stream: resource|null - Stream resource for writing data
- seek_position: int|null - Position to seek in read stream
- cacert_location: mixed - CA certificate location
- ssl_verification: bool - Whether to verify SSL
- registered_streaming_read_callback: callable|null - Callback for streaming read
- registered_streaming_write_callback: callable|null - Callback for streaming write

Methods:
- __construct(string|null $url, array|null $proxy, array|null $helpers) -> self - Initialize the request object
- __destruct() -> self - Clean up resources
- set_credentials(string $user, string $pass) -> self - Set authentication credentials
- add_header(string $key, string $value) -> self - Add a request header
- remove_header(string $key) -> self - Remove a request header
- set_method(string $method) -> self - Set the HTTP method
- set_useragent(string $ua) -> self - Set the user agent
- set_body(string $body) -> self - Set the request body
- set_request_url(string $url) -> self - Set the request URL
- set_curlopts(array $curlopts) -> self - Set additional cURL options
- set_read_stream_size(int $size) -> self - Set read stream size
- set_read_stream(resource $resource, int|null $size) -> self - Set read stream resource
- set_read_file(string $location) -> self - Set read file location
- set_write_stream(resource $resource) -> self - Set write stream resource
- set_write_file(string $location) -> self - Set write file location
- set_proxy(string $proxy) -> self - Configure proxy settings
- set_seek_position(int|null $position) -> self - Set seek position for read stream
- register_streaming_read_callback(callable $callback) -> self - Register read callback
- register_streaming_write_callback(callable $callback) -> self - Register write callback
- streaming_read_callback(resource $curl_handle, resource $file_handle, int $length) -> string - Handle streaming read
- streaming_write_callback(resource $curl_handle, string $data) -> int - Handle streaming write
- prep_request() -> resource - Prepare and return cURL handle
- process_response(resource|null $curl_handle, string|null $response) -> mixed - Process the response
- send_request(bool $parse = false) -> mixed - Send the request and get response
- get_response_header(string|null $header) -> mixed - Get response header(s)
- get_response_body() -> string - Get response body
- get_response_code() -> int - Get response status code

        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_HEADER, true);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, $this->useragent);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, $this->ssl_verification);
        if ($this->cacert_location) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_CAINFO, $this->cacert_location);
        }
        if ($this->username && $this->password) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_USERPWD, "{$this->username}:{$this->password}");
        }
        if ($this->proxy) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_PROXY, $this->proxy);
        }
        if ($this->method === 'POST') {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_POST, true);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $this->request_body);
        } elseif ($this->method === 'PUT') {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'PUT');
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $this->request_body);
        } elseif ($this->method === 'DELETE') {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'DELETE');
        } elseif ($this->method === 'HEAD') {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOBODY, true);
        }
        if ($this->request_headers) {
            $headers = [];
            foreach ($this->request_headers as $key => $value) {
                $headers[] = "{$key}: {$value}";
            }
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
        }
        if ($this->read_stream) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_UPLOAD, true);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_INFILE, $this->read_stream);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_INFILESIZE, $this->read_stream_size);
            if ($this->seek_position) {
                fseek($this->read_stream, $this->seek_position);
            }
        }
        if ($this->write_stream) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, [$this, 'streaming_write_callback']);
        }
        if ($this->curlopts) {
            curl_setopt_array($this->curl_handle, $this->curlopts);
        }
        return $this->curl_handle;
    }

    public function process_response($curl_handle = null, $response = null) {
        if ($curl_handle && $response) {
            $header_size = curl_getinfo($curl_handle, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
            $this->response_headers = explode("\r\n", substr($response, 0, $header_size));
            $this->response_body = substr($response, $header_size);
            $this->response_code = curl_getinfo($curl_handle, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
            $this->response_info = curl_getinfo($curl_handle);
        }
        return $this->response_body;
    }

    public function send_request($parse = false) {
        $curl_handle = $this->prep_request();
        $response = curl_exec($curl_handle);
        if ($response === false) {
            throw new Exception('cURL Error: ' . curl_error($curl_handle));
        }
        $this->response = $response;
        $this->process_response($curl_handle, $response);
        if ($parse) {
            return $this->process_response($curl_handle, $response);
        }
        return $response;
    }

    public function get_response_header($header = null) {
        if ($header) {
            foreach ($this->response_headers as $response_header) {
                if (stripos($response_header, $header) !== false) {
                    return trim(substr($response_header, strlen($header) + 1));
                }
            }
        }
        return $this->response_headers;
    }

    public function get_response_body() {
        return $this->response_body;
    }

    public function get_response_code() {
        return $this->response_code;

        return call_user_func($this->registered_streaming_write_callback, $curl_handle, $data);
    }

    public function prep_request() {
        $this->curl_handle = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, $this->request_url);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, $this->method);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, $this->useragent);
        if ($this->request_headers) {
            $headers = [];
            foreach ($this->request_headers as $key => $value) {
                $headers[] = "$key: $value";
            }
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
        }
        if ($this->request_body) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $this->request_body);
        }
        if ($this->username && $this->password) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_USERPWD, "$this->username:$this->password");
        }
        if ($this->proxy) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_PROXY, $this->proxy);
        }
        if ($this->read_stream) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_UPLOAD, true);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_INFILE, $this->read_stream);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_INFILESIZE, $this->read_stream_size);
        }
        if ($this->write_stream) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_FILE, $this->write_stream);
        }
        if ($this->seek_position !== null) {
            fseek($this->read_stream, $this->seek_position);
        }
        if ($this->ssl_verification) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, true);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, 2);
            if ($this->cacert_location) {
                curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_CAINFO, $this->cacert_location);
            }
        } else {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, false);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, 0);
        }
        if ($this->curlopts) {
            curl_setopt_array($this->curl_handle, $this->curlopts);
        }
        return $this->curl_handle;
    }

    public function process_response($curl_handle = null, $response = null) {
        if ($curl_handle === null) {
            $curl_handle = $this->curl_handle;
        }
        if ($response === null) {
            $response = curl_exec($curl_handle);
        }
        $this->response = $response;
        $this->response_code = curl_getinfo($curl_handle, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
        $this->response_info = curl_getinfo($curl_handle);
        $header_size = curl_getinfo($curl_handle, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
        $this->response_headers = substr($response, 0, $header_size);
        $this->response_body = substr($response, $header_size);
        return $response;
    }

    public function send_request($parse = false) {
        $this->prep_request();
        $response = curl_exec($this->curl_handle);
        if ($parse) {
            return $this->process_response($this->curl_handle, $response);
        }
        return $response;
    }

    public function get_response_header($header = null) {
        if ($header === null) {
            return $this->response_headers;
        }
        foreach (explode("\r\n", $this->response_headers) as $line) {
            if (stripos($line, $header) === 0) {
                return trim(substr($line, strlen($header) + 1));
            }
        }
        return null;
    }

    public function get_response_body() {
        return $this->response_body;
    }

    public function get_response_code() {
        return $this->response_code;

        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, $this->useragent);

        }

        if ($this->proxy) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_PROXY, $this->proxy);
        }

        if ($this->method === 'POST') {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_POST, true);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $this->request_body);
        } elseif ($this->method === 'PUT') {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'PUT');
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $this->request_body);
        } elseif ($this->method === 'DELETE') {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'DELETE');
        } elseif ($this->method === 'HEAD') {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOBODY, true);
        }

        if ($this->request_headers) {
            $headers = [];
            foreach ($this->request_headers as $key => $value) {
                $headers[] = "{$key}: {$value}";
            }
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
        }

        if ($this->read_stream) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_UPLOAD, true);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_INFILE, $this->read_stream);
            if ($this->read_stream_size) {
                curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_INFILESIZE, $this->read_stream_size);
            }
        }

        if ($this->write_stream) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, [$this, 'streaming_write_callback']);
        }

        if ($this->seek_position) {
            fseek($this->read_stream, $this->seek_position);
        }

        if ($this->cacert_location) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_CAINFO, $this->cacert_location);
        }

        if (!$this->ssl_verification) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, false);
        }

        if ($this->curlopts) {
            foreach ($this->curlopts as $key => $value) {
                curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, $key, $value);
            }
        }

        return $this->curl_handle;
    }

        if ($curl_handle && $response) {
            $header_size = curl_getinfo($curl_handle, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
            $this->response_headers = explode("\r\n", substr($response, 0, $header_size));
            $this->response_body = substr($response, $header_size);
            $this->response_code = curl_getinfo($curl_handle, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
            $this->response_info = curl_getinfo($curl_handle);
            $this->response = $response;
        }
        return $this->response;
    }

        $this->process_response($curl_handle, $response);
        if ($parse) {
            return $this->response_body;
        }
        return $this->response;
    }

        if ($header) {
            foreach ($this->response_headers as $hdr) {
                if (stripos($hdr, $header) !== false) {
                    return $hdr;
                }
            }
            return null;
        }
        return $this->response_headers;
    }

    public function get_response_body() {
        return $this->response_body;
    }

    public function get_response_code() {
        return $this->response_code;

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP class that provides HTTP client functionality using cURL for making GET and POST requests, with error handling and resource management.

Class Description: The HttpClient class encapsulates cURL functionality to perform HTTP requests. It includes methods for GET requests, POST requests, and POST requests with download capability. The class handles cURL initialization, option setting, execution, error checking, and resource cleanup.

Methods:

Method1: getCurl(string $url) -> mixed - Performs a GET request to the specified URL and returns the response data. Throws an exception if cURL is not enabled.

Method2: postDownloadCurl(string $url, mixed $data) -> array - Performs a POST request with the given data to the specified URL, returns the response as a decoded JSON array. Throws an exception if cURL is not enabled.

Method3: postCurl(string $url, mixed $data) -> array - Performs a POST request with the given data to the specified URL, decrypts the response using Faveo private key, and returns it as a decoded JSON array. Throws an exception if cURL is not enabled.

Note: All methods include error handling that returns error messages to the caller when exceptions occur. Each method follows proper cURL resource management by initializing, executing, and closing the cURL session.

<?php

class HttpClient {

    private function initCurl($url) {
        if (!function_exists('curl_init')) {
            throw new Exception('cURL is not enabled.');
        }
        $ch = curl_init($url);
        if ($ch === false) {
            throw new Exception('Failed to initialize cURL session.');
        }
        return $ch;
    }

    private function executeCurl($ch) {
        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        if ($response === false) {
            $error = curl_error($ch);
            curl_close($ch);
            throw new Exception('cURL error: ' . $error);
        }
        curl_close($ch);
        return $response;
    }

    public function getCurl($url) {
        $ch = $this->initCurl($url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        return $this->executeCurl($ch);
    }

    public function postDownloadCurl($url, $data) {
        $ch = $this->initCurl($url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
        $response = $this->executeCurl($ch);
        return json_decode($response, true);
    }

    public function postCurl($url, $data) {
        $ch = $this->initCurl($url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
        $response = $this->executeCurl($ch);
        $decryptedResponse = $this->decryptResponse($response);
        return json_decode($decryptedResponse, true);
    }

    private function decryptResponse($response) {
        // Assuming Faveo private key decryption logic is implemented here
        // This is a placeholder function
        return $response;
    }
}

        // Assuming the decryption logic is implemented here
        // For example, using OpenSSL with a private key
        $privateKey = "path/to/private/key.pem";
        $privateKeyResource = openssl_pkey_get_private(file_get_contents($privateKey));
        if ($privateKeyResource === false) {
            throw new Exception('Failed to get private key.');
        }
        $decrypted = '';
        if (!openssl_private_decrypt(base64_decode($response), $decrypted, $privateKeyResource)) {

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP class that implements HTTP client functionality using cURL for making API requests to Facebook's various domains, with support for handling authentication, error management, and request configuration.

Class Description: The BaseFacebook class provides core functionality for interacting with Facebook's APIs using cURL. It handles request construction, authentication, error handling, and includes utility methods for common operations. The class supports different Facebook domains and manages API credentials.

Attributes:

Attribute1: [array] - $CURL_OPTS - Default cURL options including timeout settings and user agent
Attribute2: [array] - $DROP_QUERY_PARAMS - Query parameters to be removed from requests
Attribute3: [array] - $DOMAIN_MAP - Mapping of Facebook API domains and their base URLs
Attribute4: [string] - $appId - Facebook application ID
Attribute5: [string] - $appSecret - Facebook application secret
Attribute6: [mixed] - $user - Current authenticated user
Attribute7: [mixed] - $signedRequest - Signed request data
Attribute8: [mixed] - $state - Application state
Attribute9: [string|null] - $accessToken - Current access token
Attribute10: [bool] - $fileUploadSupport - Flag for file upload support
Attribute11: [bool] - $trustForwarded - Flag for trusting forwarded headers

Methods:

Method1: [makeRequest]($url, $params, $ch=null) -> [mixed] - Makes an HTTP request using cURL with the specified URL and parameters. Handles errors and SSL certificate verification.
Method2: [_oauthRequest]($url, $params) -> [mixed] - Makes an OAuth-authenticated request by adding access token and app secret proof to parameters before making the request.
Method3: [getAppSecretProof]($access_token) -> [string] - Generates an app secret proof using HMAC-SHA256 for the given access token.
Method4: [errorLog]($msg) -> [void] - Logs error messages, with special handling for CLI environments.

<?php

class BaseFacebook {
    protected $CURL_OPTS = [
        CURLOPT_CONNECTTIMEOUT => 10,
        CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
        CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 60,
        CURLOPT_USERAGENT => 'facebook-php-3.2',
    ];

    protected $DROP_QUERY_PARAMS = [
        'session',
        'signed_request',
    ];

    protected $DOMAIN_MAP = [
        'api' => 'https://api.facebook.com/',
        'api_read' => 'https://api-read.facebook.com/',
        'graph' => 'https://graph.facebook.com/',
        'graph_video' => 'https://graph-video.facebook.com/',
        'www' => 'https://www.facebook.com/',
    ];

    protected $appId;
    protected $appSecret;
    protected $user;
    protected $signedRequest;
    protected $state;
    protected $accessToken;
    protected $fileUploadSupport = false;
    protected $trustForwarded = false;

    public function __construct($appId, $appSecret) {
        $this->appId = $appId;
        $this->appSecret = $appSecret;
    }

    protected function makeRequest($url, $params, $ch = null) {
        if (!$ch) {
            $ch = curl_init();
        }

        $opts = $this->CURL_OPTS;
        $opts[CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS] = http_build_query($params, null, '&');
        $opts[CURLOPT_URL] = $url;

        curl_setopt_array($ch, $opts);
        $result = curl_exec($ch);

        if (curl_errno($ch)) {
            $this->errorLog('cURL error: ' . curl_error($ch));
            curl_close($ch);
            return false;
        }

        curl_close($ch);
        return json_decode($result, true);
    }

    protected function _oauthRequest($url, $params) {
        $params['access_token'] = $this->accessToken;
        $params['appsecret_proof'] = $this->getAppSecretProof($this->accessToken);
        return $this->makeRequest($url, $params);
    }

    protected function getAppSecretProof($access_token) {
        return hash_hmac('sha256', $access_token, $this->appSecret);
    }

    protected function errorLog($msg) {
        if (php_sapi_name() == 'cli') {
            error_log($msg);
        } else {
            error_log($msg, 0);
        }
    }
}

        if (!$ch) {
            $ch = curl_init();
        }

        $opts = $this->CURL_OPTS;
        $opts[CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS] = http_build_query($params, null, '&');
        $opts[CURLOPT_URL] = $url;

        curl_setopt_array($ch, $opts);
        $result = curl_exec($ch);

        if ($result === false) {
            $e = new Exception(curl_error($ch), curl_errno($ch));
            curl_close($ch);
            throw $e;
        }

        curl_close($ch);
        return json_decode($result, true);
    }

    protected function _oauthRequest($url, $params) {
        $params['access_token'] = $this->accessToken;
        $params['appsecret_proof'] = $this->getAppSecretProof($this->accessToken);
        return $this->makeRequest($url, $params);
    }

    protected function getAppSecretProof($access_token) {
        return hash_hmac('sha256', $access_token, $this->appSecret);
    }

    protected function errorLog($msg) {
        if (php_sapi_name() == 'cli') {
            error_log($msg);
        } else {
            error_log($msg, 0);
        }
    }
}

    ];
    
    protected $DROP_QUERY_PARAMS = [
        'session',

    ];
    
    protected $DOMAIN_MAP = [
        'api' => 'https://api.facebook.com/',
        'api_read' => 'https://api-read.facebook.com/',
        'graph' => 'https://graph.facebook.com/',
        'graph_video' => 'https://graph-video.facebook.com/',
        'www' => 'https://www.facebook.com/',
    ];
    
    protected $appId;
    protected $appSecret;
    protected $user;
    protected $signedRequest;
    protected $state;
    protected $accessToken = null;
    protected $fileUploadSupport = false;
    protected $trustForwarded = false;

    public function __construct($appId, $appSecret) {
        $this->appId = $appId;
        $this->appSecret = $appSecret;
    }

    protected function makeRequest($url, $params, $ch = null) {
        if (!$ch) {
            $ch = curl_init();
        }

        $opts = $this->CURL_OPTS;
        $opts[CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS] = http_build_query($params, null, '&');
        $opts[CURLOPT_URL] = $url;

        curl_setopt_array($ch, $opts);
        $result = curl_exec($ch);

        if ($result === false) {
            $e = new Exception(curl_error($ch), curl_errno($ch));
            curl_close($ch);
            throw $e;
        }

        curl_close($ch);
        return json_decode($result, true);
    }

    protected function _oauthRequest($url, $params) {
        if (!isset($params['access_token'])) {
            $params['access_token'] = $this->accessToken;
        }

        $params['appsecret_proof'] = $this->getAppSecretProof($params['access_token']);
        return $this->makeRequest($url, $params);
    }

    protected function getAppSecretProof($access_token) {
        return hash_hmac('sha256', $access_token, $this->appSecret);
    }

    protected function errorLog($msg) {
        if (php_sapi_name() === 'cli') {
            error_log($msg);
        } else {
            error_log($msg, 0);
        }
    }
}

Methods:
- __construct([array $config]) -> [void] - Initializes the class with configuration parameters
- _curlPost([string $url], [mixed $params = false]) -> [mixed] - Executes a cURL POST request to the specified URL with given parameters and returns the response

Note: The _curlPost method is private as it's an internal implementation detail of the class. The method handles the full cURL lifecycle including initialization, option setting, execution, error handling (implied by timeout), and resource cleanup.

<?php

class Coinbase {
    private $config;

    public function __construct(array $config) {
        $this->config = $config;
    }

    private function _curlPost(string $url, $params = false) {
        $ch = curl_init($url);
        $headers = [
            'Content-Type: application/json',
            'Authorization: Bearer ' . $this->config['api_key']
        ];

        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, 30);

        if ($params) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, json_encode($params));
        }

        $response = curl_exec($ch);

        if (curl_errno($ch)) {
            $error_msg = curl_error($ch);
            curl_close($ch);
            throw new Exception('cURL error: ' . $error_msg);
        }

        curl_close($ch);
        return json_decode($response, true);
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Implement a PHP class that interacts with the Coinbase API to handle payment processing using cURL for HTTP requests.

Class Description: The Coinbase class implements the PaymentInterface and provides functionality to make POST requests to the Coinbase API. It handles API key authentication and request configuration.

Attributes:
- config: [array] - Stores the configuration settings including the Coinbase API key.

Methods:
- __construct($config): [void] - Initializes the class with the provided configuration.
  - Input: $config [array] - Configuration array containing API credentials
  - Output: None

- _curlPost($url, $params = false): [mixed] - Makes a POST request to the specified URL with optional parameters.
  - Input: 
    - $url [string] - The API endpoint URL
    - $params [mixed|false] - Optional request payload parameters
  - Output: [mixed] - The API response or false on failure
matched_results:
<?php

interface PaymentInterface {
    public function __construct($config);
    public function _curlPost($url, $params = false);
}

class Coinbase implements PaymentInterface {
    private $config;

    public function __construct($config) {
        $this->config = $config;
    }

    public function _curlPost($url, $params = false) {
        $ch = curl_init($url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
            'Content-Type: application/json',
            'Authorization: Bearer ' . $this->config['api_key']
        ]);

        if ($params) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, json_encode($params));
        }

        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        $httpCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);

        if ($response === false || $httpCode !== 200) {
            curl_close($ch);
            return false;
        }

        curl_close($ch);
        return json_decode($response, true);
    }
}

        if ($httpCode >= 200 && $httpCode < 300) {

Task Description: Implement a class for interacting with a pretreatment API service that handles task processing and querying, using HTTP requests with Guzzle client in PHP.

Class Description: The Pretreat class provides functionality to submit tasks for processing and query their status through an API service. It handles request signing, parameter preparation, and response processing.

Attributes:

Attribute1: Config $config - Configuration object containing service settings like timeout, service name, and endpoint URLs

Methods:

Method1: __construct(Config $config) -> void - Initializes the Pretreat instance with configuration. Throws an exception if processNotifyUrl is not configured.

Method2: process(array $tasks, array $optionalParams = []) -> array - Submits tasks for processing. Takes an array of tasks and optional parameters, returns the API response as an associative array.

Method3: query(array $taskIds, string $path) -> array|bool - Queries the status of tasks by their IDs. Returns an array of tasks if successful, or false on failure.

<?php

use GuzzleHttp\Client;
use GuzzleHttp\Exception\RequestException;

class Config {
    public $timeout;
    public $serviceName;
    public $endpointUrls;
    public $processNotifyUrl;

    public function __construct($timeout, $serviceName, $endpointUrls, $processNotifyUrl) {
        $this->timeout = $timeout;
        $this->serviceName = $serviceName;
        $this->endpointUrls = $endpointUrls;
        $this->processNotifyUrl = $processNotifyUrl;
    }
}

class Pretreat {
    private $config;
    private $client;

    public function __construct(Config $config) {
        if (empty($config->processNotifyUrl)) {
            throw new Exception('Process notify URL must be configured.');
        }
        $this->config = $config;
        $this->client = new Client(['timeout' => $config->timeout]);
    }

    public function process(array $tasks, array $optionalParams = []) {
        $url = $this->config->endpointUrls['process'];
        $params = array_merge(['tasks' => $tasks], $optionalParams);
        $params['notifyUrl'] = $this->config->processNotifyUrl;

        try {
            $response = $this->client->post($url, [
                'json' => $params
            ]);
            return json_decode($response->getBody(), true);
        } catch (RequestException $e) {
            return ['error' => $e->getMessage()];
        }
    }

    public function query(array $taskIds, string $path) {
        $url = $this->config->endpointUrls[$path];
        $params = ['taskIds' => $taskIds];

        try {
            $response = $this->client->get($url, [
                'query' => $params
            ]);
            return json_decode($response->getBody(), true);
        } catch (RequestException $e) {
            return false;
        }
    }
}

Task Description: Create a PHP function that downloads a file from a specified URL and saves it to a local file using cURL.

Function Description: The function `http_fetch` uses PHP's cURL library to make an HTTP request to a specified URL and writes the response directly to a local file. It includes custom headers (User-Agent and Referer) to mimic a browser request and handles the cURL session lifecycle properly.

Input:
- `$url` (string): The URL of the resource to download
- `$filename` (string): The local file path where the downloaded content should be saved

Output:
- The function does not explicitly return a value, but it writes the downloaded content to the specified file
- The cURL session information is captured in `$ret` but not returned (could be modified to return this if needed)
matched_results:
<?php
function http_fetch($url, $filename) {
    $ch = curl_init($url);
    $fp = fopen($filename, 'w+');
    
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FILE, $fp);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, true);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/58.0.3029.110 Safari/537.3');
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_REFERER, 'http://www.google.com/');
    
    $ret = curl_exec($ch);
    
    if(curl_errno($ch)) {
        fclose($fp);
        curl_close($ch);
        return false;
    }
    
    curl_close($ch);
    fclose($fp);
    
    return true;
}
?>

Instruction:
Task Description: Implement a PHP class for sending notifications through the Pushover.net API using cURL for HTTP requests.

Class Description: The Notifications_Pushover class implements push notification functionality through the Pushover.net service. It handles authentication, message formatting, and API communication to send notifications with different severity levels.

Attributes:
- token: string - The API token/key for Pushover.net authentication
- user: string - The user key for Pushover.net authentication
- priorities: static array - Mapping of priority levels to their string representations

Methods:
- __construct(string $token, string $user) -> void - Initializes the class with API credentials
- static getName() -> string - Returns the service name "pushover.net"
- static getParameters() -> array - Returns required configuration parameters for the service
- notify(string $message, string $severity = 'info', ?string $event = null) -> void - Sends a notification with the given message, severity level, and optional event title
matched_results:
<?php

class Notifications_Pushover {
    private $token;
    private $user;
    private static $priorities = [
        'info' => 0,
        'warning' => 1,
        'error' => 2,
        'emergency' => 2
    ];

    public function __construct(string $token, string $user) {
        $this->token = $token;
        $this->user = $user;
    }

    public static function getName(): string {
        return 'pushover.net';
    }

    public static function getParameters(): array {
        return ['token', 'user'];
    }

    public function notify(string $message, string $severity = 'info', ?string $event = null): void {
        $priority = self::$priorities[$severity] ?? 0;
        $title = $event ?? 'Notification';

        $postFields = [
            'token' => $this->token,
            'user' => $this->user,
            'message' => $message,
            'title' => $title,
            'priority' => $priority
        ];

        $ch = curl_init('https://api.pushover.net/1/messages.json');
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $postFields);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);

        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        curl_close($ch);

        if ($response === false) {
            throw new Exception('Failed to send notification');
        }
    }
}

class Notifications_Pushover {
    private $token;
    private $user;
    private static $priorities = [
        'lowest' => -2,
        'low' => -1,
        'normal' => 0,
        'high' => 1,
        'emergency' => 2
    ];

    public function __construct(string $token, string $user) {
        $this->token = $token;
        $this->user = $user;
    }

    public static function getName(): string {
        return "pushover.net";
    }

    public static function getParameters(): array {
        return ['token', 'user'];
    }

    public function notify(string $message, string $severity = 'info', ?string $event = null): void {
        $priority = self::$priorities[$severity] ?? self::$priorities['normal'];
        $postData = [
            'token' => $this->token,
            'user' => $this->user,
            'message' => $message,
            'priority' => $priority
        ];
        if ($event) {
            $postData['title'] = $event;
        }

        $ch = curl_init('https://api.pushover.net/1/messages.json');
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, 1);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, http_build_query($postData));
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_exec($ch);
        curl_close($ch);
    }
}

<?php

class Notifications_Pushover {
    private $token;
    private $user;
    private static $priorities = [
        'info' => 0,
        'warning' => 1,
        'error' => 2,
        'emergency' => 2
    ];

    public function __construct(string $token, string $user) {
        $this->token = $token;
        $this->user = $user;
    }

    public static function getName(): string {
        return 'pushover.net';
    }

    public static function getParameters(): array {
        return ['token', 'user'];
    }

    public function notify(string $message, string $severity = 'info', ?string $event = null): void {
        $priority = self::$priorities[$severity] ?? 0;
        $title = $event ?? 'Notification';

        $data = [
            'token' => $this->token,
            'user' => $this->user,
            'message' => $message,
            'title' => $title,
            'priority' => $priority
        ];

        $ch = curl_init('https://api.pushover.net/1/messages.json');
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, http_build_query($data));
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        curl_close($ch);

        if ($response === false) {
            throw new Exception('Failed to send notification');
        }
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: The task involves creating PHP functions to interact with a logistics tracking API (kuaidi100.com) to retrieve shipping company information and tracking data for a given tracking number.

Function Description: The code consists of three functions that work together to:
1. Identify the logistics company from a tracking number
2. Retrieve tracking details for the shipment
3. Generate random IP addresses for request headers

Input: 
- For get_company(): A string representing the tracking number ($text)
- For get_data(): Two strings - tracking number ($text) and company code ($com)
- For Rand_IP(): No input parameters

Output:
- get_company(): Returns a string representing the logistics company code
- get_data(): Returns a JSON string containing the tracking information
- Rand_IP(): Returns a string representing a randomly generated IP address

Methods:
1. get_company($text) -> string - Identifies the logistics company from a tracking number by making an HTTP request to kuaidi100.com's autocomplete API and extracting the company code from the response.
2. get_data($text, $com) -> string - Retrieves tracking details for a given tracking number and company code by making an HTTP request to kuaidi100.com's query API.
3. Rand_IP() -> string - Generates a random IP address to be used in request headers for bypassing potential IP-based restrictions.

Note: The functions use cURL for HTTP requests with specific headers and options, including SSL verification disabled, custom user agent, and random IP addresses in headers to mimic browser requests.

<?php

function get_company($text) {
    $url = "https://www.kuaidi100.com/autonumber/autoComNum?text=" . $text;
    $ch = curl_init();
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, false);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, false);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, array(
        "User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/58.0.3029.110 Safari/537.3",
        "CLIENT-IP: " . Rand_IP(),
        "X-FORWARDED-FOR: " . Rand_IP()
    ));
    $output = curl_exec($ch);
    curl_close($ch);
    $data = json_decode($output, true);
    if (isset($data['auto'][0]['comCode'])) {
        return $data['auto'][0]['comCode'];
    } else {
        return '';
    }
}

    curl_close($ch);
    return $output;
}

        "User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/58.0.3029.110 Safari/537.3",
        "X-Forwarded-For: " . Rand_IP()
    ));
    $response = curl_exec($ch);
    curl_close($ch);
    return $response;
}

function Rand_IP() {
    return rand(1, 255) . "." . rand(0, 255) . "." . rand(0, 255) . "." . rand(0, 255);
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP class that monitors the availability of a URL by periodically checking its HTTP response code until it meets the desired state (available or unavailable) within a specified timeout period.

Class Description: The URLChecker class provides functionality to wait for a URL to become available (returns HTTP 200) or unavailable (returns non-200) within a given timeout period, using cURL for HTTP requests with configurable polling intervals and connection timeouts.

Attributes:
- POLL_INTERVAL_MS: int - The interval in milliseconds between consecutive URL checks
- CONNECT_TIMEOUT_MS: int - The connection timeout in milliseconds for each HTTP request

Methods:
- waitUntilAvailable(int $timeout_in_ms, string $url) -> self - Waits until the specified URL returns HTTP 200 status code or throws TimeoutException if not achieved within timeout
- waitUntilUnavailable(int $timeout_in_ms, string $url) -> self - Waits until the specified URL returns non-200 status code or throws TimeoutException if not achieved within timeout
- getHTTPResponseCode(string $url) -> ?int - Private method that makes the actual HTTP request and returns the response code (null if request fails)
matched_results:
<?php

class URLChecker {
    private const POLL_INTERVAL_MS = 500;
    private const CONNECT_TIMEOUT_MS = 2000;

    public function waitUntilAvailable(int $timeout_in_ms, string $url): self {
        $start_time = microtime(true);
        while ((microtime(true) - $start_time) * 1000 < $timeout_in_ms) {
            $response_code = $this->getHTTPResponseCode($url);
            if ($response_code === 200) {
                return $this;
            }
            usleep(self::POLL_INTERVAL_MS * 1000);
        }
        throw new TimeoutException("URL did not become available within the specified timeout.");
    }

    public function waitUntilUnavailable(int $timeout_in_ms, string $url): self {
        $start_time = microtime(true);
        while ((microtime(true) - $start_time) * 1000 < $timeout_in_ms) {
            $response_code = $this->getHTTPResponseCode($url);
            if ($response_code !== 200) {
                return $this;
            }
            usleep(self::POLL_INTERVAL_MS * 1000);
        }
        throw new TimeoutException("URL did not become unavailable within the specified timeout.");
    }

    private function getHTTPResponseCode(string $url): ?int {
        $ch = curl_init($url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CONNECTTIMEOUT_MS, self::CONNECT_TIMEOUT_MS);
        curl_exec($ch);
        $response_code = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
        curl_close($ch);
        return $response_code ?: null;
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Implement a PHP class for interacting with Alipay's API to query fund transfer orders, including request signing and HTTP communication functionality.

Class Description: The AlipayService class provides methods to interact with Alipay's payment API, specifically for querying fund transfer orders. It handles request signing, parameter encoding, and HTTP communication using cURL.

Attributes:
- appId: string - The application ID provided by Alipay
- rsaPrivateKey: string - The RSA private key for request signing
- charset: string - The character encoding to use (default: 'utf-8')

Methods:
- __construct(string $appid, string $saPrivateKey) -> void - Initializes the service with Alipay app ID and private key
- doQuery(string $outBizBo='', string $orderId='') -> array - Queries a fund transfer order using either out business number or order ID
- generateSign(array $params, string $signType='RSA') -> string - Generates a signature for the request parameters
- sign(string $data, string $signType='RSA') -> string - Signs the given data using the configured private key
- checkEmpty(mixed $value) -> bool - Checks if a value is empty or null
- getSignContent(array $params) -> string - Prepares the parameter string for signing
- characet(string $data, string $targetCharset) -> string - Converts character encoding if needed
- curlPost(string $url='', mixed $postData='', array $options=[]) -> string - Executes a POST request using cURL
matched_results:
<?php

class AlipayService {
    private $appId;
    private $rsaPrivateKey;
    private $charset;

    public function __construct($appId, $rsaPrivateKey, $charset = 'utf-8') {
        $this->appId = $appId;
        $this->rsaPrivateKey = $rsaPrivateKey;
        $this->charset = $charset;
    }

    public function doQuery($outBizBo = '', $orderId = '') {
        $params = [
            'app_id' => $this->appId,
            'method' => 'alipay.fund.trans.order.query',
            'charset' => $this->charset,
            'sign_type' => 'RSA',
            'timestamp' => date('Y-m-d H:i:s'),
            'version' => '1.0',
            'biz_content' => json_encode([
                'out_biz_no' => $outBizBo,
                'order_id' => $orderId
            ])
        ];
        $params['sign'] = $this->generateSign($params);
        $response = $this->curlPost('https://openapi.alipay.com/gateway.do', $params);
        return json_decode($response, true);
    }

    private function generateSign($params, $signType = 'RSA') {
        return $this->sign($this->getSignContent($params), $signType);
    }

    private function sign($data, $signType = 'RSA') {
        $res = openssl_get_privatekey($this->rsaPrivateKey);
        openssl_sign($data, $sign, $res, OPENSSL_ALGO_SHA256);
        openssl_free_key($res);
        return base64_encode($sign);
    }

    private function checkEmpty($value) {
        return !isset($value) || trim($value) === '';
    }

    private function getSignContent($params) {
        ksort($params);
        $stringToBeSigned = "";
        foreach ($params as $k => $v) {
            if (!$this->checkEmpty($v) && "@" != substr($v, 0, 1)) {
                $stringToBeSigned .= "$k=$v&";
            }
        }
        return rtrim($stringToBeSigned, '&');
    }

    private function characet($data, $targetCharset) {
        if (!empty($data)) {
            $fileType = $this->charset;
            if (strcasecmp($fileType, $targetCharset) != 0) {
                $data = mb_convert_encoding($data, $targetCharset, $fileType);
            }
        }
        return $data;
    }

    private function curlPost($url = '', $postData = '', $options = []) {
        if (is_array($postData)) {

        $params = [
            'app_id' => $this->appId,

            'charset' => $this->charset,
            'sign_type' => 'RSA',

        ];
        $params['sign'] = $this->generateSign($params, 'RSA');
        $response = $this->curlPost('https://openapi.alipay.com/gateway.do', $params);
        return json_decode($response, true);
    }

    private function generateSign($params, $signType = 'RSA') {
        return $this->sign($this->getSignContent($params), $signType);
    }

    private function sign($data, $signType = 'RSA') {
        $res = openssl_get_privatekey($this->rsaPrivateKey);
        if ($res) {
            openssl_sign($data, $sign, $res);
            openssl_free_key($res);
        } else {
            throw new Exception('Invalid RSA private key');
        }
        return base64_encode($sign);
    }

    private function checkEmpty($value) {
        return empty($value);
    }

    private function getSignContent($params) {
        ksort($params);
        $stringToBeSigned = "";
        foreach ($params as $k => $v) {
            if (!$this->checkEmpty($v) && "@" != substr($v, 0, 1)) {
                $stringToBeSigned .= "&" . $k . "=" . $v;
            }
        }
        return trim($stringToBeSigned, "&");
    }

    private function characet($data, $targetCharset) {
        if (!empty($data)) {
            $fileType = $this->charset;
            if (strcasecmp($fileType, $targetCharset) != 0) {
                $data = mb_convert_encoding($data, $targetCharset, $fileType);
            }
        }
        return $data;
    }

    private function curlPost($url = '', $postData = '', $options = []) {
        if (is_array($postData)) {
            $postData = http_build_query($postData);
        }
        $ch = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, 1);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $postData);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        if (!empty($options)) {
            curl_setopt_array($ch, $options);
        }
        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        if (curl_errno($ch)) {
            throw new Exception(curl_error($ch), curl_errno($ch));
        }
        curl_close($ch);
        return $response;
    }
}

                'out_biz_no' => $outBizBo,
                'order_id' => $orderId
            ])
        ];
        $params['sign'] = $this->generateSign($params);
        $response = $this->curlPost('https://openapi.alipay.com/gateway.do', $params);
        return json_decode($response, true);
    }

    private function generateSign($params, $signType = 'RSA') {
        return $this->sign($this->getSignContent($params), $signType);
    }

    private function sign($data, $signType = 'RSA') {
        $res = "-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----\n" .
            wordwrap($this->rsaPrivateKey, 64, "\n", true) .
            "\n-----END RSA PRIVATE KEY-----";
        if ($signType == 'RSA2') {
            openssl_sign($data, $sign, $res, OPENSSL_ALGO_SHA256);
        } else {
            openssl_sign($data, $sign, $res);
        }
        return base64_encode($sign);
    }

    private function checkEmpty($value) {
        return empty($value);
    }

    private function getSignContent($params) {
        ksort($params);
        $stringToBeSigned = "";
        $i = 0;
        foreach ($params as $k => $v) {
            if ($this->checkEmpty($v) === false) {
                if ($i == 0) {
                    $stringToBeSigned .= "$k" . "=" . "$v";
                } else {
                    $stringToBeSigned .= "&" . "$k" . "=" . "$v";
                }
                $i++;
            }
        }
        return $stringToBeSigned;
    }

    private function characet($data, $targetCharset) {
        if (!empty($data)) {
            $fileType = $this->charset;
            if (strcasecmp($fileType, $targetCharset) != 0) {
                $data = mb_convert_encoding($data, $targetCharset, $fileType);
            }
        }
        return $data;
    }

    private function curlPost($url = '', $postData = '', $options = []) {
        if (is_array($postData)) {
            $postData = http_build_query($postData);
        }
        $ch = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, 1);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $postData);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        if (!empty($options)) {
            curl_setopt_array($ch, $options);
        }
        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        curl_close($ch);
        return $response;
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP function that performs HTTP requests using cURL with support for GET/POST methods, custom headers, cookies, and SSL configuration.

Function Description: The function should make HTTP requests to a specified URL with optional cookies and user agent. It should handle both HTTP and HTTPS protocols, with configurable SSL verification. The function should follow redirects (302 status) and return the response data or false on failure. Timeouts should be configurable for connection and request execution.

Input:
- $url: string - The target URL for the HTTP request
- $cookies: string (optional) - Cookie string to be sent with the request
- $useragent: string (optional) - User-Agent header value
- $method: string (optional) - HTTP method ('GET' or 'POST'), defaults to 'GET'

Output:
- Returns: mixed - The response data as string on success (HTTP 200), follows redirects automatically (HTTP 302), or returns false on failure
matched_results:
<?php
function httpRequest($url, $cookies = '', $useragent = '', $method = 'GET', $postFields = [], $headers = [], $sslVerify = true, $connectTimeout = 10, $timeout = 30) {
    $ch = curl_init();

    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, true);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CONNECTTIMEOUT, $connectTimeout);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, $timeout);

    if (!empty($cookies)) {
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_COOKIE, $cookies);
    }

    if (!empty($useragent)) {
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, $useragent);
    }

    if (!empty($headers)) {
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
    }

    if (strtoupper($method) === 'POST') {
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
        if (!empty($postFields)) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, http_build_query($postFields));
        }
    }

    if (parse_url($url, PHP_URL_SCHEME) === 'https') {
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, $sslVerify);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, $sslVerify ? 2 : 0);
    }

    $response = curl_exec($ch);
    $httpCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);

    curl_close($ch);

    if ($response === false || $httpCode !== 200) {
        return false;
    }

    return $response;
}
?>

<?php
function httpRequest($url, $cookies = '', $useragent = '', $method = 'GET', $postData = [], $headers = [], $sslVerify = true, $connectTimeout = 10, $timeout = 30) {
    $ch = curl_init();

    if ($method === 'POST') {
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, http_build_query($postData));
    }

    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, true);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CONNECTTIMEOUT, $connectTimeout);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, $timeout);

    if ($cookies) {
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_COOKIE, $cookies);
    }

    if ($useragent) {
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, $useragent);
    }

    if ($headers) {
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
    }

    if (parse_url($url, PHP_URL_SCHEME) === 'https') {
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, $sslVerify);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, $sslVerify ? 2 : 0);
    }

    $response = curl_exec($ch);
    $httpCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);

    curl_close($ch);

    if ($httpCode === 200) {
        return $response;
    } else {
        return false;
    }
}
?>

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP class that provides HTTP client functionality using cURL for making GET and POST requests to external APIs, with basic error handling and resource management.

Class Description: The ApiExceptAuthController class is designed to handle HTTP requests to external APIs using PHP's cURL library. It provides methods for making GET and POST requests with basic configuration options and error handling. The class is initialized with a Request object and maintains it as an instance variable.

Attributes:
- api_controller: [mixed] - Reserved for potential future use to reference an API controller instance
- request: [Illuminate\Http\Request] - The HTTP request object injected during instantiation

Methods:
- __construct(Request $request) -> [void] - Initializes the class with the given HTTP request object
- callGetApi(string $url) -> [string|bool] - Makes a GET request to the specified URL and returns the response or false on failure
- callPostApi(string $url, mixed $data) -> [string|bool] - Makes a POST request to the specified URL with the given data and returns the response or false on failure

<?php

use Illuminate\Http\Request;

class ApiExceptAuthController
{
    protected $api_controller;
    protected $request;

    public function __construct(Request $request)
    {
        $this->request = $request;
    }

    public function callGetApi(string $url)
    {
        $ch = curl_init();

        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);

        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        $error = curl_error($ch);

        curl_close($ch);

        if ($error) {
            return false;
        }

        return $response;
    }

    public function callPostApi(string $url, $data)
    {

        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, http_build_query($data));
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);

        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        $error = curl_error($ch);

        curl_close($ch);

        if ($error) {
            return false;
        }

        return $response;
    }
}

Task Description: Create a PHP function that makes an HTTP POST request to a specified API endpoint to fetch content using cURL, with appropriate headers and request parameters.

Function Description: The function `curl_pipigaoxiao` initiates a cURL session to send a POST request to the 'http://h5.ippzone.com/ppapi/share/fetch_content' endpoint. It sets necessary headers including Content-Type, Origin, and User-Agent, along with a Referer header. The function sends JSON-formatted POST data containing a post ID and type, then returns the response from the server.

Input: 
- `$id` (string|integer): The post ID to be included in the request payload

Output:
- `$data` (string): The raw HTTP response including headers and body from the API endpoint

<?php
function curl_pipigaoxiao($id) {
    $url = 'http://h5.ippzone.com/ppapi/share/fetch_content';
    $headers = [
        'Content-Type: application/json',
        'Origin: http://h5.ippzone.com',
        'User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/58.0.3029.110 Safari/537.3',
        'Referer: http://h5.ippzone.com/'
    ];
    $postData = json_encode([
        'pid' => $id,
        'type' => 1

    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $postData);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);

    $response = curl_exec($ch);
    curl_close($ch);

    return $response;
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP class that generates placeholder images by downloading them from a remote HTTP server using either cURL or file operations, with various customization options.

Class Description: The Image class provides functionality to generate placeholder images with customizable dimensions, categories, formats, and other visual properties. It handles the download process using either cURL or file operations depending on server capabilities.

Attributes:
- BASE_URL: string - Base URL for the placeholder image service
- FORMAT_JPG: string - Constant for JPG format
- FORMAT_JPEG: string - Constant for JPEG format  
- FORMAT_PNG: string - Constant for PNG format
- categories: array - Available image categories

Methods:
- image(
    string|null $dir = null,
    int $width = 640,
    int $height = 480,
    string|null $category = null,
    bool $fullPath = true,
    bool $randomize = true,
    string|null $word = null,
    bool $gray = false,
    string $format = 'png'
  ) -> string|false - Downloads and saves an image with specified parameters, returning the file path or false on failure
- imageUrl(
    int $width,
    int $height,
    string|null $category,
    bool $randomize,
    string|null $word,
    bool $gray,
    string $format
  ) -> string - Generates the URL for the placeholder image (assumed to exist based on reference code)

<?php

class Image
{
    const BASE_URL = 'https://placeholder.com/';
    const FORMAT_JPG = 'jpg';
    const FORMAT_JPEG = 'jpeg';
    const FORMAT_PNG = 'png';

    private $categories = ['nature', 'tech', 'people', 'animals', 'sports'];

    public function image($dir = null, $width = 640, $height = 480, $category = null, $fullPath = true, $randomize = true, $word = null, $gray = false, $format = 'png')
    {
        $url = $this->imageUrl($width, $height, $category, $randomize, $word, $gray, $format);
        $filename = $this->generateFilename($width, $height, $category, $randomize, $word, $gray, $format);
        $filepath = $dir ? rtrim($dir, '/') . '/' . $filename : $filename;

        if ($this->downloadImage($url, $filepath)) {
            return $fullPath ? realpath($filepath) : $filename;
        }

        return false;
    }

    private function imageUrl($width, $height, $category, $randomize, $word, $gray, $format)
    {
        $url = self::BASE_URL . "{$width}x{$height}";

        if ($category && in_array($category, $this->categories)) {
            $url .= "?category={$category}";
        }

        if ($randomize) {
            $url .= "&random=" . rand();
        }

        if ($word) {
            $url .= "&text={$word}";
        }

        if ($gray) {
            $url .= "&gray";
        }

        return $url . "&format={$format}";
    }

    private function generateFilename($width, $height, $category, $randomize, $word, $gray, $format)
    {
        $filename = "{$width}x{$height}";

        if ($category) {
            $filename .= "_{$category}";
        }

        if ($randomize) {
            $filename .= "_random";
        }

        if ($word) {
            $filename .= "_{$word}";
        }

        if ($gray) {
            $filename .= "_gray";
        }

        return $filename . ".{$format}";
    }

    private function downloadImage($url, $filepath)
    {
        if (function_exists('curl_version')) {
            return $this->downloadImageCurl($url, $filepath);
        } else {
            return $this->downloadImageFile($url, $filepath);
        }
    }

    private function downloadImageCurl($url, $filepath)
    {
        $ch = curl_init($url);
        $fp = fopen($filepath, 'wb');

        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FILE, $fp);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, 0);
        curl_exec($ch);
        curl_close($ch);
        fclose($fp);

        return file_exists($filepath);
    }

    private function downloadImageFile($url, $filepath)
    {
        $imageData = file_get_contents($url);
        if ($imageData !== false) {
            file_put_contents($filepath, $imageData);
            return file_exists($filepath);
        }

        return false;
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP class that fetches currency conversion rates from an external API and stores them in a repository.

Class Description: The FetchConversionRate class is responsible for retrieving currency conversion rates between a base currency and all other available currencies. It uses Guzzle HTTP client to make requests to an external currency API and stores the results in a conversion rate repository.

Attributes:
- baseCurrencyId: int - The ID of the base currency for which conversion rates will be fetched
- currencyRepository: CurrencyRepository - Repository for accessing currency data
- conversionRateRepository: ConversionRateRepository - Repository for storing conversion rates

Methods:
- __construct(int $baseCurrencyId) -> void - Constructor that initializes the base currency ID
- handle(CurrencyRepository $currencyRepository, ConversionRateRepository $conversionRateRepository) -> void - Main method that executes the conversion rate fetching process:
  - Retrieves all currencies from the repository
  - For each target currency, makes an API request to get the conversion rate
  - Stores or updates the conversion rate in the repository
  - Skips invalid currencies and handles API request failures gracefully
matched_results:
<?php

use GuzzleHttp\Client;
use GuzzleHttp\Exception\RequestException;

class FetchConversionRate
{
    private $baseCurrencyId;
    private $currencyRepository;
    private $conversionRateRepository;
    private $httpClient;

    public function __construct(int $baseCurrencyId)
    {
        $this->baseCurrencyId = $baseCurrencyId;
        $this->httpClient = new Client();
    }

    public function handle(CurrencyRepository $currencyRepository, ConversionRateRepository $conversionRateRepository): void
    {
        $this->currencyRepository = $currencyRepository;
        $this->conversionRateRepository = $conversionRateRepository;

        $baseCurrency = $this->currencyRepository->find($this->baseCurrencyId);
        if (!$baseCurrency) {
            throw new Exception("Base currency not found.");
        }

        $currencies = $this->currencyRepository->findAll();
        foreach ($currencies as $currency) {
            if ($currency->id === $this->baseCurrencyId) {
                continue;
            }

            try {
                $response = $this->httpClient->request('GET', 'https://api.exchangerate-api.com/v4/latest/' . $baseCurrency->code);
                $data = json_decode($response->getBody(), true);

Task Description: Create a function that retrieves the content of a specified URL using PHP's cURL library, with appropriate settings for handling redirects and mimicking a mobile user agent.

Function Description: The function uses PHP's cURL functions to make an HTTP request to the specified URL. It configures the cURL session to return the response as a string rather than outputting it directly, follows any redirects, and sets a mobile user agent string to mimic a mobile browser. The function then executes the request, closes the cURL session, and returns the response content.

Input: 
- $url (string): The URL from which to retrieve content

Output: 
- (string): The content retrieved from the specified URL, or false if the request fails

<?php
function fetchUrlContent($url) {
    $ch = curl_init();
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, true);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, 'Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 10_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/603.1.30 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/10.0 Mobile/14E304 Safari/602.1');
    $response = curl_exec($ch);
    if (curl_errno($ch)) {
        $response = false;
    }
    curl_close($ch);
    return $response;
}
?>

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP class that implements Alipay payment integration using cURL for HTTP communication with Alipay's API.

Class Description: The AlipayService class provides functionality to interact with Alipay's payment gateway. It handles payment request creation, signing, and communication with Alipay's API endpoints.

Attributes:
- appId: [string] - The application ID provided by Alipay
- notifyUrl: [string] - The URL where Alipay will send payment notifications
- charset: [string] - Character encoding (default: 'utf-8')
- rsaPrivateKey: [string] - The RSA private key for signing requests
- totalFee: [float] - The total payment amount
- outTradeNo: [string] - The merchant's unique order number
- orderName: [string] - Description of the order

Methods:
- __construct() -> [void] - Initializes the class with default charset
- setAppid(string $appid) -> [void] - Sets the Alipay application ID
- setNotifyUrl(string $notifyUrl) -> [void] - Sets the notification URL
- setRsaPrivateKey(string $saPrivateKey) -> [void] - Sets the RSA private key
- setTotalFee(float $payAmount) -> [void] - Sets the payment amount
- setOutTradeNo(string $outTradeNo) -> [void] - Sets the merchant order number
- setOrderName(string $orderName) -> [void] - Sets the order description
- doPay() -> [array] - Prepares and sends payment request to Alipay, returns response
- curlPost(string $url, mixed $postData, array $options) -> [string] - Executes cURL POST request to specified URL
- generateSign(array $params, string $signType) -> [string] - Generates signature for request parameters (implementation not shown in reference code)

<?php

class AlipayService
{
    private $appId;
    private $notifyUrl;
    private $charset = 'utf-8';
    private $rsaPrivateKey;
    private $totalFee;
    private $outTradeNo;
    private $orderName;

    public function __construct()
    {
        $this->charset = 'utf-8';
    }

    public function setAppid($appid)
    {
        $this->appId = $appid;
    }

    public function setNotifyUrl($notifyUrl)
    {
        $this->notifyUrl = $notifyUrl;
    }

    public function setRsaPrivateKey($saPrivateKey)
    {
        $this->rsaPrivateKey = $saPrivateKey;
    }

    public function setTotalFee($payAmount)
    {
        $this->totalFee = $payAmount;
    }

    public function setOutTradeNo($outTradeNo)
    {
        $this->outTradeNo = $outTradeNo;
    }

    public function setOrderName($orderName)
    {
        $this->orderName = $orderName;
    }

    public function doPay()
    {
        $requestParams = [
            'app_id' => $this->appId,
            'method' => 'alipay.trade.app.pay',
            'format' => 'JSON',
            'charset' => $this->charset,
            'sign_type' => 'RSA2',
            'timestamp' => date('Y-m-d H:i:s'),
            'version' => '1.0',
            'notify_url' => $this->notifyUrl,
            'biz_content' => json_encode([
                'total_amount' => $this->totalFee,
                'subject' => $this->orderName,
                'out_trade_no' => $this->outTradeNo,
                'product_code' => 'QUICK_MSECURITY_PAY'
            ])
        ];

        $requestParams['sign'] = $this->generateSign($requestParams, 'RSA2');

        $response = $this->curlPost('https://openapi.alipay.com/gateway.do', http_build_query($requestParams));
        return json_decode($response, true);
    }

    private function curlPost($url, $postData, $options = [])
    {
        $ch = curl_init();

        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, false);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, false);

        curl_close($ch);

        return $response;

    private function generateSign($params, $signType = "RSA")
    {
        ksort($params);
        $stringToBeSigned = "";
        foreach ($params as $k => $v) {
            if (!empty($v) && "@" != substr($v, 0, 1)) {
                $stringToBeSigned .= "&" . $k . "=" . $v;
            }
        }
        $stringToBeSigned = trim($stringToBeSigned, '&');
        $privateKey = "-----BEGIN PRIVATE KEY-----\n" .

        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, http_build_query($postData));
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        if (!empty($options)) {

        }
        $response = curl_exec($ch);

        $stringToBeSigned = '';
        foreach ($params as $k => $v) {

        $res = "-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----\n" .
            wordwrap($this->rsaPrivateKey, 64, "\n", true) .

        ($signType == 'RSA2') ? ($algo = OPENSSL_ALGO_SHA256) : ($algo = OPENSSL_ALGO_SHA1);
        openssl_sign($stringToBeSigned, $sign, $res, $algo);
        $sign = base64_encode($sign);
        return $sign;

            return true;
        }
        if ($value === null) {
            return true;
        }
        if (trim($value) === "") {
            return true;
        }
        return false;
    }

            openssl_sign($stringToBeSigned, $sign, $res, OPENSSL_ALGO_SHA1);
        }
        openssl_free_key($res);
        $sign = base64_encode($sign);

    }

    public function setOrderName($orderName)

    }

    public function doPay()
    {
        $requestParams = [
            'app_id' => $this->appId,
            'method' => 'alipay.trade.app.pay',
            'format' => 'JSON',
            'charset' => $this->charset,
            'sign_type' => 'RSA2',
            'timestamp' => date('Y-m-d H:i:s'),
            'version' => '1.0',
            'notify_url' => $this->notifyUrl,
            'biz_content' => json_encode([

                'out_trade_no' => $this->outTradeNo,
                'total_amount' => $this->totalFee,
                'product_code' => 'QUICK_MSECURITY_PAY'
            ])
        ];

        $requestParams['sign'] = $this->generateSign($requestParams, 'RSA2');

        $response = $this->curlPost('https://openapi.alipay.com/gateway.do', http_build_query($requestParams));
        return json_decode($response, true);
    }

    private function curlPost($url, $postData, $options = [])
    {
        $ch = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, 1);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $postData);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, false);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, false);

        if (!empty($options)) {
            curl_setopt_array($ch, $options);
        }

        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        if (curl_errno($ch)) {
            throw new Exception('Curl error: ' . curl_error($ch));
        }
        curl_close($ch);

        return $response;
    }

    private function generateSign($params, $signType = 'RSA2')
    {
        ksort($params);
        $stringToBeSigned = "";
        foreach ($params as $k => $v) {
            if (!empty($v) && "@" != substr($v, 0, 1)) {
                $stringToBeSigned .= "&" . $k . "=" . $v;
            }
        }
        $stringToBeSigned = trim($stringToBeSigned, '&');
        $res = "-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----\n" .
            wordwrap($this->rsaPrivateKey, 64, "\n", true) .
            "\n-----END RSA PRIVATE KEY-----";
        if ("RSA2" == $signType) {
            openssl_sign($stringToBeSigned, $sign, $res, OPENSSL_ALGO_SHA256);
        } else {
            openssl_sign($stringToBeSigned, $sign, $res);
        }
        $sign = base64_encode($sign);
        return $sign;
    }
}

    public function doPay()
    {

                'subject' => $this->orderName,

            ]),
        ];

        $response = $this->curlPost('https://openapi.alipay.com/gateway.do', http_build_query($requestParams));
        return json_decode($response, true);
    }

    private function curlPost($url, $postData, $options = [])
    {
        $ch = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, 1);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $postData);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, false);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, false);

        if (!empty($options)) {
