<?php

abstract class OAuth2Client
{
    protected $version = '2.0';
    protected $appKey;
    protected $appSecret;
    protected $responseType = 'code';
    protected $grantType = 'authorization_code';
    protected $callback;
    protected $authorize;
    protected $getRequestCodeURL;
    protected $getAccessTokenURL;
    protected $apiBase;
    protected $token = null;

    public function __construct($appKey, $appSecret, $callback, $authorize, $getRequestCodeURL, $getAccessTokenURL, $apiBase)
    {
        $this->appKey = $appKey;
        $this->appSecret = $appSecret;
        $this->callback = $callback;
        $this->authorize = $authorize;
        $this->getRequestCodeURL = $getRequestCodeURL;
        $this->getAccessTokenURL = $getAccessTokenURL;
        $this->apiBase = $apiBase;
    }

    protected function http($url, $params, $method = 'GET', $header = [], $multi = false)
    {
        $ch = curl_init();
        if ($method == 'GET') {
            $url .= '?' . http_build_query($params);
        } else {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
            if ($multi) {
                curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $params);
            } else {
                curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, http_build_query($params));
            }
        }
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        if (!empty($header)) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $header);
        }
        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        if (curl_errno($ch)) {
            throw new Exception('HTTP Request Error: ' . curl_error($ch));
        }
        curl_close($ch);
        return $response;
    }

    abstract public function getAuthorizationCode();
    abstract public function getAccessToken($code);
    abstract public function api($endpoint, $params = [], $method = 'GET');
}

<?php

abstract class OAuth2Client
{
    protected $version = '2.0';
    protected $appKey;
    protected $appSecret;
    protected $responseType = 'code';
    protected $grantType = 'authorization_code';
    protected $callback;
    protected $authorize;
    protected $getRequestCodeURL;
    protected $getAccessTokenURL;
    protected $apiBase;
    protected $token = null;

    public function __construct($appKey, $appSecret, $callback)
    {
        $this->appKey = $appKey;
        $this->appSecret = $appSecret;
        $this->callback = $callback;
    }

    protected function http($url, $params, $method = 'GET', $header = [], $multi = false)
    {
        $ch = curl_init();
        if ($method === 'GET') {
            $url = $url . '?' . http_build_query($params);
        }
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, false);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, false);

        if ($method === 'POST') {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
            if ($multi) {
                curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $params);
            } else {
                curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, http_build_query($params));
            }
        }

        if (!empty($header)) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $header);
        }

        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        $error = curl_error($ch);
        curl_close($ch);

        if ($error) {
            throw new Exception("HTTP request failed: $error");
        }

        return $response;
    }

    public function getAuthorizeURL()
    {
        $params = [
            'client_id' => $this->appKey,
            'redirect_uri' => $this->callback,
            'response_type' => $this->responseType,
        ];
        return $this->authorize . '?' . http_build_query($params);
    }

    public function getAccessToken($code)
    {
        $params = [
            'client_id' => $this->appKey,
            'client_secret' => $this->appSecret,
            'redirect_uri' => $this->callback,
            'grant_type' => $this->grantType,
            'code' => $code,
        ];
        $response = $this->http($this->getAccessTokenURL, $params, 'POST');
        $this->token = json_decode($response, true);
        return $this->token;
    }

    public function api($endpoint, $params = [], $method = 'GET', $header = [])
    {
        $url = $this->apiBase . $endpoint;
        if (!isset($params['access_token'])) {
            $params['access_token'] = $this->token['access_token'];
        }
        return $this->http($url, $params, $method, $header);
    }
}

    public function __construct($appKey, $appSecret, $callback, $authorize, $getRequestCodeURL, $getAccessTokenURL, $apiBase)
    {
        $this->appKey = $appKey;
        $this->appSecret = $appSecret;
        $this->callback = $callback;
        $this->authorize = $authorize;
        $this->getRequestCodeURL = $getRequestCodeURL;
        $this->getAccessTokenURL = $getAccessTokenURL;
        $this->apiBase = $apiBase;
    }

    protected function http($url, $params, $method = 'GET', $header = [], $multi = false)
    {
        $ch = curl_init();
        if ($method === 'GET') {
            $url .= '?' . http_build_query($params);
        } else {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
            if ($multi) {
                curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $params);
            } else {
                curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, http_build_query($params));
            }
        }
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        if (!empty($header)) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $header);
        }
        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        if (curl_errno($ch)) {
            throw new Exception('HTTP Request Error: ' . curl_error($ch));
        }
        curl_close($ch);
        return $response;
    }
}

Task Description: Create a PHP class that provides HTTP client functionality using Guzzle library, with error handling and testing capabilities.

Class Description: The `SupportedApps` class is an abstract base class that provides HTTP client functionality using Guzzle. It handles HTTP requests with configurable timeouts and methods, includes error handling for connection and server exceptions, and provides a testing method to verify API connectivity.

Attributes:
- jar: [bool] - Flag indicating whether to use cookies (not implemented in current code)
- method: [string] - Default HTTP method to use for requests (default: 'GET')
- error: [string|null] - Stores the last error message encountered during request execution

Methods:
- execute($url, array $attrs = [], $overridevars = null, $overridemethod = null) -> [ResponseInterface|null] - Executes an HTTP request to the specified URL with optional attributes, overriding variables and method. Returns the response or null on failure.
- appTest($url, array $attrs = []) -> [object] - Tests the connection to a specified URL, returning an object with status code, status message, and response body. Handles various HTTP status codes with appropriate messages.

<?php

use GuzzleHttp\Client;
use GuzzleHttp\Exception\RequestException;
use GuzzleHttp\Exception\ConnectException;
use GuzzleHttp\Exception\ServerException;
use Psr\Http\Message\ResponseInterface;

abstract class SupportedApps
{
    protected $jar = false;
    protected $method = 'GET';
    protected $error = null;

    protected function execute($url, array $attrs = [], $overridevars = null, $overridemethod = null)
    {
        $client = new Client();
        $method = $overridemethod ?? $this->method;
        $options = ['timeout' => 10];

        if (!empty($attrs)) {
            $options['json'] = $attrs;
        }

        try {
            $response = $client->request($method, $url, $options);
            return $response;
        } catch (ConnectException $e) {
            $this->error = 'Connection error: ' . $e->getMessage();
        } catch (ServerException $e) {
            $this->error = 'Server error: ' . $e->getMessage();
        } catch (RequestException $e) {
            $this->error = 'Request error: ' . $e->getMessage();
        }

        return null;
    }

    public function appTest($url, array $attrs = [])
    {
        $response = $this->execute($url, $attrs);
        $result = new \stdClass();
        
        if ($response) {
            $result->statusCode = $response->getStatusCode();
            $result->statusMessage = 'Success';
            $result->body = (string) $response->getBody();
        } else {
            $result->statusCode = 500;
            $result->statusMessage = $this->error ?? 'Unknown error';
            $result->body = null;
        }

        return $result;
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP class for interacting with Alipay's API to send red packets (digital cash gifts) with proper authentication and request handling.

Class Description: The AlipayService class encapsulates functionality for sending red packets through Alipay's payment platform. It handles request configuration, signature generation, and API communication while maintaining security through proper certificate and key management.

Attributes:
- appId: [string] - Alipay application ID
- alipayRootCertSn: [string] - Alipay root certificate serial number  
- appCertSn: [string] - Application certificate serial number
- notifyUrl: [string] - Callback URL for payment notifications
- charset: [string] - Character encoding (default: utf-8)
- rsaPrivateKey: [string] - RSA private key for signing requests
- totalFee: [float] - Payment amount
- outTradeNo: [string] - Merchant transaction number
- orderName: [string] - Order description
- userid: [string] - Recipient's Alipay user ID

Methods:
- __construct() -> [void] - Initializes the class with default charset
- setAppid(string $appid) -> [void] - Sets the Alipay application ID
- setAlipayRootCertSn(string $alipayRootCertSn) -> [void] - Sets root certificate serial number
- setAppCertSn(string $appCertSn) -> [void] - Sets application certificate serial number  
- setNotifyUrl(string $notifyUrl) -> [void] - Sets notification callback URL
- setRsaPrivateKey(string $saPrivateKey) -> [void] - Sets RSA private key
- setTotalFee(float $payAmount) -> [void] - Sets payment amount
- setOutTradeNo(string $outTradeNo) -> [void] - Sets merchant transaction number
- setOrderName(string $orderName) -> [void] - Sets order description
- setUserId(string $userid) -> [void] - Sets recipient's Alipay user ID
- sendRedPacket() -> [array] - Sends red packet request and returns response
- generateSign(array $params, string $signType) -> [string] - Generates request signature
- sign(string $data, string $signType) -> [string] - Creates cryptographic signature
- checkEmpty(mixed $value) -> [bool] - Checks if value is empty
- getSignContent(array $params) -> [string] - Prepares string for signing
- characet(string $data, string $targetCharset) -> [string] - Handles character encoding
- curlPost(string $url, mixed $postData, array $options) -> [string] - Executes cURL request to API

<?php

class AlipayService {
    private $appId;
    private $alipayRootCertSn;
    private $appCertSn;
    private $notifyUrl;
    private $charset = 'utf-8';
    private $rsaPrivateKey;
    private $totalFee;
    private $outTradeNo;
    private $orderName;
    private $userid;

    public function __construct() {
        $this->charset = 'utf-8';
    }

    public function setAppid($appid) {
        $this->appId = $appid;
    }

    public function setAlipayRootCertSn($alipayRootCertSn) {
        $this->alipayRootCertSn = $alipayRootCertSn;
    }

    public function setAppCertSn($appCertSn) {
        $this->appCertSn = $appCertSn;
    }

    public function setNotifyUrl($notifyUrl) {
        $this->notifyUrl = $notifyUrl;
    }

    public function setRsaPrivateKey($rsaPrivateKey) {
        $this->rsaPrivateKey = $rsaPrivateKey;
    }

    public function setTotalFee($payAmount) {
        $this->totalFee = $payAmount;
    }

    public function setOutTradeNo($outTradeNo) {
        $this->outTradeNo = $outTradeNo;
    }

    public function setOrderName($orderName) {
        $this->orderName = $orderName;
    }

    public function setUserId($userid) {
        $this->userid = $userid;
    }

    public function sendRedPacket() {
        $params = [
            'app_id' => $this->appId,
            'method' => 'alipay.fund.trans.uni.transfer',
            'format' => 'JSON',
            'charset' => $this->charset,
            'sign_type' => 'RSA2',
            'timestamp' => date('Y-m-d H:i:s'),
            'version' => '1.0',
            'notify_url' => $this->notifyUrl,
            'biz_content' => json_encode([
                'out_biz_no' => $this->outTradeNo,
                'trans_amount' => $this->totalFee,
                'product_code' => 'STD_RED_PACKET',
                'biz_scene' => 'DIRECT_TRANSFER',
                'order_title' => $this->orderName,
                'payee_info' => [
                    'identity' => $this->userid,
                    'identity_type' => 'ALIPAY_USER_ID'
                ]
            ])
        ];
        $params['sign'] = $this->generateSign($params, 'RSA2');
        $response = $this->curlPost('https://openapi.alipay.com/gateway.do', $params);
        return json_decode($response, true);
    }

    private function generateSign($params, $signType) {
        return $this->sign($this->getSignContent($params), $signType);
    }

    private function sign($data, $signType) {
        $res = "-----BEGIN PRIVATE KEY-----\n" .
               wordwrap($this->rsaPrivateKey, 64, "\n", true) .
               "\n-----END PRIVATE KEY-----";
        if ($signType == 'RSA2') {
            openssl_sign($data, $sign, $res, OPENSSL_ALGO_SHA256);
        } else {
            openssl_sign($data, $sign, $res, OPENSSL_ALGO_SHA1);
        }
        return base64_encode($sign);

                'payer_show_name' => $this->orderName,
                'payee_real_name' => '',
                'remark' => $this->orderName
            ])
        ];

        $params['sign'] = $this->generateSign($params, 'RSA2');
        $response = $this->curlPost('https://openapi.alipay.com/gateway.do', $params);

                $data = mb_convert_encoding($data, $targetCharset, $fileType);
            }
        }
        return $data;
    }

    private function curlPost($url, $postData, $options = []) {
        $ch = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);

        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, http_build_query($postData));

        if (!empty($options)) {
            curl_setopt_array($ch, $options);
        }

            ]),

            'app_cert_sn' => $this->appCertSn,
            'alipay_root_cert_sn' => $this->alipayRootCertSn
        ];

        $params['sign'] = $this->generateSign($params, 'RSA2');
        $url = 'https://openapi.alipay.com/gateway.do';
        $response = $this->curlPost($url, $params);
        return json_decode($response, true);
    }

    private function generateSign(array $params, string $signType) {
        $signContent = $this->getSignContent($params);
        return $this->sign($signContent, $signType);

        $res = openssl_get_privatekey($this->rsaPrivateKey);
        $signature = '';
        if ($signType === 'RSA2') {
            openssl_sign($data, $signature, $res, OPENSSL_ALGO_SHA256);
        } else {
            openssl_sign($data, $signature, $res);
        }
        openssl_free_key($res);
        return base64_encode($signature);
    }

        return $value === null || trim($value) === '';

    private function getSignContent(array $params) {
        ksort($params);
        $stringToBeSigned = '';
        foreach ($params as $key => $value) {
            if (!$this->checkEmpty($value) && substr($value, 0, 1) !== '@') {
                $stringToBeSigned .= "$key=$value&";
            }
        }
        return rtrim($stringToBeSigned, '&');
    }

    private function characet(string $data, string $targetCharset) {
        if (!empty($data) && $this->charset !== $targetCharset) {
            $data = mb_convert_encoding($data, $targetCharset, $this->charset);
        }
        return $data;
    }

    private function curlPost(string $url, $postData, array $options = []) {

        curl_close($ch);

Task Description: Create a PHP class that provides HTTP client functionality using cURL, supporting various HTTP methods, headers, cookies, proxies, and file uploads.

Class Description: The `requests` class is a static HTTP client implementation that handles HTTP requests through cURL. It supports GET, POST, and other HTTP methods, manages cookies, headers, user agents, proxies, and file uploads. The class maintains connection settings and request history.

Attributes:

VERSION: [string] - The version number of the requests class
ch: [resource|null] - The cURL handle resource
timeout: [int|array] - Timeout settings for the connection

cookies: [array] - Global cookies to be sent with requests
rawheaders: [array] - Request headers
domain_cookies: [array] - Domain-specific cookies
headers: [array] - Response headers
useragents: [array] - List of user agent strings
client_ips: [array] - List of client IP addresses for spoofing
proxies: [array] - List of proxy servers
raw: [string] - Raw response including headers
head: [string] - Response headers
content: [string] - Response body
text: [string] - Processed response text
info: [array] - cURL request information
history: [int] - HTTP redirect history status code

Methods:

init(): [void] -> [resource] - Initializes the cURL session with default settings
request($url, $method = 'GET', $fields = array(), $files = array(), $allow_redirects = true, $cert = NULL) -> [string|bool] - Executes an HTTP request to the specified URL with given parameters
_is_url($url) -> [bool] - Validates if the input string is a valid URL
get_cookies($domain = '') -> [array] - Retrieves cookies for a specific domain
get_response_headers($header) -> [array] - Parses response headers
get_response_cookies($header, $domain) -> [void] - Extracts cookies from response headers

<?php

class requests {
    const VERSION = '1.0.0';
    private static $ch = null;
    private static $timeout = 30;
    private static $encoding = null;
    private static $output_encoding = null;
    private static $cookies = [];
    private static $rawheaders = [];
    private static $domain_cookies = [];
    private static $headers = [];
    private static $useragents = [];
    private static $client_ips = [];
    private static $proxies = [];
    private static $raw = '';
    private static $head = '';
    private static $content = '';
    private static $text = '';
    private static $info = [];
    private static $history = 0;
    private static $status_code = 0;
    private static $error = '';

    private static function init() {
        if (self::$ch === null) {
            self::$ch = curl_init();
            curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
            curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, true);
            curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, self::$timeout);
            curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, true);
        }
        return self::$ch;
    }

    public static function request($url, $method = 'GET', $fields = [], $files = [], $allow_redirects = true, $cert = null) {
        if (!self::_is_url($url)) {
            self::$error = 'Invalid URL';
            return false;
        }

        self::init();
        curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
        curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, $method);
        curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, $allow_redirects);

        if (!empty($fields)) {
            curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, http_build_query($fields));
        }

        if (!empty($files)) {
            foreach ($files as $key => $file) {
                $fields[$key] = new CURLFile($file, self::get_mimetype($file), basename($file));
            }
            curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $fields);
        }

        if ($cert) {
            curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_CAINFO, $cert);
        }

        if (!empty(self::$rawheaders)) {
            curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, self::$rawheaders);
        }

        self::$raw = curl_exec(self::$ch);
        self::$info = curl_getinfo(self::$ch);
        self::$status_code = self::$info['http_code'];

        if (curl_errno(self::$ch)) {
            self::$error = curl_error(self::$ch);
            return false;
        }

        list(self::$head, self::$content) = self::split_header_body();
        self::$headers = self::get_response_headers(self::$head);
        self::get_response_cookies(self::$head, parse_url($url, PHP_URL_HOST));
        self::$history = self::get_history(self::$head);

        return self::$content;
    }

    private static function _is_url($url) {
        return filter_var($url, FILTER_VALIDATE_URL) !== false;
    }

    public static function get_cookies($domain = '') {
        if ($domain) {
            return self::$domain_cookies[$domain] ?? [];
        }
        return self::$cookies;
    }

    private static function get_response_headers($header) {
        $headers = [];
        $lines = explode("\r\n", $header);
        foreach ($lines as $line) {
            if (strpos($line, ': ') !== false) {
                list($key, $value) = explode(': ', $line, 2);
                $headers[$key] = $value;
            }
        }
        return $headers;
    }

    private static function get_response_cookies($header, $domain) {
        preg_match_all('/^Set-Cookie:\s*([^;]*)/mi', $header, $matches);
        foreach ($matches[1] as $cookie) {
            list($name, $value) = explode('=', $cookie, 2);
            self::$cookies[$name] = $value;
            self::$domain_cookies[$domain][$name] = $value;
        }
    }

    private static function split_header_body() {
        $header_size = curl_getinfo(self::$ch, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
        $header = substr(self::$raw, 0, $header_size);
        $body = substr(self::$raw, $header_size);
        return [$header, $body];
    }

    private static function get_history($header) {
        preg_match_all('/^Location:\s*(.*)$/mi', $header, $matches);
        return count($matches[1]);
    }

    private static function get_mimetype($filepath) {
        return mime_content_type($filepath);
    }
}

class requests {
    public static $VERSION = '1.0.0';
    private static $ch = null;
    private static $timeout = 30;
    private static $encoding = null;
    private static $output_encoding = null;
    private static $cookies = [];
    private static $rawheaders = [];
    private static $domain_cookies = [];
    private static $headers = [];
    private static $useragents = [];
    private static $client_ips = [];
    private static $proxies = [];
    private static $raw = '';
    private static $head = '';
    private static $content = '';
    private static $text = '';
    private static $info = [];
    private static $history = 0;
    private static $status_code = 0;
    private static $error = '';

    public static function init() {
        if (self::$ch === null) {
            self::$ch = curl_init();
            curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
            curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, true);
            curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, self::$timeout);
        }
        return self::$ch;
    }

    public static function request($url, $method = 'GET', $fields = [], $files = [], $allow_redirects = true, $cert = null) {
        self::init();
        curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
        curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, strtoupper($method));
        curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, self::$rawheaders);
        curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_COOKIE, self::format_cookies());

        if ($method === 'POST' && !empty($fields)) {
            curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, http_build_query($fields));
        }

        if (!empty($files)) {
            foreach ($files as $key => $file) {
                $fields[$key] = new CURLFile($file, self::get_mimetype($file), basename($file));
            }
            curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $fields);
        }

        if ($cert) {
            curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_SSLCERT, $cert);
        }

        if (!$allow_redirects) {
            curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, false);
        }

        self::$raw = curl_exec(self::$ch);
        self::$info = curl_getinfo(self::$ch);
        self::$status_code = self::$info['http_code'];
        self::$error = curl_error(self::$ch);

        list(self::$head, self::$content) = self::split_header_body();
        self::$headers = self::get_response_headers(self::$head);
        self::get_response_cookies(self::$head, parse_url($url, PHP_URL_HOST));
        self::$history = self::get_history(self::$head);

        return self::$content;
    }

    private static function _is_url($url) {
        return filter_var($url, FILTER_VALIDATE_URL) !== false;
    }

    private static function format_cookies() {
        $cookie_string = '';
        foreach (self::$cookies as $name => $value) {
            $cookie_string .= "$name=$value; ";
        }
        return rtrim($cookie_string, '; ');
    }

    private static function get_cookies($domain = '') {
        if ($domain && isset(self::$domain_cookies[$domain])) {
            return self::$domain_cookies[$domain];
        }
        return self::$cookies;
    }

    private static function get_response_headers($header) {
        $headers = [];
        $lines = explode("\r\n", $header);
        foreach ($lines as $line) {
            if (strpos($line, ': ') !== false) {
                list($key, $value) = explode(': ', $line, 2);
                $headers[$key] = $value;
            }
        }
        return $headers;
    }

    private static function get_response_cookies($header, $domain) {
        preg_match_all('/^Set-Cookie:\s*([^;]*)/mi', $header, $matches);
        foreach ($matches[1] as $item) {
            parse_str($item, $cookie);
            self::$domain_cookies[$domain] = array_merge(self::$domain_cookies[$domain] ?? [], $cookie);
        }
    }

    private static function split_header_body() {
        $header_size = curl_getinfo(self::$ch, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
        $header = substr(self::$raw, 0, $header_size);
        $body = substr(self::$raw, $header_size);
        return [$header, $body];
    }

    private static function get_history($header) {
        preg_match_all('/^Location:\s*(.*)$/mi', $header, $matches);
        return count($matches[1]);
    }

    private static function get_mimetype($filepath) {
        $finfo = finfo_open(FILEINFO_MIME_TYPE);
        $mime_type = finfo_file($finfo, $filepath);
        finfo_close($finfo);

            self::$ch = curl_init();
            curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
            curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, true);
            curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, self::$timeout);
        }
        return self::$ch;
    }

    public static function request($url, $method = 'GET', $fields = [], $files = [], $allow_redirects = true, $cert = null) {
        self::init();
        curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
        curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, $method);
        curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, $allow_redirects);
        
        if (!empty($fields)) {
            curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, http_build_query($fields));
        }

        if (!empty($files)) {
            foreach ($files as $key => $file) {
                $fields[$key] = new CURLFile($file, self::get_mimetype($file), basename($file));
            }
            curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $fields);
        }

        if ($cert) {
            curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_CAINFO, $cert);
        }

        if (!empty(self::$rawheaders)) {
            curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, self::$rawheaders);
        }

        curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, true);
        $response = curl_exec(self::$ch);
        self::$info = curl_getinfo(self::$ch);
        self::$status_code = self::$info['http_code'];

        if ($response === false) {

            return false;
        }

        self::$raw = $response;
        list(self::$head, self::$content) = self::split_header_body();
        self::$headers = self::get_response_headers(self::$head);
        self::get_response_cookies(self::$head, parse_url($url, PHP_URL_HOST));
        self::$history = self::get_history(self::$head);
        self::$text = self::$content;

        return self::$content;

    }

        }

        foreach ($lines as $line) {

        preg_match_all('/^Set-Cookie:\s*([^;]*)/mi', $header, $matches);

        $header_size = curl_getinfo(self::$ch, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);

class requests {
    public static $VERSION = '1.0';
    private static $ch = null;
    private static $timeout = 30;
    private static $encoding = null;
    private static $output_encoding = null;
    private static $cookies = [];
    private static $rawheaders = [];
    private static $domain_cookies = [];
    private static $headers = [];
    private static $useragents = [];
    private static $client_ips = [];
    private static $proxies = [];
    private static $raw = '';
    private static $head = '';
    private static $content = '';
    private static $text = '';
    private static $info = [];
    private static $history = 0;
    private static $status_code = 0;
    private static $error = '';

    public static function init() {
        if (self::$ch === null) {
            self::$ch = curl_init();
            curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
            curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, true);
            curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, self::$timeout);
        }
        return self::$ch;
    }

    public static function request($url, $method = 'GET', $fields = [], $files = [], $allow_redirects = true, $cert = null) {
        self::init();
        if (!self::_is_url($url)) {
            self::$error = 'Invalid URL';
            return false;
        }

        curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
        curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, strtoupper($method));

        if ($method === 'POST' && !empty($fields)) {
            curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, http_build_query($fields));
        }

        if (!empty($files)) {
            foreach ($files as $key => $file) {
                $fields[$key] = new CURLFile($file, self::get_mimetype($file), basename($file));
            }
            curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $fields);
        }

        if ($allow_redirects) {
            curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, true);
        }

        if ($cert !== null) {
            curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_CAINFO, $cert);
        }

        curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, self::$rawheaders);

        self::$raw = curl_exec(self::$ch);
        self::$info = curl_getinfo(self::$ch);
        self::$status_code = self::$info['http_code'];

        if (self::$raw === false) {
            self::$error = curl_error(self::$ch);
            return false;
        }

        list(self::$head, self::$content) = self::split_header_body();
        self::$headers = self::get_response_headers(self::$head);
        self::get_response_cookies(self::$head, parse_url($url, PHP_URL_HOST));
        self::$history = self::get_history(self::$head);
        self::$text = self::$output_encoding ? mb_convert_encoding(self::$content, self::$output_encoding, self::$encoding) : self::$content;

        return self::$text;
    }

    private static function _is_url($url) {
        return filter_var($url, FILTER_VALIDATE_URL) !== false;
    }

    public static function get_cookies($domain = '') {
        return $domain ? (self::$domain_cookies[$domain] ?? []) : self::$cookies;
    }

    private static function get_response_headers($header) {
        $headers = [];
        $lines = explode("\r\n", $header);
        foreach ($lines as $line) {
            if (strpos($line, ': ') !== false) {
                list($key, $value) = explode(': ', $line, 2);
                $headers[$key] = $value;
            }
        }
        return $headers;
    }

    private static function get_response_cookies($header, $domain) {
        preg_match_all('/Set-Cookie: (.*?);/i', $header, $matches);
        foreach ($matches[1] as $cookie) {
            list($key, $value) = explode('=', $cookie, 2);
            self::$cookies[$key] = $value;
            self::$domain_cookies[$domain][$key] = $value;
        }
    }

    private static function split_header_body() {
        $header_size = curl_getinfo(self::$ch, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
        $header = substr(self::$raw, 0, $header_size);
        $body = substr(self::$raw, $header_size);
        return [$header, $body];
    }

    private static function get_history($header) {
        preg_match_all('/^Location: (.*)$/mi', $header, $matches);
        return count($matches[1]);
    }

    private static function get_mimetype($filepath) {
        return mime_content_type($filepath);
    }
}

        foreach ($matches[1] as $cookie) {
            list($name, $value) = explode('=', $cookie, 2);
            self::$domain_cookies[$domain][$name] = $value;
        }

        }
        return self::$cookies;
    }

    private static function get_response_headers($header) {
        $headers = [];
        $lines = explode("\r\n", $header);
        foreach ($lines as $line) {
            if (strpos($line, ':') !== false) {
                list($key, $value) = explode(': ', $line);
                $headers[$key] = $value;
            }
        }
        return $headers;
    }

    private static function get_response_cookies($header, $domain) {
        preg_match_all('/^Set-Cookie:\s*([^;]*)/mi', $header, $matches);
        foreach ($matches[1] as $item) {
            parse_str($item, $cookie);
            self::$cookies = array_merge(self::$cookies, $cookie);
            self::$domain_cookies[$domain] = array_merge(self::$domain_cookies[$domain] ?? [], $cookie);
        }
    }

    private static function split_header_body() {
        $header_size = curl_getinfo(self::$ch, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
        $header = substr(self::$raw, 0, $header_size);
        $body = substr(self::$raw, $header_size);
        return [$header, $body];
    }

    private static function get_history($header) {
        preg_match_all('/^Location:\s*(.*)$/mi', $header, $matches);
        return count($matches[1]);
    }

    private static function get_mimetype($filepath) {
        return mime_content_type($filepath);
    }
}

Task Description: Create a PHP class that implements HTTP scraping functionality using cURL to make requests to a specified URL with query parameters and handle the response.

Class Description: The HttpScraper class extends a BaseScraper and provides functionality to make HTTP GET requests using cURL. It includes timeout configuration and basic error handling for HTTP status codes.

Attributes:
timeout: [int] - The maximum time in seconds the cURL request is allowed to take.

Methods:
request: [Name]([string $url, array $query]) -> [string|null] - Makes an HTTP GET request to the specified URL with the given query parameters. Returns the response body as a string if the request is successful (HTTP 200), or null otherwise.
matched_results:
<?php
class BaseScraper {
    // Base class for shared functionality (if needed in the future)
}

class HttpScraper extends BaseScraper {
    private $timeout;

    public function __construct(int $timeout = 30) {
        $this->timeout = $timeout;
    }

    public function request(string $url, array $query): ?string {
        $queryString = http_build_query($query);
        $fullUrl = $url . '?' . $queryString;

        $ch = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $fullUrl);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, $this->timeout);

        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        $httpCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);

        if (curl_errno($ch)) {
            curl_close($ch);
            return null;
        }

        curl_close($ch);

        return $httpCode === 200 ? $response : null;
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Implement a class that handles file downloads using cURL in PHP, with support for temporary file management and cleanup.

Class Description: The CurlDownloader class provides functionality to download files from a given URL using cURL, storing them in a temporary directory, and managing the downloaded files including cleanup operations.

Attributes:
- tempDir: string - The directory path where temporary files will be stored. Defaults to system temp directory if not specified.
- outputFile: string - The path to the downloaded file.

Methods:
- setTempDir(string $tempDir) -> void - Sets the temporary directory for storing downloaded files.
- download(string $url) -> bool - Downloads a file from the specified URL using cURL. Returns true on success, throws ErrorException on failure.
- getFilename() -> string - Returns the path to the downloaded file.
- cleanup() -> void - Removes the downloaded file if it exists.

Input:
- For setTempDir(): A string representing the directory path.
- For download(): A string representing the URL to download from.

Output:
- For download(): A boolean indicating success (true) or failure (false).
- For getFilename(): A string representing the path to the downloaded file.
- setTempDir() and cleanup() have no return value.
matched_results:
<?php

class CurlDownloader {
    private $tempDir;
    private $outputFile;

    public function __construct($tempDir = null) {
        $this->tempDir = $tempDir ?: sys_get_temp_dir();
    }

    public function setTempDir($tempDir) {
        $this->tempDir = $tempDir;
    }

    public function download($url) {
        $this->outputFile = tempnam($this->tempDir, 'curl_');
        $ch = curl_init($url);
        $fp = fopen($this->outputFile, 'w+');

        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FILE, $fp);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FAILONERROR, true);

        $success = curl_exec($ch);
        if (!$success) {
            fclose($fp);
            unlink($this->outputFile);
            throw new ErrorException('cURL error: ' . curl_error($ch));
        }

        curl_close($ch);
        fclose($fp);

        return true;
    }

    public function getFilename() {
        return $this->outputFile;
    }

    public function cleanup() {
        if (file_exists($this->outputFile)) {
            unlink($this->outputFile);
        }
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP HTTP client class that handles various types of HTTP requests (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, multipart POST) using cURL, with proper error handling and response processing.

Class Description: The Client class provides static methods to send HTTP requests and process responses. It handles request construction, cURL session management, response parsing, and error handling.

Attributes: (This class has no instance attributes as all methods are static)

Methods:

1. get(string $url, array $headers = array()) -> Response
   - Sends a GET request to the specified URL with optional headers
   - Returns a Response object containing status code, headers, body, and timing information

2. delete(string $url, array $headers = array()) -> Response
   - Sends a DELETE request to the specified URL with optional headers
   - Returns a Response object

3. post(string $url, mixed $body, array $headers = array()) -> Response
   - Sends a POST request with body content to the specified URL
   - Returns a Response object

4. put(string $url, mixed $body, array $headers = array()) -> Response
   - Sends a PUT request with body content to the specified URL
   - Returns a Response object

5. multipartPost(
     string $url,
     array $fields,
     string $name,
     string $fileName,
     string $fileBody,
     string $mimeType = null,
     array $headers = array()
   ) -> Response
   - Sends a multipart/form-data POST request with file upload
   - Returns a Response object

6. sendRequest(Request $request) -> Response
   - Internal method that executes the cURL request
   - Handles cURL initialization, option setting, execution, and cleanup
   - Returns a Response object with request results

7. userAgent() -> string
   - Generates a User-Agent string with SDK, system, and PHP version information
   - Returns the formatted User-Agent string

8. parseHeaders(string $raw) -> array
   - Parses raw HTTP response headers into an associative array
   - Returns array of headers with normalized keys

9. escapeQuotes(string $str) -> string
   - Escapes quotes in a string for use in multipart form data
   - Returns the escaped string

10. ucwordsHyphen(string $str) -> string
    - Converts hyphenated header names to proper case (e.g., 'content-type' becomes 'Content-Type')
    - Returns the properly cased string
matched_results:
<?php

class Client
{
    public static function get(string $url, array $headers = array()): Response
    {
        return self::sendRequest(new Request('GET', $url, null, $headers));
    }

    public static function delete(string $url, array $headers = array()): Response
    {
        return self::sendRequest(new Request('DELETE', $url, null, $headers));
    }

    public static function post(string $url, $body, array $headers = array()): Response
    {
        return self::sendRequest(new Request('POST', $url, $body, $headers));
    }

    public static function put(string $url, $body, array $headers = array()): Response
    {
        return self::sendRequest(new Request('PUT', $url, $body, $headers));
    }

    public static function multipartPost(
        string $url,
        array $fields,
        string $name,
        string $fileName,
        string $fileBody,
        string $mimeType = null,
        array $headers = array()
    ): Response {
        $boundary = uniqid();
        $delimiter = '-------------' . $boundary;
        $body = '';

        foreach ($fields as $key => $value) {
            $body .= "--$delimiter\r\n";
            $body .= "Content-Disposition: form-data; name=\"" . self::escapeQuotes($key) . "\"\r\n\r\n";
            $body .= $value . "\r\n";
        }

        $body .= "--$delimiter\r\n";
        $body .= "Content-Disposition: form-data; name=\"" . self::escapeQuotes($name) . "\"; filename=\"" . self::escapeQuotes($fileName) . "\"\r\n";
        $body .= "Content-Type: " . ($mimeType ?: 'application/octet-stream') . "\r\n\r\n";
        $body .= $fileBody . "\r\n";
        $body .= "--$delimiter--\r\n";

        $headers[] = "Content-Type: multipart/form-data; boundary=" . $delimiter;
        return self::sendRequest(new Request('POST', $url, $body, $headers));
    }

    private static function sendRequest(Request $request): Response
    {
        $ch = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $request->getUrl());
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, $request->getMethod());
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, self::userAgent());

        if ($request->getBody() !== null) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $request->getBody());
        }

        if (!empty($request->getHeaders())) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $request->getHeaders());
        }

        $start = microtime(true);
        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        $end = microtime(true);

        if ($response === false) {
            throw new Exception('cURL error: ' . curl_error($ch));
        }

        $headerSize = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
        $header = substr($response, 0, $headerSize);
        $body = substr($response, $headerSize);
        $statusCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);

        curl_close($ch);

        return new Response($statusCode, self::parseHeaders($header), $body, $end - $start);
    }

    private static function userAgent(): string
    {
        return 'Client/1.0 (' . php_uname('s') . '; PHP/' . phpversion() . ')';
    }

    private static function parseHeaders(string $raw): array
    {
        $headers = array();
        $lines = explode("\r\n", $raw);
        foreach ($lines as $line) {
            if (strpos($line, ':') !== false) {
                list($key, $value) = explode(':', $line, 2);
                $headers[self::ucwordsHyphen(trim($key))] = trim($value);
            }
        }
        return $headers;
    }

    private static function escapeQuotes(string $str): string
    {
        return str_replace('"', '\"', $str);
    }

    private static function ucwordsHyphen(string $str): string
    {
        return str_replace(' ', '-', ucwords(str_replace('-', ' ', $str)));
    }
}

class Request
{
    private $method;
    private $url;
    private $body;
    private $headers;

    public function __construct(string $method, string $url, $body = null, array $headers = array())
    {
        $this->method = $method;
        $this->url = $url;
        $this->body = $body;
        $this->headers = $headers;
    }

    public function getMethod(): string
    {
        return $this->method;
    }

    public function getUrl(): string
    {
        return $this->url;
    }

    public function getBody()
    {
        return $this->body;
    }

    public function getHeaders(): array
    {
        return $this->headers;
    }
}

class Response
{
    private $statusCode;
    private $headers;
    private $body;
    private $time;

    public function __construct(int $statusCode, array $headers, string $body, float $time)
    {
        $this->statusCode = $statusCode;
        $this->headers = $headers;
        $this->body = $body;
        $this->time = $time;
    }

    public function getStatusCode(): int
    {
        return $this->statusCode;
    }

    public function getHeaders(): array
    {
        return $this->headers;
    }

    public function getBody(): string
    {
        return $this->body;
    }

    public function getTime(): float
    {
        return $this->time;
    }
}

<?php

class Client
{
    public static function get(string $url, array $headers = array()): Response
    {
        return self::sendRequest(new Request('GET', $url, null, $headers));
    }

    public static function delete(string $url, array $headers = array()): Response
    {
        return self::sendRequest(new Request('DELETE', $url, null, $headers));
    }

    public static function post(string $url, $body, array $headers = array()): Response
    {
        return self::sendRequest(new Request('POST', $url, $body, $headers));
    }

    public static function put(string $url, $body, array $headers = array()): Response
    {
        return self::sendRequest(new Request('PUT', $url, $body, $headers));
    }

    public static function multipartPost(
        string $url,
        array $fields,
        string $name,
        string $fileName,
        string $fileBody,
        string $mimeType = null,
        array $headers = array()
    ): Response {
        $boundary = uniqid();
        $delimiter = '-------------' . $boundary;
        $body = '';

        foreach ($fields as $key => $value) {
            $body .= "--$delimiter\r\n"
                . "Content-Disposition: form-data; name=\"" . self::escapeQuotes($key) . "\"\r\n\r\n"
                . $value . "\r\n";
        }

        $body .= "--$delimiter\r\n"
            . "Content-Disposition: form-data; name=\"" . self::escapeQuotes($name) . "\"; filename=\"" . self::escapeQuotes($fileName) . "\"\r\n"
            . "Content-Type: " . ($mimeType ?: 'application/octet-stream') . "\r\n\r\n"
            . $fileBody . "\r\n"
            . "--$delimiter--\r\n";

        $headers[] = "Content-Type: multipart/form-data; boundary=$delimiter";
        $headers[] = "Content-Length: " . strlen($body);

        return self::sendRequest(new Request('POST', $url, $body, $headers));
    }

    private static function sendRequest(Request $request): Response
    {
        $ch = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $request->getUrl());
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, $request->getMethod());
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $request->getHeaders());
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, self::userAgent());

        if ($request->getBody() !== null) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $request->getBody());
        }

        $start = microtime(true);
        $responseBody = curl_exec($ch);
        $end = microtime(true);

        if ($responseBody === false) {
            $error = curl_error($ch);
            curl_close($ch);
            throw new Exception("cURL error: $error");
        }

        $statusCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
        $headerSize = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
        $responseHeaders = self::parseHeaders(substr($responseBody, 0, $headerSize));
        $responseBody = substr($responseBody, $headerSize);

        curl_close($ch);

        return new Response($statusCode, $responseHeaders, $responseBody, $end - $start);
    }

    private static function userAgent(): string
    {
        return 'Client/1.0 (' . php_uname('s') . '; PHP/' . phpversion() . ')';
    }

    private static function parseHeaders(string $raw): array
    {
        $headers = array();
        $lines = explode("\r\n", $raw);

        foreach ($lines as $line) {
            if (strpos($line, ':') !== false) {
                list($key, $value) = explode(':', $line, 2);
                $headers[self::ucwordsHyphen(trim($key))] = trim($value);
            }
        }

        return $headers;
    }

    private static function escapeQuotes(string $str): string
    {
        return str_replace('"', '\\"', $str);
    }

    private static function ucwordsHyphen(string $str): string
    {
        return implode('-', array_map('ucwords', explode('-', $str)));
    }
}

class Request
{
    private $method;

    public function __construct(string $method, string $url, $body = null, array $headers = array())
    {
        $this->method = $method;
        $this->url = $url;
        $this->body = $body;
        $this->headers = $headers;
    }

    public function getMethod(): string
    {
        return $this->method;
    }

    public function getUrl(): string
    {
        return $this->url;
    }

    public function getBody()
    {
        return $this->body;
    }

    public function getHeaders(): array
    {
        return $this->headers;
    }
}

class Response
{
    private $statusCode;
    private $headers;
    private $body;
    private $time;

    public function __construct(int $statusCode, array $headers, string $body, float $time)
    {
        $this->statusCode = $statusCode;
        $this->headers = $headers;
        $this->body = $body;
        $this->time = $time;
    }

    public function getStatusCode(): int
    {
        return $this->statusCode;
    }

    public function getHeaders(): array
    {
        return $this->headers;
    }

    public function getBody(): string
    {
        return $this->body;
    }

    public function getTime(): float
    {
        return $this->time;
    }
}

<?php

class Client
{
    public static function get(string $url, array $headers = array())
    {
        $request = self::createRequest('GET', $url, null, $headers);
        return self::sendRequest($request);
    }

    public static function delete(string $url, array $headers = array())
    {
        $request = self::createRequest('DELETE', $url, null, $headers);
        return self::sendRequest($request);
    }

    public static function post(string $url, $body, array $headers = array())
    {
        $request = self::createRequest('POST', $url, $body, $headers);
        return self::sendRequest($request);
    }

    public static function put(string $url, $body, array $headers = array())
    {
        $request = self::createRequest('PUT', $url, $body, $headers);
        return self::sendRequest($request);
    }

    public static function multipartPost(
        string $url,
        array $fields,
        string $name,
        string $fileName,
        string $fileBody,
        string $mimeType = null,
        array $headers = array()
    ) {
        $boundary = uniqid();
        $body = '';

        foreach ($fields as $key => $value) {
            $body .= "--$boundary\r\n";
            $body .= "Content-Disposition: form-data; name=\"" . self::escapeQuotes($key) . "\"\r\n\r\n";
            $body .= "$value\r\n";
        }

        $body .= "--$boundary\r\n";
        $body .= "Content-Disposition: form-data; name=\"" . self::escapeQuotes($name) . "\"; filename=\"" . self::escapeQuotes($fileName) . "\"\r\n";
        $body .= "Content-Type: " . ($mimeType ?: 'application/octet-stream') . "\r\n\r\n";
        $body .= "$fileBody\r\n";
        $body .= "--$boundary--\r\n";

        $headers[] = "Content-Type: multipart/form-data; boundary=$boundary";
        $request = self::createRequest('POST', $url, $body, $headers);
        return self::sendRequest($request);
    }

    private static function createRequest(string $method, string $url, $body = null, array $headers = array())
    {
        return [
            'method' => $method,
            'url' => $url,
            'body' => $body,
            'headers' => $headers
        ];
    }

    private static function sendRequest(array $request)
    {
        $ch = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $request['url']);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, $request['method']);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, self::userAgent());

        if (!empty($request['headers'])) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $request['headers']);
        }

        if (!empty($request['body'])) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $request['body']);
        }

        $startTime = microtime(true);
        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        $endTime = microtime(true);

        if ($response === false) {
            throw new Exception('cURL Error: ' . curl_error($ch));
        }

        $headerSize = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
        $statusCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
        $headers = self::parseHeaders(substr($response, 0, $headerSize));
        $body = substr($response, $headerSize);

        curl_close($ch);

        return [
            'statusCode' => $statusCode,
            'headers' => $headers,
            'body' => $body,
            'time' => $endTime - $startTime
        ];
    }

    private static function userAgent()
    {
        return 'Client-SDK/1.0 (' . PHP_OS . '; PHP/' . PHP_VERSION . ')';
    }

    private static function parseHeaders(string $raw)
    {
        $headers = [];
        $lines = explode("\r\n", $raw);

        foreach ($lines as $line) {
            if (strpos($line, ':') !== false) {
                list($key, $value) = explode(':', $line, 2);
                $headers[self::ucwordsHyphen(trim($key))] = trim($value);
            }
        }

        return $headers;
    }

    private static function escapeQuotes(string $str)
    {
        return str_replace('"', '\"', $str);
    }

    private static function ucwordsHyphen(string $str)
    {
        return implode('-', array_map('ucwords', explode('-', $str)));
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP function that uploads a file to a cloud storage service using cURL with PUT method, including authentication and proper headers.

Function Description: The function `dogcloud_upload` uploads a specified file to DogeCloud's object storage service. It handles authentication using HMAC-SHA1, sets appropriate headers including content type, and manages the file upload via HTTP PUT request. The function checks file existence before proceeding with the upload.

Input:
- $object (string): The target path/name for the uploaded file in the cloud storage
- $file (string): Local path to the file to be uploaded
- $mime (string): MIME type of the file being uploaded

Output:
- Returns the API response on successful upload (string)
- Returns false if the file doesn't exist or if upload fails (boolean)
matched_results:
<?php

function dogcloud_upload($object, $file, $mime) {
    $accessKey = 'your_access_key';
    $secretKey = 'your_secret_key';
    $bucket = 'your_bucket_name';
    $endpoint = 'https://your-dogecloud-endpoint.com';

    if (!file_exists($file)) {
        return false;
    }

    $fileContent = file_get_contents($file);
    $fileSize = filesize($file);
    $date = gmdate('D, d M Y H:i:s T');
    $stringToSign = "PUT\n\n$mime\n$date\n/$bucket/$object";
    $signature = base64_encode(hash_hmac('sha1', $stringToSign, $secretKey, true));
    $authorization = "DOGCLOUD $accessKey:$signature";

    $ch = curl_init();
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, "$endpoint/$bucket/$object");
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_PUT, true);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_INFILE, fopen($file, 'r'));
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_INFILESIZE, $fileSize);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
        "Date: $date",
        "Content-Type: $mime",
        "Authorization: $authorization"
    ]);

    $response = curl_exec($ch);
    $httpCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
    curl_close($ch);

    if ($httpCode == 200) {
        return $response;
    } else {
        return false;
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Implement a file downloader class in PHP that supports both regular and resumable downloads using either fopen or cURL, with proper error handling and support for gzip-compressed files.

Class Description: The Downloader class provides functionality to download files from URLs with support for resuming interrupted downloads. It handles both HTTP and HTTPS protocols, checks for server-side range support, and manages temporary files during download.

Attributes: (This class doesn't have explicit attributes as it uses static methods)

Methods:

Method1: start(string|array $url, string $saveFile, int $timeout = 10) -> array - Main entry point that initiates the download process. Checks URL validity and determines the best download method (fopen or cURL) based on server capabilities.

Method2: fileDownloadFopen(string $url, string $fileName, int $headerSize = 0) -> array - Downloads a file using PHP's fopen function. Handles basic downloads when range requests aren't supported.

Method3: fileDownloadCurl(string $url, string $fileName, bool $supportRange = false, int $existsLength = 0, int $length = 0) -> array - Downloads a file using cURL with support for resumable downloads if the server supports range requests.

Method4: checkGzip(string $file) -> void - Checks if a file is gzip-compressed and decompresses it if necessary. This is an internal helper method.
matched_results:
<?php

class Downloader {

    public static function start($url, $saveFile, $timeout = 10) {
        if (is_array($url)) {
            $url = $url[0];
        }

        if (!filter_var($url, FILTER_VALIDATE_URL)) {
            return ['success' => false, 'message' => 'Invalid URL'];
        }

        $headers = get_headers($url, 1);
        if ($headers === false) {
            return ['success' => false, 'message' => 'Unable to fetch headers'];
        }

        $supportRange = isset($headers['Accept-Ranges']) && $headers['Accept-Ranges'] === 'bytes';
        $length = isset($headers['Content-Length']) ? (int)$headers['Content-Length'] : 0;

        if ($supportRange) {
            return self::fileDownloadCurl($url, $saveFile, true, 0, $length);
        } else {
            return self::fileDownloadFopen($url, $saveFile);
        }
    }

    public static function fileDownloadFopen($url, $fileName, $headerSize = 0) {
        $file = fopen($url, 'rb');
        if ($file === false) {
            return ['success' => false, 'message' => 'Unable to open URL'];
        }

        $saveFile = fopen($fileName, 'wb');
        if ($saveFile === false) {
            fclose($file);
            return ['success' => false, 'message' => 'Unable to open save file'];
        }

        while (!feof($file)) {
            $data = fread($file, 8192);
            fwrite($saveFile, $data);
        }

        fclose($file);
        fclose($saveFile);

        self::checkGzip($fileName);

        return ['success' => true, 'message' => 'File downloaded successfully'];
    }

    public static function fileDownloadCurl($url, $fileName, $supportRange = false, $existsLength = 0, $length = 0) {
        $ch = curl_init($url);
        $saveFile = fopen($fileName, $existsLength ? 'ab' : 'wb');

        if ($saveFile === false) {
            curl_close($ch);
            return ['success' => false, 'message' => 'Unable to open save file'];
        }

        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FILE, $saveFile);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, 10);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, true);

        if ($supportRange && $existsLength > 0) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RANGE, $existsLength . '-' . $length);
        }

        $result = curl_exec($ch);
        $error = curl_error($ch);
        curl_close($ch);
        fclose($saveFile);

        if ($result === false) {
            return ['success' => false, 'message' => 'cURL error: ' . $error];
        }

        self::checkGzip($fileName);

        return ['success' => true, 'message' => 'File downloaded successfully'];
    }

    private static function checkGzip($file) {
        $fileType = mime_content_type($file);
        if ($fileType === 'application/x-gzip') {
            $bufferSize = 4096;
            $outFileName = str_replace('.gz', '', $file);

            $file = gzopen($file, 'rb');
            $outFile = fopen($outFileName, 'wb');

            while (!gzeof($file)) {
                fwrite($outFile, gzread($file, $bufferSize));
            }

            fclose($outFile);
            gzclose($file);
        }
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP class for handling HTTP requests using cURL with support for various HTTP methods, streaming, authentication, and proxy configuration.

Class Description: The BcsRequestcore class provides a comprehensive wrapper around PHP's cURL functions to handle HTTP requests. It supports GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, and HEAD methods, with features for request customization, streaming uploads/downloads, authentication, and proxy support. The class manages the entire request lifecycle including preparation, execution, and response processing.

Attributes:

request_url: [string] - The URL to send the request to
request_headers: [array] - Associative array of request headers
request_body: [string] - The request body content
response: [mixed] - The raw response from the server
response_headers: [array] - Parsed response headers
response_body: [string] - The response body content
response_code: [int] - HTTP response status code
response_info: [array] - Additional response information
curl_handle: [resource] - The cURL handle resource
method: [string] - HTTP method (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, HEAD)
proxy: [array|null] - Proxy configuration details
username: [string|null] - Authentication username
password: [string|null] - Authentication password
curlopts: [array|null] - Additional cURL options
debug_mode: [bool] - Flag for debug mode
request_class: [string] - Class name for request handling
response_class: [string] - Class name for response handling
useragent: [string] - User agent string
read_file: [string|null] - File path for streaming read
read_stream: [resource|null] - Stream resource for reading
read_stream_size: [int|null] - Size of read stream
read_stream_read: [int] - Bytes read from stream
write_file: [string|null] - File path for streaming write
write_stream: [resource|null] - Stream resource for writing
seek_position: [int|null] - Seek position for streams
registered_streaming_read_callback: [callable|null] - Callback for streaming read
registered_streaming_write_callback: [callable|null] - Callback for streaming write

Methods:

__construct([string|null $url], [array|null $proxy], [array|null $helpers]) -> [self] - Initializes the request object with optional URL, proxy, and helper classes
__destruct() -> [self] - Cleans up any open file handles
setCredentials([string $user], [string $pass]) -> [self] - Sets basic authentication credentials
addHeader([string $key], [string $value]) -> [self] - Adds a request header
removeHeader([string $key]) -> [self] - Removes a request header
setMethod([string $method]) -> [self] - Sets the HTTP method
setUseragent([string $ua]) -> [self] - Sets the user agent string
setBody([string $body]) -> [self] - Sets the request body
setRequestUrl([string $url]) -> [self] - Sets the request URL
setCurlopts([array $curlopts]) -> [self] - Sets additional cURL options
setReadStreamSize([int $size]) -> [self] - Sets the read stream size
setReadStream([resource $resource], [int|null $size]) -> [self] - Sets a stream resource for reading
setReadFile([string $location]) -> [self] - Sets a file for streaming read
setWriteStream([resource $resource]) -> [self] - Sets a stream resource for writing
setWriteFile([string $location]) -> [self] - Sets a file for streaming write
setProxy([string $proxy]) -> [self] - Configures proxy settings
setSeekPosition([int|null $position]) -> [self] - Sets the seek position for streams

<?php

class BcsRequestcore {
    private $request_url;
    private $request_headers = [];
    private $request_body;
    private $response;
    private $response_headers = [];
    private $response_body;
    private $response_code;
    private $response_info = [];
    private $curl_handle;
    private $method = 'GET';
    private $proxy;
    private $username;
    private $password;
    private $curlopts = [];
    private $debug_mode = false;
    private $request_class;
    private $response_class;
    private $useragent = 'BcsRequestcore/1.0';
    private $read_file;
    private $read_stream;
    private $read_stream_size;
    private $read_stream_read = 0;
    private $write_file;
    private $write_stream;
    private $seek_position;
    private $registered_streaming_read_callback;
    private $registered_streaming_write_callback;

    public function __construct($url = null, $proxy = null, $helpers = null) {
        if ($url) {
            $this->request_url = $url;
        }
        if ($proxy) {
            $this->proxy = $proxy;
        }
        if ($helpers) {
            foreach ($helpers as $key => $helper) {
                $this->$key = $helper;
            }
        }
    }

    public function __destruct() {
        if (is_resource($this->read_stream)) {
            fclose($this->read_stream);
        }
        if (is_resource($this->write_stream)) {
            fclose($this->write_stream);
        }
    }

    public function setCredentials($user, $pass) {
        $this->username = $user;
        $this->password = $pass;
        return $this;
    }

    public function addHeader($key, $value) {
        $this->request_headers[$key] = $value;
        return $this;
    }

    public function removeHeader($key) {
        unset($this->request_headers[$key]);
        return $this;
    }

    public function setMethod($method) {
        $this->method = strtoupper($method);
        return $this;
    }

    public function setUseragent($ua) {
        $this->useragent = $ua;
        return $this;
    }

    public function setBody($body) {
        $this->request_body = $body;
        return $this;
    }

    public function setRequestUrl($url) {
        $this->request_url = $url;
        return $this;
    }

    public function setCurlopts($curlopts) {
        $this->curlopts = $curlopts;
        return $this;
    }

    public function setReadStreamSize($size) {
        $this->read_stream_size = $size;
        return $this;
    }

    public function setReadStream($resource, $size = null) {
        $this->read_stream = $resource;
        $this->read_stream_size = $size;
        return $this;
    }

    public function setReadFile($location) {
        $this->read_file = $location;
        return $this;
    }

    public function setWriteStream($resource) {
        $this->write_stream = $resource;
        return $this;
    }

    public function setWriteFile($location) {
        $this->write_file = $location;
        return $this;
    }

    public function setProxy($proxy) {
        $this->proxy = $proxy;
        return $this;
    }

    public function setSeekPosition($position) {
        $this->seek_position = $position;
        return $this;
    }

    public function registerStreamingReadCallback($callback) {
        $this->registered_streaming_read_callback = $callback;
        return $this;
    }

    public function registerStreamingWriteCallback($callback) {
        $this->registered_streaming_write_callback = $callback;
        return $this;
    }

    public function prepRequest() {
        $this->curl_handle = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, $this->request_url);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, $this->method);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, $this->useragent);

        if ($this->username && $this->password) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_USERPWD, "{$this->username}:{$this->password}");
        }

        if ($this->proxy) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_PROXY, $this->proxy);
        }

        if (!empty($this->request_headers)) {
            $headers = [];
            foreach ($this->request_headers as $key => $value) {
                $headers[] = "{$key}: {$value}";
            }
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
        }

        if ($this->request_body) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $this->request_body);
        }

        if ($this->read_stream) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_UPLOAD, true);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_INFILE, $this->read_stream);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_INFILESIZE, $this->read_stream_size);
        }

        if ($this->write_stream) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_FILE, $this->write_stream);
        }

        if ($this->seek_position !== null) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_RESUME_FROM, $this->seek_position);
        }

        if ($this->curlopts) {
            curl_setopt_array($this->curl_handle, $this->curlopts);
        }

        return $this->curl_handle;
    }

    public function sendRequest($parse = false) {
        $this->prepRequest();
        $this->response = curl_exec($this->curl_handle);
        $this->response_info = curl_getinfo($this->curl_handle);
        $this->response_code = $this->response_info['http_code'];

        if ($parse) {
            $this->processResponse($this->curl_handle, $this->response);
        }

        curl_close($this->curl_handle);
        return $this->response;
    }

    public function processResponse($curl_handle, $response) {
        $header_size = curl_getinfo($curl_handle, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
        $this->response_headers = substr($response, 0, $header_size);
        $this->response_body = substr($response, $header_size);
        return $this->response_body;
    }

    public function isBaeEnv() {
        return getenv('HTTP_BAE_ENV_APPID') !== false;
    }

    public function getResponseHeader($header = null) {
        if ($header) {
            foreach (explode("\r\n", $this->response_headers) as $line) {
                if (stripos($line, $header) === 0) {
                    return trim(substr($line, strlen($header) + 1));
                }
            }
            return null;
        }
        return $this->response_headers;
    }

    public function getResponseBody() {
        return $this->response_body;
    }

    public function getResponseCode() {
        return $this->response_code;
    }
}

        curl_close($this->curl_handle);

        if ($parse) {

        }

        return $response;

        if ($response === null) {
            $response = $this->response;
        }

        $header_size = $this->response_info['header_size'];
        $header = substr($response, 0, $header_size);
        $body = substr($response, $header_size);

        $this->response_headers = [];
        foreach (explode("\r\n", $header) as $line) {
            if (strpos($line, ': ') !== false) {
                list($key, $value) = explode(': ', $line, 2);
                $this->response_headers[$key] = $value;
            }
        }

        $this->response_body = $body;

        return $body;
    }

        return getenv('HTTP_BAE_ENV_APPID') !== false;
    }

        if ($header === null) {
            return $this->response_headers;
        }

        return isset($this->response_headers[$header]) ? $this->response_headers[$header] : null;
    }

    public function getResponseBody() {
        return $this->response_body;
    }

    public function getResponseCode() {
        return $this->response_code;
    }
}

        $length = fwrite($this->write_stream, $data);
        if ($this->registered_streaming_write_callback) {
            call_user_func($this->registered_streaming_write_callback, $curl, $data);
        }
        return $length;
    }

Task Description: Create a PHP class that implements a simple HTTP client using cURL for making GET requests, with configurable options and proper error handling.

Class Description: The SimpleHttpClient class provides functionality to send HTTP GET requests using PHP's cURL extension. It includes default cURL options that can be customized, handles errors appropriately, and parses the response into status code, headers, and body.

Attributes:

curlOptions: [array] - An associative array of default cURL options including settings for headers, redirects, timeouts, and response handling.

Methods:

httpGet: [Name]($url, $options) -> [array] - Sends an HTTP GET request to the specified URL with optional configuration. Returns an associative array containing the response status code, headers, and body.
- Parameters:
  - $url: [string] - The target URL for the GET request
  - $options: [array] - Optional configuration array (currently only supports 'timeout' override)
- Return: [array] - Associative array with keys: 'statusCode' (int), 'headers' (array), and 'body' (string)
- Throws: RuntimeException when cURL encounters an error

<?php

class SimpleHttpClient
{
    private $curlOptions = [
        CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
        CURLOPT_HEADER => true,
        CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
        CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
        CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
    ];

    public function httpGet($url, $options = [])
    {
        $ch = curl_init($url);

        if (isset($options['timeout'])) {
            $this->curlOptions[CURLOPT_TIMEOUT] = $options['timeout'];
        }

        curl_setopt_array($ch, $this->curlOptions);

        $response = curl_exec($ch);

        if ($response === false) {
            $error = curl_error($ch);
            curl_close($ch);
            throw new RuntimeException("cURL error: $error");
        }

        $statusCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
        $headerSize = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
        $headers = substr($response, 0, $headerSize);
        $body = substr($response, $headerSize);

        curl_close($ch);

        $headerLines = explode("\r\n", trim($headers));
        $headerArray = [];
        foreach ($headerLines as $line) {
            if (strpos($line, ': ') !== false) {
                list($key, $value) = explode(': ', $line, 2);
                $headerArray[$key] = $value;
            }
        }

        return [
            'statusCode' => $statusCode,
            'headers' => $headerArray,
            'body' => $body,
        ];
    }
}

        }

        curl_setopt_array($ch, $curlOptions);

        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        if ($response === false) {

            throw new RuntimeException("cURL error: $error");
        }

        $statusCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
        $headerSize = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
        curl_close($ch);

        $headers = substr($response, 0, $headerSize);
        $body = substr($response, $headerSize);

        $headerArray = [];
        foreach (explode("\r\n", $headers) as $header) {
            if (strpos($header, ':') !== false) {
                list($key, $value) = explode(': ', $header, 2);
                $headerArray[$key] = $value;
            }
        }

        return [
            'statusCode' => $statusCode,
            'headers' => $headerArray,
            'body' => $body,
        ];
    }
}

- request([string $path], [string $method], [array|null $headers], [mixed $body]) -> [mixed] - Makes an HTTP request to BCS service and processes the response

The request method specifically handles:

<?php

class Bcs {
    private $rootPath;
    private $error;
    private $config;
    private $bcs;

    public function __construct(array $config) {
        $this->config = $config;
        $this->rootPath = isset($config['rootPath']) ? $config['rootPath'] : '/';
        $this->bcs = null;
    }

    private function request($path, $method, $headers = null, $body = null) {
        $url = $this->config['endpoint'] . $path;
        $ch = curl_init($url);

        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, $method);

        if ($headers) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
        }

        if ($body) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $body);
        }

        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        $httpCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);

        if (curl_errno($ch)) {
            $this->error = curl_error($ch);
            curl_close($ch);
            return false;
        }

        curl_close($ch);

        if ($httpCode >= 200 && $httpCode < 300) {
            return $this->response($response);
        } else {
            $this->error($response);
            return false;
        }
    }

    private function response($text) {
        return json_decode($text, true);
    }

    private function error($header) {
        $response = $this->response($header);
        $this->error = isset($response['error_msg']) ? $response['error_msg'] : 'Unknown error';
    }

    public function getError() {
        return $this->error;
    }
}

        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, true);
