        if ($headers) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
        }

        switch (strtoupper($method)) {
            case 'GET':
                curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPGET, true);
                break;
            case 'POST':
                curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
                curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $body);
                break;
            case 'PUT':
                curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'PUT');
                curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $body);
                break;
            case 'HEAD':
                curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_NOBODY, true);
                break;
            default:
                throw new Exception('Unsupported HTTP method.');
        }

        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        if ($response === false) {
            $this->error = curl_error($ch);
            curl_close($ch);
            return false;
        }

        $header_size = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
        $header = substr($response, 0, $header_size);
        $body = substr($response, $header_size);

        if (strpos($header, 'HTTP/1.1 200 OK') === false) {
            $this->error($header);
            return false;
        }

        return $this->response($body);
    }

    private function response($text) {
        return json_decode($text, true);
    }

    private function error($header) {
        preg_match('/HTTP\/1.1 (\d{3}) (.*)/', $header, $matches);
        if (isset($matches[2])) {
            $this->error = $matches[2];
        } else {
            $this->error = 'Unknown error';

Task Description: Create a PHP class that utilizes the Guzzle HTTP client to synchronize video processing tasks with a remote API endpoint, handling request signing and response parsing.

Class Description: The SyncVideo class provides functionality to send video processing requests to a remote API endpoint using HTTP POST requests. It handles request signing, timeout configuration, and response parsing.

Attributes:
- config: [Upyun\Config] - Configuration object containing service credentials, timeout settings, and endpoint information

Methods:
- __construct(Config $config) -> [void] - Initializes the class with the provided configuration object
- process(array $params, string $path) -> [array] - Sends a synchronized video processing request to the specified path with the given parameters, returns the parsed JSON response

<?php

use GuzzleHttp\Client;
use GuzzleHttp\Exception\RequestException;

class SyncVideo
{
    private $config;
    private $client;

    public function __construct(Config $config)
    {
        $this->config = $config;
        $this->client = new Client([
            'base_uri' => $this->config->getEndpoint(),
            'timeout'  => $this->config->getTimeout(),
        ]);
    }

    public function process(array $params, string $path): array
    {
        $url = $this->config->getEndpoint() . $path;
        $headers = $this->getSignedHeaders($params);

        try {
            $response = $this->client->post($url, [
                'headers' => $headers,
                'json'    => $params,
            ]);

            return json_decode($response->getBody()->getContents(), true);
        } catch (RequestException $e) {
            return ['error' => $e->getMessage()];
        }
    }

    private function getSignedHeaders(array $params): array
    {
        $timestamp = time();
        $signature = hash_hmac('sha256', json_encode($params) . $timestamp, $this->config->getSecretKey());

        return [
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer ' . $this->config->getAccessToken(),
            'X-Timestamp' => $timestamp,
            'X-Signature' => $signature,
        ];
    }
}

    {

        return $this->secretKey;

use GuzzleHttp\Client;
use GuzzleHttp\Exception\RequestException;

class SyncVideo
{
    private $config;
    private $client;

    public function __construct(Config $config)
    {
        $this->config = $config;
        $this->client = new Client([
            'base_uri' => $this->config->getEndpoint(),
            'timeout'  => $this->config->getTimeout(),
        ]);
    }

    public function process(array $params, string $path): array
    {
        $url = $this->config->getEndpoint() . $path;
        $headers = $this->getSignedHeaders($params);

        try {
            $response = $this->client->post($url, [
                'headers' => $headers,
                'json'    => $params,
            ]);

            $body = $response->getBody();
            return json_decode($body, true);
        } catch (RequestException $e) {
            // Handle the exception or rethrow it
            throw new \RuntimeException('Request failed: ' . $e->getMessage());
        }
    }

    private function getSignedHeaders(array $params): array
    {
        $timestamp = time();
        $signature = $this->signRequest($params, $timestamp);

        return [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer ' . $this->config->getApiKey(),
            'X-Signature'   => $signature,
            'X-Timestamp'   => $timestamp,
        ];
    }

    private function signRequest(array $params, int $timestamp): string
    {
        $data = json_encode($params) . $timestamp;
        return hash_hmac('sha256', $data, $this->config->getSecretKey());
    }
}

class SyncVideo

    {
        $this->config = $config;

            'base_uri' => $this->config->getEndpoint(),
            'timeout'  => $this->config->getTimeout(),
        ]);
    }

    public function process(array $params, string $path): array
    {
        $signedParams = $this->signRequest($params);
        try {
            $response = $this->client->post($path, [
                'json' => $signedParams,
                'headers' => [
                    'Authorization' => 'Bearer ' . $this->config->getToken(),
                    'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
                ],
            ]);
            $body = $response->getBody()->getContents();
            return json_decode($body, true);
        } catch (RequestException $e) {
            return ['error' => $e->getMessage()];
        }
    }

    private function signRequest(array $params): array
    {
        $params['timestamp'] = time();
        $params['signature'] = hash_hmac('sha256', json_encode($params), $this->config->getSecret());
        return $params;
    }
}

            'base_uri' => $this->config->getEndpoint(),
            'timeout'  => $this->config->getTimeout(),
        ]);
    }

    public function process(array $params, string $path): array
    {
        $url = $this->config->getEndpoint() . $path;
        $headers = $this->getSignedHeaders($params);

        try {
            $response = $this->client->post($url, [
                'headers' => $headers,
                'json'    => $params,
            ]);

            $body = $response->getBody();
            $data = json_decode($body, true);

            if (json_last_error() !== JSON_ERROR_NONE) {
                throw new \RuntimeException('Failed to parse JSON response: ' . json_last_error_msg());
            }

            return $data;
        } catch (RequestException $e) {
            throw new \RuntimeException('HTTP request failed: ' . $e->getMessage());
        }
    }

    private function getSignedHeaders(array $params): array
    {
        $timestamp = time();
        $signature = $this->generateSignature($params, $timestamp);

        return [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer ' . $this->config->getApiKey(),
            'X-Timestamp'   => $timestamp,
            'X-Signature'   => $signature,
        ];
    }

    private function generateSignature(array $params, int $timestamp): string
    {
        $data = json_encode($params);
        $secret = $this->config->getApiSecret();
        return hash_hmac('sha256', $data . $timestamp, $secret);
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP class that handles interactions with the Alipay API, specifically for processing settlements and generating required signatures for secure communication.

Class Description: The AlipayService class provides functionality to interact with Alipay's payment gateway, focusing on settlement operations. It handles request configuration, signature generation, and HTTP communication using cURL.

Attributes:
- appId: [string] - The application ID for Alipay API
- charset: [string] - Character encoding (default: 'utf-8')
- notifyUrl: [string] - Notification URL for callbacks
- rsaPrivateKey: [string] - RSA private key for signing requests
- totalFee: [float] - Total amount for the transaction
- outTradeNo: [string] - Merchant's unique order number
- orderName: [string] - Description of the order
- tradeNo: [string] - Alipay's transaction number
- tranOut: [string] - Account transferring funds
- tranIn: [string] - Account receiving funds
- amountPercentage: [float] - Percentage of amount to transfer

Methods:
- __construct() -> [void] - Initializes the class with default charset
- setAppid($appid) -> [void] - Sets the Alipay application ID
- setTradeNo($tradeNo) -> [void] - Sets the Alipay transaction number
- setTranOut($tranOut) -> [void] - Sets the transferring account
- setTranIn($tranIn) -> [void] - Sets the receiving account
- setRsaPrivateKey($rsaPrivateKey) -> [void] - Sets the RSA private key
- setTotalFee($payAmount) -> [void] - Sets the transaction amount
- setOutTradeNo($outTradeNo) -> [void] - Sets the merchant order number
- doSettle() -> [array] - Executes the settlement request to Alipay
- generateSign($params, $signType = "RSA") -> [string] - Generates signature for request
- sign($data, $signType = "RSA") -> [string] - Creates RSA signature
- checkEmpty($value) -> [bool] - Checks if a value is empty
- getSignContent($params) -> [string] - Prepares content for signing
- characet($data, $targetCharset) -> [string] - Handles character encoding conversion
- curlPost($url = '', $postData = '', $options = array()) -> [string] - Executes HTTP POST request using cURL

<?php

class AlipayService {
    private $appId;
    private $charset = 'utf-8';
    private $notifyUrl;
    private $rsaPrivateKey;
    private $totalFee;
    private $outTradeNo;
    private $orderName;
    private $tradeNo;
    private $tranOut;
    private $tranIn;
    private $amountPercentage;

    public function __construct() {
        $this->charset = 'utf-8';
    }

    public function setAppid($appid) {
        $this->appId = $appid;
    }

    public function setTradeNo($tradeNo) {
        $this->tradeNo = $tradeNo;
    }

    public function setTranOut($tranOut) {
        $this->tranOut = $tranOut;
    }

    public function setTranIn($tranIn) {
        $this->tranIn = $tranIn;
    }

    public function setRsaPrivateKey($rsaPrivateKey) {
        $this->rsaPrivateKey = $rsaPrivateKey;
    }

    public function setTotalFee($payAmount) {
        $this->totalFee = $payAmount;
    }

    public function setOutTradeNo($outTradeNo) {
        $this->outTradeNo = $outTradeNo;
    }

    public function doSettle() {
        $params = [
            'app_id' => $this->appId,
            'method' => 'alipay.trade.order.settle',
            'charset' => $this->charset,
            'sign_type' => 'RSA',
            'timestamp' => date('Y-m-d H:i:s'),
            'version' => '1.0',
            'biz_content' => json_encode([
                'trade_no' => $this->tradeNo,
                'out_request_no' => $this->outTradeNo,
                'trans_in' => $this->tranIn,
                'trans_out' => $this->tranOut,
                'amount' => $this->totalFee,
                'amount_percentage' => $this->amountPercentage
            ])
        ];

        $params['sign'] = $this->generateSign($params, 'RSA');
        $response = $this->curlPost('https://openapi.alipay.com/gateway.do', http_build_query($params));
        return json_decode($response, true);
    }

    private function generateSign($params, $signType = "RSA") {
        return $this->sign($this->getSignContent($params), $signType);
    }

    private function sign($data, $signType = "RSA") {
        $res = "-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----\n" .
            wordwrap($this->rsaPrivateKey, 64, "\n", true) .
            "\n-----END RSA PRIVATE KEY-----";
        if ($signType == "RSA2") {
            openssl_sign($data, $sign, $res, OPENSSL_ALGO_SHA256);
        } else {
            openssl_sign($data, $sign, $res);
        }
        return base64_encode($sign);
    }

    private function checkEmpty($value) {
        if (!isset($value)) return true;
        if ($value === null) return true;
        if (trim($value) === "") return true;
        return false;
    }

    private function getSignContent($params) {
        ksort($params);
        $stringToBeSigned = "";
        $i = 0;
        foreach ($params as $k => $v) {
            if ($this->checkEmpty($v) === false && "@" != substr($v, 0, 1)) {
                if ($i == 0) {
                    $stringToBeSigned .= "$k" . "=" . "$v";
                } else {
                    $stringToBeSigned .= "&" . "$k" . "=" . "$v";
                }
                $i++;
            }
        }
        return $stringToBeSigned;
    }

    private function characet($data, $targetCharset) {
        if (!empty($data)) {
            $fileType = mb_detect_encoding($data, "UTF-8,GBK,GB2312,ISO-8859-1");
            if ($fileType != $targetCharset) {
                $data = mb_convert_encoding($data, $targetCharset, $fileType);
            }
        }
        return $data;
    }

    private function curlPost($url = '', $postData = '', $options = array()) {
        if (is_array($postData)) {
            $postData = http_build_query($postData);
        }
        $ch = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, 1);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $postData);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, false);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, false);
        if (!empty($options)) {
            curl_setopt_array($ch, $options);
        }
        $output = curl_exec($ch);
        curl_close($ch);
        return $output;
    }
}

class AlipayService {
    private $appId;
    private $charset = 'utf-8';
    private $notifyUrl;
    private $rsaPrivateKey;
    private $totalFee;
    private $outTradeNo;
    private $orderName;
    private $tradeNo;
    private $tranOut;

    }

    }

        $this->totalFee = $payAmount;
    }

    public function setOutTradeNo($outTradeNo) {
        $this->outTradeNo = $outTradeNo;
    }

    public function doSettle() {
        $params = [
            'app_id' => $this->appId,
            'method' => 'alipay.trade.order.settle',
            'charset' => $this->charset,
            'sign_type' => 'RSA',
            'timestamp' => date('Y-m-d H:i:s'),
            'version' => '1.0',
            'biz_content' => json_encode([
                'out_request_no' => $this->outTradeNo,
                'trade_no' => $this->tradeNo,
                'royalty_parameters' => [
                    [
                        'trans_out' => $this->tranOut,
                        'trans_in' => $this->tranIn,
                        'amount' => $this->totalFee,
                        'amount_percentage' => $this->amountPercentage
                    ]
                ]
            ])
        ];
        $params['sign'] = $this->generateSign($params, 'RSA');
        $response = $this->curlPost('https://openapi.alipay.com/gateway.do', http_build_query($params));
        return json_decode($response, true);
    }

    public function generateSign($params, $signType = "RSA") {
        return $this->sign($this->getSignContent($params), $signType);
    }

    public function sign($data, $signType = "RSA") {
        $res = "-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----\n" .
               wordwrap($this->rsaPrivateKey, 64, "\n", true) .
               "\n-----END RSA PRIVATE KEY-----";
        if ($signType == "RSA2") {
            openssl_sign($data, $sign, $res, OPENSSL_ALGO_SHA256);
        } else {
            openssl_sign($data, $sign, $res);
        }
        return base64_encode($sign);
    }

    public function checkEmpty($value) {
        return empty($value);
    }

    public function getSignContent($params) {
        ksort($params);
        $stringToBeSigned = "";
        $i = 0;
        foreach ($params as $k => $v) {
            if ($this->checkEmpty($v) === false && "@" != substr($v, 0, 1)) {
                if ($i == 0) {
                    $stringToBeSigned .= "$k" . "=" . "$v";
                } else {
                    $stringToBeSigned .= "&" . "$k" . "=" . "$v";
                }
                $i++;
            }
        }
        return $stringToBeSigned;
    }

    public function characet($data, $targetCharset) {
        if (!empty($data)) {
            $fileType = mb_detect_encoding($data, "UTF-8, GBK, GB2312, LATIN1, BIG5");
            if ($fileType != $targetCharset) {
                $data = mb_convert_encoding($data, $targetCharset, $fileType);
            }
        }
        return $data;
    }

    public function curlPost($url = '', $postData = '', $options = array()) {
        if (is_array($postData)) {
            $postData = http_build_query($postData);
        }
        $ch = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, 1);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $postData);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        if (!empty($options)) {
            curl_setopt_array($ch, $options);
        }
        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        if (curl_errno($ch)) {
            throw new Exception(curl_error($ch), 0);
        }
        curl_close($ch);
        return $response;
    }
}

                'trans_in' => $this->tranIn,

                'amount_percentage' => $this->amountPercentage
            ])
        ];

        if (!empty($data)) {
            $fileType = mb_detect_encoding($data, "UTF-8, GBK, GB2312, LATIN1, BIG5");
            if ($fileType != $targetCharset) {
                $data = mb_convert_encoding($data, $targetCharset, $fileType);
            }
        }
        return $data;
    }

    private function curlPost($url = '', $postData = '', $options = array()) {
        if (is_array($postData)) {
            $postData = http_build_query($postData);
        }
        $ch = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, 1);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $postData);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, false);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, false);
        if (!empty($options)) {
            curl_setopt_array($ch, $options);
        }
        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        if (curl_errno($ch)) {
            return curl_error($ch);
        }
        curl_close($ch);

<?php

class AlipayService {
    private $appId;
    private $charset = 'utf-8';
    private $notifyUrl;
    private $rsaPrivateKey;
    private $totalFee;
    private $outTradeNo;
    private $orderName;
    private $tradeNo;
    private $tranOut;
    private $tranIn;
    private $amountPercentage;

    public function __construct() {
        $this->charset = 'utf-8';
    }

    public function setAppid($appid) {
        $this->appId = $appid;
    }

    public function setTradeNo($tradeNo) {
        $this->tradeNo = $tradeNo;
    }

    public function setTranOut($tranOut) {
        $this->tranOut = $tranOut;
    }

    public function setTranIn($tranIn) {
        $this->tranIn = $tranIn;
    }

    public function setRsaPrivateKey($rsaPrivateKey) {
        $this->rsaPrivateKey = $rsaPrivateKey;
    }

    public function setTotalFee($payAmount) {
        $this->totalFee = $payAmount;
    }

    public function setOutTradeNo($outTradeNo) {
        $this->outTradeNo = $outTradeNo;
    }

    public function doSettle() {
        $params = [
            'app_id' => $this->appId,
            'method' => 'alipay.trade.order.settle',
            'charset' => $this->charset,
            'sign_type' => 'RSA',
            'timestamp' => date('Y-m-d H:i:s'),
            'version' => '1.0',
            'biz_content' => json_encode([
                'out_request_no' => $this->outTradeNo,
                'trade_no' => $this->tradeNo,
                'royalty_parameters' => [
                    [
                        'trans_out' => $this->tranOut,
                        'trans_in' => $this->tranIn,
                        'amount' => $this->totalFee,
                        'amount_percentage' => $this->amountPercentage
                    ]
                ]
            ])
        ];

        $params['sign'] = $this->generateSign($params);

        $response = $this->curlPost('https://openapi.alipay.com/gateway.do', http_build_query($params));
        return json_decode($response, true);
    }

    private function generateSign($params, $signType = "RSA") {
        return $this->sign($this->getSignContent($params), $signType);
    }

    private function sign($data, $signType = "RSA") {
        $res = "-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----\n" .
            wordwrap($this->rsaPrivateKey, 64, "\n", true) .
            "\n-----END RSA PRIVATE KEY-----";
        if ($signType == "RSA2") {
            openssl_sign($data, $sign, $res, OPENSSL_ALGO_SHA256);
        } else {
            openssl_sign($data, $sign, $res);
        }
        return base64_encode($sign);
    }

    private function checkEmpty($value) {
        if (!isset($value)) return true;
        if ($value === null) return true;
        if (trim($value) === "") return true;
        return false;
    }

    private function getSignContent($params) {
        ksort($params);
        $stringToBeSigned = "";
        $i = 0;
        foreach ($params as $k => $v) {
            if ($this->checkEmpty($v) === false && "@" != substr($v, 0, 1)) {
                if ($i == 0) {
                    $stringToBeSigned .= "$k" . "=" . "$v";
                } else {
                    $stringToBeSigned .= "&" . "$k" . "=" . "$v";
                }
                $i++;
            }
        }
        return $stringToBeSigned;
    }

    private function characet($data, $targetCharset) {
        if (!empty($data)) {
            $fileType = mb_detect_encoding($data, "UTF-8, GBK, GB2312, LATIN1, BIG5");
            if ($fileType != $targetCharset) {
                $data = mb_convert_encoding($data, $targetCharset, $fileType);
            }
        }
        return $data;
    }

    private function curlPost($url = '', $postData = '', $options = array()) {
        if (is_array($postData)) {
            $postData = http_build_query($postData);
        }

        $ch = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, 1);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $postData);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, false);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, false);

        if (!empty($options)) {
            curl_setopt_array($ch, $options);
        }

        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        if ($response === FALSE) {
            echo "cURL Error: " . curl_error($ch);
        }
        curl_close($ch);

        return $response;
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP class that implements an HTTP client using cURL for making HTTP requests, handling cookies, headers, and connection management.

Class Description: HproseHttpClient is a PHP class that extends HproseBaseHttpClient to provide HTTP client functionality using cURL. It handles request sending, response processing, cookie management, and connection settings.

Attributes:
- curl: resource - The cURL session handle
- url: string - The target URL for HTTP requests
- header: array - Additional HTTP headers to be sent with requests
- keepAlive: bool - Whether to use keep-alive connection
- keepAliveTimeout: int - Timeout for keep-alive connection in seconds
- proxy: string - Proxy server address if configured
- timeout: int - Request timeout in milliseconds

Methods:
- __construct(string $url = '') -> void - Initializes the client with optional target URL and creates a cURL session
- formatCookie(array $cookies) -> string - Formats cookies into a header string
- send(string $request) -> string - Sends an HTTP request and returns the response body
  - Input: $request - The request payload to send
  - Output: The response body from the server
- __destruct() -> void - Cleans up by closing the cURL session

The class handles:
1. cURL session initialization and configuration
2. Request header construction (including cookies)
3. SSL verification settings
4. Connection management (keep-alive or close)
5. Proxy configuration
6. Timeout handling
7. Response processing and error checking
8. Resource cleanup

<?php

class HproseHttpClient extends HproseBaseHttpClient {
    private $curl;
    private $url;
    private $header = [];
    private $keepAlive = true;
    private $keepAliveTimeout = 300;
    private $proxy = '';
    private $timeout = 30000;

    public function __construct(string $url = '') {
        $this->url = $url;
        $this->curl = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($this->curl, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($this->curl, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, true);
        curl_setopt($this->curl, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, false);
        curl_setopt($this->curl, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, false);
    }

    private function formatCookie(array $cookies): string {
        $cookieString = '';
        foreach ($cookies as $key => $value) {
            $cookieString .= $key . '=' . $value . '; ';
        }
        return rtrim($cookieString, '; ');
    }

    public function send(string $request): string {
        if (!$this->url) {
            throw new Exception("Target URL is not set.");
        }

        curl_setopt($this->curl, CURLOPT_URL, $this->url);
        curl_setopt($this->curl, CURLOPT_POST, true);
        curl_setopt($this->curl, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $request);

        $headers = $this->header;
        if ($this->keepAlive) {
            $headers[] = 'Connection: keep-alive';
            $headers[] = 'Keep-Alive: ' . $this->keepAliveTimeout;
        } else {
            $headers[] = 'Connection: close';
        }

        if (!empty($this->proxy)) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl, CURLOPT_PROXY, $this->proxy);
        }

        if (!empty($headers)) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
        }

        curl_setopt($this->curl, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT_MS, $this->timeout);

        $response = curl_exec($this->curl);
        if ($response === false) {
            throw new Exception('cURL Error: ' . curl_error($this->curl));
        }

        $httpCode = curl_getinfo($this->curl, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
        if ($httpCode < 200 || $httpCode >= 300) {
            throw new Exception("HTTP Error: $httpCode, Response: $response");
        }

        return $response;
    }

    public function __destruct() {
        if (is_resource($this->curl)) {
            curl_close($this->curl);
        }
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a function to download an image from a given URL and save it to a specified file path using PHP's cURL library.

Function Description: The function uses cURL to make an HTTP request to download an image from the provided URL. It saves the downloaded image to the specified file path. The function includes error handling for the cURL session and file operations.

Input:
- $url (string): The URL of the image to download
- $filepath (string): The local file path where the image should be saved

Output:
- void: The function does not return a value but outputs a success message when the download is complete
- The downloaded image is saved to the specified file path
- Errors during the download process are handled by cURL's error reporting
matched_results:
<?php
function downloadImage($url, $filepath) {
    $ch = curl_init($url);
    if ($ch === false) {
        echo "Failed to initialize cURL session.";
        return;
    }

    $fp = fopen($filepath, 'wb');
    if ($fp === false) {
        echo "Failed to open file for writing.";
        curl_close($ch);
        return;
    }

    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FILE, $fp);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, 0);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, 1);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FAILONERROR, 1);

    $result = curl_exec($ch);
    if ($result === false) {
        echo "cURL error: " . curl_error($ch);
    } else {
        echo "Image downloaded successfully.";
    }

    curl_close($ch);
    fclose($fp);
}
?>

    if ($ch === false) {
        echo "Failed to initialize cURL session.";
        return;
    }

    $fp = fopen($filepath, 'wb');
    if ($fp === false) {
        echo "Failed to open file for writing.";
        curl_close($ch);
        return;
    }

    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FILE, $fp);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, 0);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, true);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FAILONERROR, true);

    $result = curl_exec($ch);
    if ($result === false) {
        echo "cURL error: " . curl_error($ch);
    } else {
        echo "Image downloaded successfully.";
    }

    fclose($fp);
    curl_close($ch);
}

Task Description: Create a PHP class for making HTTP requests using cURL with support for various HTTP methods, streaming, authentication, and proxy configuration.

Class Description: The `baiduRequestCore` class provides a comprehensive wrapper around PHP's cURL functions to simplify HTTP requests. It supports GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, and HEAD methods, handles authentication, manages request/response headers and bodies, and includes streaming capabilities for both uploads and downloads.

Attributes:

request_url: [string] - The URL to send the request to
request_headers: [array] - Associative array of request headers
request_body: [string] - The request body content
response: [string] - The complete response from the server
response_headers: [array] - Associative array of response headers
response_body: [string] - The response body content
response_code: [int] - The HTTP response status code
response_info: [array] - Additional cURL response information

proxy: [array|null] - Proxy configuration details
username: [string|null] - Username for authentication
password: [string|null] - Password for authentication
curlopts: [array|null] - Additional cURL options
debug_mode: [bool] - Whether to enable debug mode
request_class: [string] - Class name for request handling
response_class: [string] - Class name for response handling
useragent: [string] - User agent string
read_file: [string|null] - File path for reading data
read_stream: [resource|null] - Stream resource for reading data
read_stream_size: [int|null] - Size of the read stream
read_stream_read: [int] - Bytes read from the stream
write_file: [string|null] - File path for writing data
write_stream: [resource|null] - Stream resource for writing data
seek_position: [int|null] - Position to seek in the read stream
registered_streaming_read_callback: [callable|null] - Callback for streaming reads
registered_streaming_write_callback: [callable|null] - Callback for streaming writes

<?php

class baiduRequestCore {
    public $request_url;
    public $request_headers = [];
    public $request_body;
    public $response;
    public $response_headers = [];
    public $response_body;
    public $response_code;
    public $response_info = [];
    public $curl_handle;
    public $method = 'GET';
    public $proxy;
    public $username;
    public $password;
    public $curlopts = [];
    public $debug_mode = false;
    public $request_class;
    public $response_class;
    public $useragent;
    public $read_file;
    public $read_stream;
    public $read_stream_size;
    public $read_stream_read = 0;
    public $write_file;
    public $write_stream;
    public $seek_position;
    public $registered_streaming_read_callback;
    public $registered_streaming_write_callback;

    public function __construct($url = null, $proxy = null, $helpers = null) {
        if ($url) $this->request_url = $url;
        if ($proxy) $this->proxy = $proxy;
        if ($helpers) {
            if (isset($helpers['request'])) $this->request_class = $helpers['request'];
            if (isset($helpers['response'])) $this->response_class = $helpers['response'];
        }
    }

    public function __destruct() {
        if ($this->read_stream && is_resource($this->read_stream)) fclose($this->read_stream);
        if ($this->write_stream && is_resource($this->write_stream)) fclose($this->write_stream);
    }

    public function set_credentials($user, $pass) {
        $this->username = $user;
        $this->password = $pass;
        return $this;
    }

    public function add_header($key, $value) {
        $this->request_headers[$key] = $value;
        return $this;
    }

    public function remove_header($key) {
        unset($this->request_headers[$key]);
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_method($method) {
        $this->method = strtoupper($method);
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_useragent($ua) {
        $this->useragent = $ua;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_body($body) {
        $this->request_body = $body;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_request_url($url) {
        $this->request_url = $url;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_curlopts($curlopts) {
        $this->curlopts = $curlopts;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_read_stream_size($size) {
        $this->read_stream_size = $size;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_read_stream($resource, $size = null) {
        $this->read_stream = $resource;
        if ($size) $this->read_stream_size = $size;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_read_file($location) {
        $this->read_file = $location;
        $this->read_stream = fopen($location, 'r');
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_write_stream($resource) {
        $this->write_stream = $resource;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_write_file($location) {
        $this->write_file = $location;
        $this->write_stream = fopen($location, 'w');
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_proxy($proxy) {
        $this->proxy = $proxy;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_seek_position($position) {
        $this->seek_position = $position;
        return $this;
    }

    public function register_streaming_read_callback($callback) {
        $this->registered_streaming_read_callback = $callback;
        return $this;
    }

    public function register_streaming_write_callback($callback) {
        $this->registered_streaming_write_callback = $callback;
        return $this;
    }

    public function streaming_read_callback($curl_handle, $file_handle, $length) {
        if ($this->registered_streaming_read_callback) {
            return call_user_func($this->registered_streaming_read_callback, $curl_handle, $file_handle, $length);
        }
        return fread($file_handle, $length);
    }

    public function streaming_write_callback($curl_handle, $data) {
        if ($this->registered_streaming_write_callback) {
            return call_user_func($this->registered_streaming_write_callback, $curl_handle, $data);
        }
        return fwrite($this->write_stream, $data);
    }

    public function prep_request() {
        $this->curl_handle = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, $this->request_url);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_HEADER, true);

        if ($this->username && $this->password) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_USERPWD, "{$this->username}:{$this->password}");
        }

        if ($this->proxy) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_PROXY, $this->proxy);
        }

        if ($this->useragent) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, $this->useragent);
        }

        if ($this->method == 'POST') {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_POST, true);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $this->request_body);
        } elseif ($this->method != 'GET') {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, $this->method);
            if ($this->request_body) {
                curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $this->request_body);
            }
        }

        if ($this->request_headers) {
            $headers = [];
            foreach ($this->request_headers as $key => $value) {
                $headers[] = "{$key}: {$value}";
            }
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
        }

        if ($this->read_stream) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_UPLOAD, true);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_INFILE, $this->read_stream);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_INFILESIZE, $this->read_stream_size);
            if ($this->seek_position) {
                fseek($this->read_stream, $this->seek_position);
            }
        }

        if ($this->write_stream) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, [$this, 'streaming_write_callback']);
        }

        if ($this->curlopts) {
            foreach ($this->curlopts as $key => $value) {
                curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, $key, $value);
            }
        }

        return $this->curl_handle;
    }

    public function process_response($curl_handle, $response) {
        $header_size = curl_getinfo($curl_handle, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
        $this->response_headers = substr($response, 0, $header_size);
        $this->response_body = substr($response, $header_size);
        $this->response_code = curl_getinfo($curl_handle, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
        $this->response_info = curl_getinfo($curl_handle);
        curl_close($curl_handle);
        return $this->response_body;
    }

    public function send_request($parse = true) {
        $curl_handle = $this->prep_request();
        $response = curl_exec($curl_handle);
        if ($parse) {
            return $this->process_response($curl_handle, $response);
        }
        return $response;
    }

    public function get_response_header($header = null) {
        if ($header) {
            foreach (explode("\r\n", $this->response_headers) as $line) {
                if (stripos($line, $header) === 0) {
                    return trim(substr($line, strlen($header) + 1));
                }
            }
            return null;
        }
        return $this->response_headers;
    }

    public function get_response_body() {
        return $this->response_body;
    }

    public function get_response_code() {
        return $this->response_code;
    }
}

        if ($this->request_headers) {

            foreach ($this->request_headers as $key => $value) {
                $headers[] = "{$key}: {$value}";
            }
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
        }

        if ($this->request_body) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $this->request_body);
        }

        if ($this->curlopts) {
            foreach ($this->curlopts as $key => $value) {
                curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, $key, $value);
            }
        }

        if ($this->read_stream) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_READFUNCTION, [$this, 'streaming_read_callback']);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_INFILE, $this->read_stream);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_INFILESIZE, $this->read_stream_size);
        }

        if ($this->write_stream) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, [$this, 'streaming_write_callback']);
        }

        return $this->curl_handle;
    }

    public function process_response($curl_handle, $response)
    {
        $this->response = $response;
        $this->response_code = curl_getinfo($curl_handle, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
        $this->response_info = curl_getinfo($curl_handle);

        $header_size = curl_getinfo($curl_handle, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
        $this->response_headers = substr($response, 0, $header_size);
        $this->response_body = substr($response, $header_size);

        return $this->response_body;
    }

    public function send_request($parse = true)
    {
        $curl_handle = $this->prep_request();
        $response = curl_exec($curl_handle);

        if ($parse) {
            return $this->process_response($curl_handle, $response);
        }

        return $response;
    }

    public function get_response_header($header = null)
    {
        if ($header) {
            foreach (explode("\r\n", $this->response_headers) as $line) {
                if (stripos($line, $header) === 0) {
                    return trim(substr($line, strlen($header) + 1));
                }
            }
            return null;
        }
        return $this->response_headers;
    }

    public function get_response_body()
    {
        return $this->response_body;
    }

    public function get_response_code()
    {
        return $this->response_code;
    }
}

Task Description: Create a PHP class that handles HTTP requests using cURL with file download capabilities, including error handling and size limitations.

Class Description: The timthumb class provides functionality to download files from URLs using cURL with progress tracking and size limitations. It includes error handling for common HTTP status codes and fallback to file_get_contents when cURL is not available.

Attributes:
- $curlFH: [resource|false] - File handle for writing downloaded data
- $curlDataWritten: [int] - Tracks the amount of data written during download
- $lastURLError: [string|false] - Stores the last error message encountered during URL fetching

Methods:
- curlWrite($h, $d): [int] - [Static callback function for cURL write operations. Writes data to file and tracks total size written. Returns 0 if size limit exceeded, otherwise returns bytes written]
  - $h: [resource] - cURL handle
  - $d: [string] - Data to write
  - Returns: [int] - Number of bytes processed

- getURL($url, $tempfile): [bool] - [Fetches content from URL and saves to temporary file. Uses cURL if available, falls back to file_get_contents. Handles HTTP errors and size limitations]
  - $url: [string] - URL to fetch
  - $tempfile: [string] - Path to temporary file for saving content
  - Returns: [bool] - True on success, False on failure

<?php

class timthumb {
    private $curlFH = false;
    private $curlDataWritten = 0;
    private $lastURLError = false;
    const MAX_FILE_SIZE = 10485760; // 10 MB

    private static function curlWrite($h, $d) {
        $instance = self::getInstance();
        $len = strlen($d);
        if ($instance->curlDataWritten + $len > self::MAX_FILE_SIZE) {
            return 0;
        }
        $instance->curlDataWritten += $len;
        return fwrite($instance->curlFH, $d);
    }

    public function getURL($url, $tempfile) {
        $this->lastURLError = false;
        $this->curlDataWritten = 0;
        $this->curlFH = fopen($tempfile, 'wb');
        if ($this->curlFH === false) {
            $this->lastURLError = 'Failed to open temporary file for writing';
            return false;
        }

        if (function_exists('curl_init')) {
            $ch = curl_init($url);
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, true);
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, 'self::curlWrite');
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, 0);
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FAILONERROR, true);
            $result = curl_exec($ch);
            if ($result === false) {
                $this->lastURLError = curl_error($ch);
                curl_close($ch);
                fclose($this->curlFH);
                return false;
            }
            curl_close($ch);
        } else {
            $context = stream_context_create([
                'http' => [
                    'follow_location' => 1,
                    'max_redirects' => 10,
                    'timeout' => 30,
                ]
            ]);
            $data = file_get_contents($url, false, $context);
            if ($data === false) {
                $this->lastURLError = 'Failed to fetch URL using file_get_contents';
                fclose($this->curlFH);
                return false;
            }
            if (strlen($data) > self::MAX_FILE_SIZE) {
                $this->lastURLError = 'File size exceeds the maximum limit';
                fclose($this->curlFH);
                return false;
            }
            fwrite($this->curlFH, $data);
        }

        fclose($this->curlFH);
        return true;
    }

    public function getLastURLError() {
        return $this->lastURLError;
    }

    private static function getInstance() {
        static $instance = null;
        if ($instance === null) {
            $instance = new self();
        }
        return $instance;
    }
}

Task Description: Create a PHP class that implements HTTP client functionality using cURL, supporting various HTTP methods, streaming, authentication, and proxy configuration.

Class Description: The RequestCore class provides a comprehensive HTTP client implementation using PHP's cURL extension. It supports standard HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, HEAD), handles request/response processing, streaming uploads/downloads, authentication, proxy configuration, and SSL verification.

Attributes:

request_url: string - The URL to send the request to
request_headers: array - Associative array of request headers
request_body: string - The request body content
response: string - The complete response including headers and body
response_headers: array - Parsed response headers
response_body: string - The response body content
response_code: int - HTTP response status code
response_info: array - Additional cURL response information
curl_handle: resource - The cURL handle resource
method: string - HTTP method (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, HEAD)
proxy: array|null - Proxy configuration details
username: string|null - Username for authentication
password: string|null - Password for authentication
curlopts: array|null - Additional cURL options
debug_mode: bool - Whether to enable debug mode
request_class: string - Class name for request handling
response_class: string - Class name for response handling
useragent: string - User-Agent header value
read_file: string|null - File path for streaming read
read_stream: resource|null - Stream resource for reading
read_stream_size: int|null - Size of read stream
read_stream_read: int - Bytes read from stream
write_file: string|null - File path for streaming write
write_stream: resource|null - Stream resource for writing
seek_position: int|null - Position to seek in read stream
cacert_location: mixed - CA certificate location
ssl_verification: bool - Whether to verify SSL
registered_streaming_read_callback: callable|null - Callback for streaming read
registered_streaming_write_callback: callable|null - Callback for streaming write
timeout: int - Request timeout in seconds
connect_timeout: int - Connection timeout in seconds

Methods:

__construct(string $url = null, string $proxy = null, array $helpers = null) -> self - Initializes the request with URL and optional proxy/helpers
__destruct() -> self - Cleans up open file handles
set_credentials(string $user, string $pass) -> self - Sets authentication credentials
add_header(string $key, string $value) -> self - Adds a request header
remove_header(string $key) -> self - Removes a request header
set_method(string $method) -> self - Sets the HTTP method
set_useragent(string $ua) -> self - Sets the User-Agent header
set_body(string $body) -> self - Sets the request body
set_request_url(string $url) -> self - Sets the request URL
set_curlopts(array $curlopts) -> self - Sets additional cURL options
set_read_stream_size(int $size) -> self - Sets the read stream size
set_read_stream(resource $resource, int $size = null) -> self - Sets the read stream resource

set_write_stream(resource $resource) -> self - Sets the write stream resource

set_proxy(string $proxy) -> self - Configures proxy settings
set_seek_position(int $position) -> self - Sets the seek position for read stream
register_streaming_read_callback(callable $callback) -> self - Registers streaming read callback
register_streaming_write_callback(callable $callback) -> self - Registers streaming write callback

streaming_write_callback(resource $curl_handle, string $data) -> int - Callback for streaming write
prep_request() -> resource - Prepares and returns a cURL handle
process_response(resource $curl_handle = null, string $response = null) -> mixed - Processes the cURL response
send_request(bool $parse = false) -> mixed - Sends the request and returns response
send_multi_request(array $handles, array $opt = null) -> array - Sends multiple requests in parallel

<?php

class RequestCore {
    public $request_url;
    public $request_headers = [];
    public $request_body;
    public $response;
    public $response_headers = [];
    public $response_body;
    public $response_code;
    public $response_info = [];
    public $curl_handle;
    public $method = 'GET';
    public $proxy;
    public $username;
    public $password;
    public $curlopts = [];
    public $debug_mode = false;
    public $request_class = 'RequestCore';
    public $response_class = 'ResponseCore';
    public $useragent = 'RequestCore/1.0';
    public $read_file;
    public $read_stream;
    public $read_stream_size;
    public $read_stream_read = 0;
    public $write_file;
    public $write_stream;
    public $seek_position;
    public $cacert_location;
    public $ssl_verification = true;
    public $registered_streaming_read_callback;
    public $registered_streaming_write_callback;
    public $timeout = 60;
    public $connect_timeout = 30;

    public function __construct($url = null, $proxy = null, $helpers = null) {
        $this->request_url = $url;
        $this->proxy = $proxy;
        if ($helpers) {
            foreach ($helpers as $key => $value) {
                $this->$key = $value;
            }
        }
    }

    public function __destruct() {
        if (is_resource($this->read_stream)) {
            fclose($this->read_stream);
        }
        if (is_resource($this->write_stream)) {
            fclose($this->write_stream);
        }
    }

    public function set_credentials($user, $pass) {
        $this->username = $user;
        $this->password = $pass;
        return $this;
    }

    public function add_header($key, $value) {
        $this->request_headers[$key] = $value;
        return $this;
    }

    public function remove_header($key) {
        unset($this->request_headers[$key]);
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_method($method) {
        $this->method = strtoupper($method);
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_useragent($ua) {
        $this->useragent = $ua;

            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, true);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, 2);

            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, 0);
        }

        if ($this->proxy) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_PROXY, $this->proxy);
        }

        if ($this->username && $this->password) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_HTTPAUTH, CURLAUTH_BASIC);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_USERPWD, "{$this->username}:{$this->password}");
        }

        if ($this->method == 'POST') {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_POST, true);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $this->request_body);
        } elseif ($this->method == 'PUT') {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'PUT');
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $this->request_body);
        } elseif ($this->method == 'DELETE') {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'DELETE');
        } elseif ($this->method == 'HEAD') {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOBODY, true);
        }

        if ($this->request_headers) {
            $headers = [];
            foreach ($this->request_headers as $key => $value) {
                $headers[] = "{$key}: {$value}";
            }
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
        }

        if ($this->read_stream) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_UPLOAD, true);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_INFILE, $this->read_stream);
            if ($this->read_stream_size) {

        }

        $header_size = curl_getinfo($curl_handle, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
        $this->response_headers = substr($response, 0, $header_size);
        $this->response_body = substr($response, $header_size);
        $this->response_code = curl_getinfo($curl_handle, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
        $this->response_info = curl_getinfo($curl_handle);

        curl_close($curl_handle);

        return $this->response_body;
    }

    public function send_request($parse = false)
    {
        $this->prep_request();
        $response = curl_exec($this->curl_handle);
        if ($parse) {
            return $this->process_response($this->curl_handle, $response);
        }
        return $response;
    }

    public function send_multi_request($handles, $opt = null)
    {
        $multi_handle = curl_multi_init();
        $results = [];

        foreach ($handles as $handle) {
            curl_multi_add_handle($multi_handle, $handle);
        }

        $active = null;
        do {
            $mrc = curl_multi_exec($multi_handle, $active);
        } while ($mrc == CURLM_CALL_MULTI_PERFORM);

        while ($active && $mrc == CURLM_OK) {
            if (curl_multi_select($multi_handle) != -1) {
                do {
                    $mrc = curl_multi_exec($multi_handle, $active);
                } while ($mrc == CURLM_CALL_MULTI_PERFORM);
            }
        }

        foreach ($handles as $handle) {
            $results[] = curl_multi_getcontent($handle);
            curl_multi_remove_handle($multi_handle, $handle);
        }

        curl_multi_close($multi_handle);

        return $results;
    }

            return call_user_func($this->registered_streaming_read_callback, $curl_handle, $file_handle, $length);
        }
        return fread($file_handle, $length);

    public function streaming_write_callback($curl_handle, $data) {
        if ($this->registered_streaming_write_callback) {
            return call_user_func($this->registered_streaming_write_callback, $curl_handle, $data);
        }
        return fwrite($this->write_stream, $data);

    public function prep_request() {
        $this->curl_handle = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, $this->request_url);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_HEADER, true);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, $this->timeout);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_CONNECTTIMEOUT, $this->connect_timeout);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, $this->useragent);

        if ($this->ssl_verification) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, true);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, 2);
            if ($this->cacert_location) {
                curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_CAINFO, $this->cacert_location);
            }
        } else {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, false);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, 0);
        }

        if ($this->proxy) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_PROXY, $this->proxy);
        }

        if ($this->username && $this->password) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_USERPWD, $this->username . ':' . $this->password);
        }

        if ($this->method == 'POST') {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_POST, true);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $this->request_body);
        } elseif ($this->method == 'PUT' || $this->method == 'DELETE') {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, $this->method);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $this->request_body);
        } elseif ($this->method == 'HEAD') {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOBODY, true);
        }

        if ($this->read_stream) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_UPLOAD, true);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_INFILE, $this->read_stream);
            if ($this->read_stream_size) {
                curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_INFILESIZE, $this->read_stream_size);
            }
        }

        if ($this->write_stream) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, [$this, 'streaming_write_callback']);
        }

        if ($this->request_headers) {
            $headers = [];
            foreach ($this->request_headers as $key => $value) {
                $headers[] = $key . ': ' . $value;
            }
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
        }

        if ($this->curlopts) {
            curl_setopt_array($this->curl_handle, $this->curlopts);
        }

        return $this->curl_handle;

        }
        return $this->response;
    }

        $curl_handle = $this->prep_request();
        $response = $this->process_response($curl_handle);
        if ($parse) {
            return $this->response_body;
        }
        return $response;
    }

        foreach ($handles as $handle) {

        return $this->curl_handle;
    }

    public function process_response($curl_handle = null, $response = null)
    {
        if ($curl_handle) {
            $this->response = curl_exec($curl_handle);
            $this->response_info = curl_getinfo($curl_handle);
            $this->response_code = $this->response_info['http_code'];
            $header_size = $this->response_info['header_size'];
            $this->response_headers = substr($this->response, 0, $header_size);
            $this->response_body = substr($this->response, $header_size);
            curl_close($curl_handle);
        } else {
            $this->response = $response;
        }
        return $this->response;
    }

    public function send_request($parse = false)
    {
        $curl_handle = $this->prep_request();
        $response = $this->process_response($curl_handle);
        if ($parse) {
            return $this->response_body;
        }
        return $response;
    }

    public function send_multi_request($handles, $opt = null)
    {
        $multi_handle = curl_multi_init();
        $results = [];

        foreach ($handles as $handle) {
            curl_multi_add_handle($multi_handle, $handle);
        }

        $active = null;
        do {
            $mrc = curl_multi_exec($multi_handle, $active);
        } while ($mrc == CURLM_CALL_MULTI_PERFORM);

        while ($active && $mrc == CURLM_OK) {
            if (curl_multi_select($multi_handle) != -1) {
                do {
                    $mrc = curl_multi_exec($multi_handle, $active);
                } while ($mrc == CURLM_CALL_MULTI_PERFORM);
            }
        }

        foreach ($handles as $handle) {
            $results[] = curl_multi_getcontent($handle);
            curl_multi_remove_handle($multi_handle, $handle);
        }

        curl_multi_close($multi_handle);
        return $results;
    }
}

Task Description: Create a PHP class that implements an HTTP client using cURL to make HTTP requests, handle responses, and manage redirects while maintaining request details like headers, status codes, and response body.

Class Description: The `File` class represents an HTTP client that uses cURL to make HTTP requests. It handles request execution, response parsing, redirect following, and error management. It implements the `SimplePie\HTTP\Response` interface, providing methods to access response details.

Attributes:

- url: string - The final requested URL after any redirects
- useragent: string - The user agent string used for the request
- success: bool - Indicates whether the request was successful
- headers: array - The response headers from the request
- body: string - The response body content
- status_code: int - The HTTP status code of the response
- redirects: int - The number of redirects followed
- error: string - Any error message encountered during the request
- method: int - The method used for the request (bitmask)
- permanent_url: string - The original URL before any redirects
- permanentUrlMutable: bool - Flag indicating if permanent URL can be changed

Methods:

- __construct(string $url, int $timeout = 10, int $redirects = 5, ?array $headers = null, ?string $useragent = null, bool $force_fsockopen = false, array $curl_options = []) -> void - Initializes the HTTP client, makes the request, and processes the response. Handles redirects recursively.
- get_body_content(): string - Returns the response body content
- get_headers(): array - Returns the response headers
- get_status_code(): int - Returns the HTTP status code
- get_final_requested_uri(): string - Returns the final URL after any redirects
- get_permanent_uri(): string - Returns the original URL before any redirects

<?php

namespace SimplePie\HTTP;

class File implements Response
{
    private $url;
    private $useragent;
    private $success;
    private $headers;
    private $body;
    private $status_code;
    private $redirects;
    private $error;
    private $method;
    private $permanent_url;
    private $permanentUrlMutable;

    public function __construct(string $url, int $timeout = 10, int $redirects = 5, ?array $headers = null, ?string $useragent = null, bool $force_fsockopen = false, array $curl_options = [])
    {
        $this->url = $url;
        $this->permanent_url = $url;
        $this->permanentUrlMutable = true;
        $this->useragent = $useragent ?? 'SimplePie HTTP Client';
        $this->redirects = $redirects;
        $this->headers = [];
        $this->body = '';
        $this->status_code = 0;
        $this->error = '';
        $this->method = 0;

        $this->makeRequest($url, $timeout, $redirects, $headers, $curl_options);
    }

    private function makeRequest(string $url, int $timeout, int $redirects, ?array $headers, array $curl_options)
    {
        $ch = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, false);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, $timeout);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, $this->useragent);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, true);

        if ($headers) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
        }

        foreach ($curl_options as $option => $value) {
            curl_setopt($ch, $option, $value);
        }

        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        if ($response === false) {
            $this->error = curl_error($ch);
            $this->success = false;
        } else {
            $header_size = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
            $this->headers = $this->parseHeaders(substr($response, 0, $header_size));
            $this->body = substr($response, $header_size);
            $this->status_code = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
            $this->url = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_EFFECTIVE_URL);
            $this->success = $this->status_code >= 200 && $this->status_code < 300;

            if ($this->status_code >= 300 && $this->status_code < 400 && $redirects > 0) {
                $location = $this->headers['Location'] ?? $this->headers['location'] ?? null;
                if ($location) {
                    if ($this->permanentUrlMutable) {
                        $this->permanent_url = $location;
                    }
                    curl_close($ch);
                    $this->makeRequest($location, $timeout, $redirects - 1, $headers, $curl_options);
                    return;
                }
            }
        }

        curl_close($ch);
    }

    private function parseHeaders(string $headerContent): array
    {
        $headers = [];
        $lines = explode("\r\n", $headerContent);
        foreach ($lines as $line) {
            if (strpos($line, ':') !== false) {
                list($key, $value) = explode(': ', $line, 2);
                $headers[$key] = $value;
            }
        }
        return $headers;
    }

    public function get_body_content(): string
    {
        return $this->body;
    }

    public function get_headers(): array
    {
        return $this->headers;
    }

    public function get_status_code(): int
    {
        return $this->status_code;
    }

    public function get_final_requested_uri(): string
    {
        return $this->url;
    }

    public function get_permanent_uri(): string
    {
        return $this->permanent_url;
    }
}

            if ($this->status_code >= 300 && $this->status_code < 400 && $redirects > 0) {
                $new_url = $this->getRedirectUrl($this->headers);
                if ($new_url) {
                    $this->redirects++;
                    if ($this->permanentUrlMutable) {
                        $this->permanent_url = $new_url;
                    }
                    curl_close($ch);
                    $this->makeRequest($new_url, $timeout, $redirects - 1, $headers, $curl_options);
                    return;
                }
            }
        }

        curl_close($ch);
    }

    private function parseHeaders($headerString)
    {
        $headers = [];
        $lines = explode("\r\n", $headerString);
        foreach ($lines as $line) {
            if (strpos($line, ': ') !== false) {
                list($key, $value) = explode(': ', $line, 2);
                $headers[$key] = $value;
            }
        }
        return $headers;
    }

    private function getRedirectUrl($headers)
    {
        return $headers['Location'] ?? null;
    }

    public function get_body_content(): string
    {
        return $this->body;
    }

    public function get_headers(): array
    {
        return $this->headers;
    }

    public function get_status_code(): int
    {
        return $this->status_code;
    }

    public function get_final_requested_uri(): string
    {
        return $this->url;
    }

    public function get_permanent_uri(): string
    {
        return $this->permanent_url;
    }
}
