namespace SimplePie\HTTP;

class File implements Response
{
    private $url;
    private $useragent;
    private $success;
    private $headers;
    private $body;
    private $status_code;
    private $redirects;
    private $error;
    private $method;
    private $permanent_url;
    private $permanentUrlMutable;

    public function __construct(string $url, int $timeout = 10, int $redirects = 5, ?array $headers = null, ?string $useragent = null, bool $force_fsockopen = false, array $curl_options = [])
    {
        $this->url = $url;
        $this->permanent_url = $url;
        $this->permanentUrlMutable = true;
        $this->useragent = $useragent ?? 'SimplePie HTTP Client';
        $this->redirects = 0;
        $this->headers = [];
        $this->body = '';
        $this->status_code = 0;
        $this->error = '';
        $this->method = 0;

        $this->makeRequest($url, $timeout, $redirects, $headers, $curl_options);
    }

    private function makeRequest(string $url, int $timeout, int $redirects, ?array $headers, array $curl_options)
    {
        $ch = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, $timeout);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS, $redirects);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, $this->useragent);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, true);

        if ($headers) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
        }

        foreach ($curl_options as $option => $value) {
            curl_setopt($ch, $option, $value);
        }

        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        if ($response === false) {
            $this->error = curl_error($ch);
            $this->success = false;
        } else {
            $header_size = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
            $this->headers = $this->parseHeaders(substr($response, 0, $header_size));
            $this->body = substr($response, $header_size);
            $this->status_code = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
            $this->url = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_EFFECTIVE_URL);
            $this->success = $this->status_code >= 200 && $this->status_code < 300;
        }

        curl_close($ch);
    }

    private function parseHeaders(string $header_string): array
    {
        $headers = [];
        $lines = explode("\r\n", $header_string);
        foreach ($lines as $line) {
            if (strpos($line, ':') !== false) {
                list($key, $value) = explode(':', $line, 2);
                $headers[trim($key)] = trim($value);
            }
        }
        return $headers;
    }

    public function get_body_content(): string
    {
        return $this->body;
    }

    public function get_headers(): array
    {
        return $this->headers;
    }

    public function get_status_code(): int
    {
        return $this->status_code;
    }

    public function get_final_requested_uri(): string
    {
        return $this->url;
    }

    public function get_permanent_uri(): string
    {
        return $this->permanent_url;
    }
}

<?php

namespace SimplePie\HTTP;

class File implements Response
{
    private $url;
    private $useragent;
    private $success = false;
    private $headers = [];
    private $body = '';
    private $status_code = 0;
    private $redirects = 0;
    private $error = '';
    private $method;
    private $permanent_url;
    private $permanentUrlMutable = true;

    public function __construct(
        string $url,
        int $timeout = 10,
        int $redirects = 5,
        ?array $headers = null,
        ?string $useragent = null,
        bool $force_fsockopen = false,
        array $curl_options = []
    ) {
        $this->permanent_url = $url;
        $this->url = $url;
        $this->useragent = $useragent ?? 'SimplePie HTTP Client';
        $this->redirects = $redirects;

        $ch = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, $timeout);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, false);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, true);

        if ($headers) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
        }

        if ($useragent) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, $useragent);
        }

        foreach ($curl_options as $option => $value) {
            curl_setopt($ch, $option, $value);
        }

        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        $info = curl_getinfo($ch);
        $error = curl_error($ch);
        $this->status_code = $info['http_code'];

        if ($response === false) {
            $this->error = $error;
            curl_close($ch);
            return;
        }

        $header_size = $info['header_size'];
        $this->headers = $this->parse_headers(substr($response, 0, $header_size));
        $this->body = substr($response, $header_size);

        if ($this->status_code >= 300 && $this->status_code < 400 && $redirects > 0) {
            $location = $this->headers['Location'] ?? null;
            if ($location) {
                $this->redirects--;
                $this->url = $location;
                curl_close($ch);
                $this->__construct($location, $timeout, $this->redirects, $headers, $useragent, $force_fsockopen, $curl_options);
                return;
            }
        }

        $this->success = $this->status_code >= 200 && $this->status_code < 300;
        curl_close($ch);
    }

    private function parse_headers(string $header_string): array
    {
        $headers = [];
        $lines = explode("\r\n", $header_string);
        foreach ($lines as $line) {
            if (strpos($line, ':') !== false) {
                [$key, $value] = explode(':', $line, 2);
                $headers[trim($key)] = trim($value);
            }
        }
        return $headers;
    }

    public function get_body_content(): string
    {
        return $this->body;
    }

    public function get_headers(): array
    {
        return $this->headers;
    }

    public function get_status_code(): int
    {
        return $this->status_code;
    }

    public function get_final_requested_uri(): string
    {
        return $this->url;
    }

    public function get_permanent_uri(): string
    {
        return $this->permanent_url;
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Implement a PHP class that interacts with the Online-Convert API to handle file conversion jobs, including creating new conversion jobs and checking job statuses.

Class Description: The elFinderEditorOnlineConvert class extends elFinderEditor and provides functionality to interact with the Online-Convert API. It handles initialization, API key validation, and processing conversion requests through HTTP calls using cURL.

Attributes:
- allowed: array - Defines the allowed actions for this editor (init and api)

Methods:
- enabled() -> bool - Checks if the editor is enabled by verifying the API key constant and that Online-Convert isn't disabled
- init() -> array - Initializes the editor and checks for API key and cURL availability
- api() -> array - Main method to handle API interactions with Online-Convert service. Processes both job creation and status checking

Method Details:
1. enabled() -> bool
   - Input: None
   - Output: Returns true if the editor is enabled (API key defined and Online-Convert not disabled)

2. init() -> array
   - Input: None
   - Output: Returns array with API availability status (checks for API key and cURL function)

3. api() -> array
   - Input: (Handled through class properties)
     - category: string - Conversion category
     - convert: string - Target conversion format
     - options: string/array - Conversion options
     - source: string - Source file URL
     - filename: string - Name of the file
     - mime: string - MIME type of the file
     - jobid: string - Job ID for status checking
   - Output: Returns array containing either:
     - API response data
     - Error information
     - Empty array for non-API conversions
matched_results:
<?php

class elFinderEditorOnlineConvert extends elFinderEditor {
    protected $allowed = ['init', 'api'];

    private function getApiKey() {
        return defined('ONLINE_CONVERT_API_KEY') ? ONLINE_CONVERT_API_KEY : '';
    }

    public function enabled() {
        return $this->getApiKey() && !defined('DISABLE_ONLINE_CONVERT');
    }

    public function init() {
        return [
            'api' => $this->getApiKey() ? true : false,
            'curl' => function_exists('curl_version') ? true : false
        ];
    }

    public function api() {
        $apiKey = $this->getApiKey();
        if (!$apiKey) {
            return ['error' => 'API key is not defined'];
        }

        if (!function_exists('curl_version')) {
            return ['error' => 'cURL is not available'];
        }

        $category = $this->input['category'] ?? '';
        $convert = $this->input['convert'] ?? '';
        $options = $this->input['options'] ?? [];
        $source = $this->input['source'] ?? '';
        $filename = $this->input['filename'] ?? '';
        $mime = $this->input['mime'] ?? '';
        $jobid = $this->input['jobid'] ?? '';

        if ($jobid) {
            return $this->checkJobStatus($apiKey, $jobid);
        } else {
            return $this->createJob($apiKey, $category, $convert, $options, $source, $filename, $mime);
        }
    }

    private function createJob($apiKey, $category, $convert, $options, $source, $filename, $mime) {
        $url = 'https://api2.online-convert.com/jobs';
        $data = [
            'conversion' => [
                [
                    'category' => $category,
                    'target' => $convert,
                    'options' => $options
                ]
            ],
            'input' => [
                [
                    'type' => 'remote',
                    'source' => $source,
                    'filename' => $filename,
                    'content_type' => $mime
                ]
            ]
        ];

        $response = $this->makeApiRequest($url, $data, $apiKey);
        return $response;
    }

    private function checkJobStatus($apiKey, $jobid) {
        $url = 'https://api2.online-convert.com/jobs/' . $jobid;
        $response = $this->makeApiRequest($url, [], $apiKey, 'GET');
        return $response;
    }

    private function makeApiRequest($url, $data, $apiKey, $method = 'POST') {
        $ch = curl_init();
        $headers = [
            'x-oc-api-key: ' . $apiKey,
            'Content-Type: application/json'
        ];

        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);

        if ($method === 'POST') {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, 1);
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, json_encode($data));
        }

        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        $httpCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
        curl_close($ch);

        if ($httpCode >= 200 && $httpCode < 300) {
            return json_decode($response, true);
        } else {
            return ['error' => 'API request failed', 'status' => $httpCode, 'response' => $response];
        }
    }
}

<?php

class elFinderEditorOnlineConvert extends elFinderEditor {
    protected $allowed = array('init', 'api');

    public function enabled() {
        return defined('ONLINE_CONVERT_API_KEY') && ONLINE_CONVERT_API_KEY && !defined('ELFINDER_DISABLE_ONLINE_CONVERT');
    }

    public function init() {
        $res = array('api' => false);
        if ($this->enabled() && function_exists('curl_init')) {
            $res['api'] = true;
        }
        return $res;
    }

    public function api() {
        $res = array();
        if (!$this->enabled()) {
            return array('error' => 'Online-Convert API is disabled or not configured.');
        }

        $category = $this->input('category');
        $convert = $this->input('convert');
        $options = $this->input('options');
        $source = $this->input('source');
        $filename = $this->input('filename');
        $mime = $this->input('mime');
        $jobid = $this->input('jobid');

        if ($jobid) {
            $res = $this->checkJobStatus($jobid);
        } else {
            $res = $this->createJob($category, $convert, $options, $source, $filename, $mime);
        }

        return $res;
    }

    private function createJob($category, $convert, $options, $source, $filename, $mime) {
        $url = 'https://api2.online-convert.com/jobs';
        $data = array(
            'conversion' => array(
                array(
                    'category' => $category,
                    'target' => $convert,
                    'options' => $options
                )
            ),
            'input' => array(
                array(
                    'type' => 'remote',
                    'source' => $source,
                    'filename' => $filename,
                    'content_type' => $mime
                )
            )
        );

        $response = $this->curlRequest($url, json_encode($data));
        return $response;
    }

    private function checkJobStatus($jobid) {
        $url = 'https://api2.online-convert.com/jobs/' . $jobid;
        $response = $this->curlRequest($url);
        return $response;
    }

    private function curlRequest($url, $postFields = null) {
        $ch = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, array(
            'x-oc-api-key: ' . ONLINE_CONVERT_API_KEY,
            'Content-Type: application/json'
        ));

        if ($postFields) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, 1);
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $postFields);
        }

        $result = curl_exec($ch);
        if (curl_errno($ch)) {
            $result = array('error' => curl_error($ch));
        } else {
            $result = json_decode($result, true);
        }
        curl_close($ch);

        return $result;
    }
}

Task Description: Implement a PHP class for interacting with Google Drive API using OAuth 2.0 authentication and cURL for HTTP requests.

Class Description: The Googledrive class provides functionality to authenticate with Google Drive API and make authorized API requests. It handles OAuth 2.0 token management and provides a method for making API calls.

Attributes:

access_token: string - The OAuth 2.0 access token for API authentication
disktag: string - Identifier for the disk configuration
client_id: string - Google API client ID
client_secret: string - Google API client secret
redirect_uri: string - OAuth redirect URI
oauth_url: string - Google OAuth endpoint URL
api_url: string - Google Drive API endpoint URL
scope: string - API access scope
driveId: string - Google Drive ID
error: array - Stores error information if any occurs

Methods:

__construct: [Name](tag: string) -> void - Constructor that initializes the class with configuration values
GDAPI: [Name](method: string, url: string, data: string = '') -> array - Makes an authenticated API request to Google Drive
get_access_token: [Name](refresh_token: string) -> bool - Retrieves and manages access tokens using refresh tokens

<?php

class Googledrive {
    private $access_token;
    private $disktag;
    private $client_id;
    private $client_secret;
    private $redirect_uri;
    private $oauth_url = 'https://accounts.google.com/o/oauth2/token';
    private $api_url = 'https://www.googleapis.com/drive/v3';
    private $scope = 'https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive';
    private $driveId;
    private $error = [];

    public function __construct($tag) {
        $this->disktag = $tag;
        // Initialize other attributes with configuration values
        $this->client_id = 'YOUR_CLIENT_ID';
        $this->client_secret = 'YOUR_CLIENT_SECRET';
        $this->redirect_uri = 'YOUR_REDIRECT_URI';
    }

    public function GDAPI($method, $url, $data = '') {
        $ch = curl_init();
        $headers = [
            'Authorization: Bearer ' . $this->access_token,
            'Content-Type: application/json'
        ];

        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $this->api_url . $url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);

        if ($method === 'POST') {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
        } elseif ($method === 'PATCH') {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'PATCH');
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
        } elseif ($method === 'DELETE') {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'DELETE');
        }

        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        $http_code = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);

        if ($http_code >= 400) {
            $this->error = ['http_code' => $http_code, 'response' => $response];
        }

        curl_close($ch);
        return json_decode($response, true);
    }

    public function get_access_token($refresh_token) {
        $post_data = [
            'client_id' => $this->client_id,
            'client_secret' => $this->client_secret,
            'refresh_token' => $refresh_token,
            'grant_type' => 'refresh_token'
        ];

        $ch = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $this->oauth_url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, http_build_query($post_data));
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);

        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        $http_code = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);

        if ($http_code == 200) {
            $response_data = json_decode($response, true);
            $this->access_token = $response_data['access_token'];
            curl_close($ch);
            return true;
        } else {
            $this->error = ['http_code' => $http_code, 'response' => $response];
            curl_close($ch);
            return false;
        }
    }
}

class Googledrive {
    private $access_token;
    private $disktag;
    private $client_id;
    private $client_secret;
    private $redirect_uri;
    private $oauth_url = 'https://accounts.google.com/o/oauth2/token';
    private $api_url = 'https://www.googleapis.com/drive/v3';
    private $scope = 'https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive';
    private $driveId;
    private $error = [];

    public function __construct($tag, $client_id, $client_secret, $redirect_uri, $driveId) {
        $this->disktag = $tag;
        $this->client_id = $client_id;
        $this->client_secret = $client_secret;
        $this->redirect_uri = $redirect_uri;
        $this->driveId = $driveId;
    }

    public function GDAPI($method, $url, $data = '') {
        $ch = curl_init();
        $headers = [
            'Authorization: Bearer ' . $this->access_token,
            'Content-Type: application/json'
        ];

        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $this->api_url . $url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);

        if ($method == 'POST') {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, 1);
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
        } elseif ($method == 'PATCH') {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'PATCH');
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
        } elseif ($method == 'DELETE') {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'DELETE');
        }

        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        if (curl_errno($ch)) {
            $this->error = ['error' => curl_error($ch)];
            curl_close($ch);
            return $this->error;
        }

        curl_close($ch);
        return json_decode($response, true);
    }

    public function get_access_token($refresh_token) {
        $post_data = [
            'client_id' => $this->client_id,
            'client_secret' => $this->client_secret,
            'refresh_token' => $refresh_token,
            'grant_type' => 'refresh_token'
        ];

        $ch = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $this->oauth_url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, 1);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, http_build_query($post_data));
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);

        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        if (curl_errno($ch)) {
            $this->error = ['error' => curl_error($ch)];
            curl_close($ch);
            return false;
        }

        $result = json_decode($response, true);
        curl_close($ch);

        if (isset($result['access_token'])) {
            $this->access_token = $result['access_token'];
            return true;
        } else {
            $this->error = $result;
            return false;
        }
    }
}

class Googledrive {
    private $access_token;
    private $disktag;
    private $client_id;
    private $client_secret;
    private $redirect_uri;
    private $oauth_url = 'https://accounts.google.com/o/oauth2/token';
    private $api_url = 'https://www.googleapis.com/drive/v3';
    private $scope = 'https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive';
    private $driveId;
    private $error = [];

    public function __construct($tag) {
        $this->disktag = $tag;
        // Initialize with your configuration values
        $this->client_id = 'YOUR_CLIENT_ID';
        $this->client_secret = 'YOUR_CLIENT_SECRET';
        $this->redirect_uri = 'YOUR_REDIRECT_URI';
        $this->driveId = 'YOUR_DRIVE_ID';
    }

    public function GDAPI($method, $url, $data = '') {
        $ch = curl_init();
        $headers = [
            'Authorization: Bearer ' . $this->access_token,
            'Content-Type: application/json'
        ];

        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $this->api_url . $url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);

        if ($method === 'POST') {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
        } elseif ($method === 'PATCH') {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'PATCH');
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
        } elseif ($method === 'DELETE') {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'DELETE');
        }

        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        $http_code = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);

        if ($http_code >= 400) {
            $this->error = ['http_code' => $http_code, 'response' => $response];
        }

        curl_close($ch);
        return json_decode($response, true);
    }

    public function get_access_token($refresh_token) {
        $post_fields = [
            'client_id' => $this->client_id,
            'client_secret' => $this->client_secret,
            'refresh_token' => $refresh_token,
            'grant_type' => 'refresh_token'
        ];

        $ch = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $this->oauth_url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, http_build_query($post_fields));
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);

        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        $http_code = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);

        if ($http_code == 200) {
            $response_data = json_decode($response, true);
            $this->access_token = $response_data['access_token'];
            curl_close($ch);
            return true;
        } else {
            $this->error = ['http_code' => $http_code, 'response' => $response];
            curl_close($ch);
            return false;
        }
    }
}

class Googledrive {
    private $access_token;
    private $disktag;
    private $client_id;
    private $client_secret;
    private $redirect_uri;
    private $oauth_url = 'https://accounts.google.com/o/oauth2/token';
    private $api_url = 'https://www.googleapis.com/drive/v3';
    private $scope = 'https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive';
    private $driveId;
    private $error = [];

    public function __construct($tag, $client_id, $client_secret, $redirect_uri) {
        $this->disktag = $tag;
        $this->client_id = $client_id;
        $this->client_secret = $client_secret;
        $this->redirect_uri = $redirect_uri;
    }

    public function GDAPI($method, $url, $data = '') {
        $ch = curl_init();
        $headers = [
            'Authorization: Bearer ' . $this->access_token,
            'Content-Type: application/json'
        ];
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $this->api_url . $url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
        if ($method == 'POST') {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, 1);
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
        } elseif ($method == 'PATCH') {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'PATCH');
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
        } elseif ($method == 'DELETE') {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'DELETE');
        }
        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        if (curl_errno($ch)) {
            $this->error = ['error' => curl_error($ch)];
            curl_close($ch);
            return $this->error;
        }
        curl_close($ch);
        return json_decode($response, true);
    }

    public function get_access_token($refresh_token) {
        $post_fields = [
            'client_id' => $this->client_id,
            'client_secret' => $this->client_secret,
            'refresh_token' => $refresh_token,
            'grant_type' => 'refresh_token'
        ];
        $ch = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $this->oauth_url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, 1);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, http_build_query($post_fields));
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        if (curl_errno($ch)) {
            $this->error = ['error' => curl_error($ch)];
            curl_close($ch);
            return false;
        }
        $result = json_decode($response, true);
        curl_close($ch);
        if (isset($result['access_token'])) {
            $this->access_token = $result['access_token'];
            return true;
        } else {
            $this->error = $result;
            return false;
        }
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP class that provides a fluent interface for making HTTP requests using cURL, supporting various HTTP methods, request configurations, and response handling.

Class Description: The Httpie class is a fluent HTTP client wrapper for cURL in PHP that simplifies making HTTP requests with method chaining. It supports GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, and DELETE methods, allows setting headers, query parameters, and different body types (raw, JSON, form), and provides options for error handling and response processing.

Attributes:
- method: string - The HTTP method to use for the request (GET, POST, etc.)
- url: string - The target URL for the request
- headers: array - Associative array of HTTP headers
- body: string - The request body content
- curlopts: array - Additional cURL options to set
- nothrow: bool - Whether to suppress exceptions on errors

Methods:
- __construct() -> void - Constructor that checks for cURL extension availability
- get(string $url) -> Httpie - Static constructor for GET requests
- post(string $url) -> Httpie - Static constructor for POST requests
- patch(string $url) -> Httpie - Static constructor for PATCH requests
- put(string $url) -> Httpie - Static constructor for PUT requests
- delete(string $url) -> Httpie - Static constructor for DELETE requests
- query(array $params) -> self - Adds query parameters to the URL
- header(string $header, string $value) -> self - Adds a single header
- body(string $body) -> self - Sets raw request body
- jsonBody(array $data) -> self - Sets JSON request body
- formBody(array $data) -> self - Sets form-urlencoded request body
- setopt(int $key, mixed $value) -> self - Sets custom cURL option
- nothrow(bool $on = true) -> self - Configures error throwing behavior
- send(?array &$info = null) -> string - Executes the request and returns response
- getJson() -> mixed - Executes request and returns parsed JSON response
matched_results:
<?php

class Httpie {
    private $method;
    private $url;
    private $headers = [];
    private $body;
    private $curlopts = [];
    private $nothrow = false;

    public function __construct() {
        if (!extension_loaded('curl')) {
            throw new \Exception('cURL extension is not loaded');
        }
    }

    public static function get(string $url): self {
        return (new self())->method('GET')->url($url);
    }

    public static function post(string $url): self {
        return (new self())->method('POST')->url($url);
    }

    public static function patch(string $url): self {
        return (new self())->method('PATCH')->url($url);
    }

    public static function put(string $url): self {
        return (new self())->method('PUT')->url($url);
    }

    public static function delete(string $url): self {
        return (new self())->method('DELETE')->url($url);
    }

    private function method(string $method): self {
        $this->method = $method;
        return $this;
    }

    private function url(string $url): self {
        $this->url = $url;
        return $this;
    }

    public function query(array $params): self {
        $query = http_build_query($params);
        $this->url .= (strpos($this->url, '?') === false ? '?' : '&') . $query;
        return $this;
    }

    public function header(string $header, string $value): self {
        $this->headers[] = "$header: $value";
        return $this;
    }

    public function body(string $body): self {
        $this->body = $body;
        return $this;
    }

    public function jsonBody(array $data): self {
        $this->body = json_encode($data);
        $this->header('Content-Type', 'application/json');
        return $this;
    }

    public function formBody(array $data): self {
        $this->body = http_build_query($data);
        $this->header('Content-Type', 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded');
        return $this;
    }

    public function setopt(int $key, $value): self {
        $this->curlopts[$key] = $value;
        return $this;
    }

    public function nothrow(bool $on = true): self {
        $this->nothrow = $on;
        return $this;
    }

    public function send(?array &$info = null): string {
        $ch = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $this->url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, $this->method);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);

        if ($this->headers) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $this->headers);
        }

        if ($this->body) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $this->body);
        }

        foreach ($this->curlopts as $key => $value) {
            curl_setopt($ch, $key, $value);
        }

        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        $info = curl_getinfo($ch);

        if (curl_errno($ch)) {
            if (!$this->nothrow) {
                throw new \Exception(curl_error($ch), curl_errno($ch));
            }
        }

        curl_close($ch);
        return $response;
    }

    public function getJson() {
        $response = $this->send();
        return json_decode($response, true);
    }
}

Task Description: Create a PHP class that utilizes the Guzzle HTTP client to fetch content from a URL and load it into a DOM object.

Class Description: The `Dom` class provides functionality to load HTML content from a URL using the Guzzle HTTP client. It allows for optional customization of the HTTP client and request objects, and handles the response to extract the content for DOM processing.

Methods:

Method1: `loadFromUrl(string $url, ?Options $options = null, ?ClientInterface $client = null, ?RequestInterface $request = null)` -> `Dom` - Loads HTML content from the specified URL using the provided or default Guzzle HTTP client and request objects. The content is then loaded into a DOM object. Throws various exceptions for error handling.

Input Parameters:
- `$url`: string - The URL from which to fetch the HTML content.
- `$options`: ?Options - Optional configuration options for the DOM loading process.
- `$client`: ?ClientInterface - Optional Guzzle HTTP client instance. If not provided, a default client is created.
- `$request`: ?RequestInterface - Optional Guzzle HTTP request instance. If not provided, a default GET request is created.

Output:
- Returns an instance of `Dom` with the loaded HTML content.

<?php

use GuzzleHttp\Client;
use GuzzleHttp\ClientInterface;
use GuzzleHttp\Exception\RequestException;
use Psr\Http\Message\RequestInterface;
use Psr\Http\Message\ResponseInterface;

class Dom
{
    private $dom;

    public function __construct()
    {
        $this->dom = new \DOMDocument();
    }

    public function loadFromUrl(string $url, ?Options $options = null, ?ClientInterface $client = null, ?RequestInterface $request = null): Dom
    {
        if ($client === null) {
            $client = new Client();
        }

        if ($request === null) {
            $request = new \GuzzleHttp\Psr7\Request('GET', $url);
        }

        try {
            $response = $client->send($request);
            $htmlContent = $this->handleResponse($response);
            $this->loadHtml($htmlContent, $options);
        } catch (RequestException $e) {
            throw new \Exception("HTTP request failed: " . $e->getMessage());
        } catch (\Exception $e) {
            throw new \Exception("Failed to load HTML content: " . $e->getMessage());
        }

        return $this;
    }

    private function handleResponse(ResponseInterface $response): string
    {
        if ($response->getStatusCode() !== 200) {
            throw new \Exception("Unexpected HTTP status code: " . $response->getStatusCode());
        }

        return (string) $response->getBody();
    }

    private function loadHtml(string $htmlContent, ?Options $options = null): void
    {
        libxml_use_internal_errors(true);
        $this->dom->loadHTML($htmlContent, $options ? $options->getFlags() : 0);
        libxml_clear_errors();
    }

    public function getDom(): \DOMDocument
    {
        return $this->dom;
    }
}

class Options
{
    private $flags;

    public function __construct(int $flags = 0)
    {
        $this->flags = $flags;
    }

    public function getFlags(): int
    {
        return $this->flags;
    }
}

    private function loadHtml(string $htmlContent, ?Options $options = null): void

        libxml_use_internal_errors(true);
        $this->dom->loadHTML($htmlContent, $options ? $options->getLibxmlOptions() : 0);
        libxml_clear_errors();
    }

    public function getDom(): \DOMDocument
    {
        return $this->dom;
    }
}

{
    private $libxmlOptions;

    public function __construct(int $libxmlOptions = 0)
    {
        $this->libxmlOptions = $libxmlOptions;
    }

    public function getLibxmlOptions(): int
    {
        return $this->libxmlOptions;
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP class that implements an HTTP client using cURL to send requests to a specified URL and handle the responses, including error checking and resource cleanup.

Class Description: The SpotlightClient class provides functionality to send HTTP requests using PHP's cURL extension. It handles request initialization, option configuration, execution, error handling, and resource cleanup. The class is designed to work with custom Request and Response objects.

Methods:

Method1: sendRequest(Request $request, string $url) -> Response - Sends an HTTP request to the specified URL using cURL. Initializes a cURL session, sets various options including URL, headers, timeout values, and request method, executes the request, and processes the response or errors. Returns a Response object containing the status code and any error messages.

Input Parameters:
- $request: Request - An object containing the request data to be sent
- $url: string - The target URL for the HTTP request

Return Type: Response - An object containing the HTTP status code and any error messages

The method performs the following steps:
1. Checks if cURL extension is loaded
2. Validates request data
3. Initializes cURL session
4. Sets cURL options (URL, headers, timeouts, method, etc.)
5. Executes the request
6. Handles errors if they occur
7. Closes cURL session
8. Returns response with status code
matched_results:
<?php

class SpotlightClient {
    public function sendRequest(Request $request, string $url): Response {
        if (!extension_loaded('curl')) {
            return new Response(500, 'cURL extension is not loaded');
        }

        $ch = curl_init();
        if ($ch === false) {
            return new Response(500, 'Failed to initialize cURL session');
        }

        $options = [
            CURLOPT_URL => $url,
            CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
            CURLOPT_HEADER => true,
            CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
            CURLOPT_CONNECTTIMEOUT => 10,
            CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => $request->getMethod(),
            CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => $request->getHeaders(),
        ];

        if ($request->getMethod() === 'POST' || $request->getMethod() === 'PUT') {
            $options[CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS] = $request->getBody();
        }

        curl_setopt_array($ch, $options);

        $responseContent = curl_exec($ch);
        $httpCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
        $error = curl_error($ch);

        curl_close($ch);

        if ($responseContent === false) {
            return new Response($httpCode, $error);
        }

        return new Response($httpCode, $responseContent);
    }
}

        return $this->method;

class SpotlightClient {
    
    public function sendRequest(Request $request, string $url): Response {
        if (!extension_loaded('curl')) {
            return new Response(0, 'cURL extension is not loaded');
        }

        $ch = curl_init();

        if ($ch === false) {
            return new Response(0, 'Failed to initialize cURL session');
        }

        $headers = [];
        foreach ($request->getHeaders() as $key => $value) {
            $headers[] = "$key: $value";
        }

        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, 30);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CONNECTTIMEOUT, 30);

        switch ($request->getMethod()) {
            case 'POST':
                curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
                curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $request->getBody());
                break;
            case 'PUT':
                curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'PUT');
                curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $request->getBody());
                break;
            case 'DELETE':
                curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'DELETE');
                break;
            default:
                curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, $request->getMethod());
                break;
        }

        $responseBody = curl_exec($ch);
        $httpCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
        $curlError = curl_error($ch);

        curl_close($ch);

        if ($responseBody === false) {
            return new Response($httpCode, $curlError);
        }

        return new Response($httpCode, $responseBody);
    }
}

<?php

class SpotlightClient
{
    public function sendRequest(Request $request, string $url): Response
    {
        if (!extension_loaded('curl')) {
            return new Response(0, 'cURL extension is not loaded.');
        }

        if (empty($url) || !filter_var($url, FILTER_VALIDATE_URL)) {
            return new Response(0, 'Invalid URL provided.');
        }

        $curl = curl_init();

        if (!$curl) {
            return new Response(0, 'Failed to initialize cURL.');
        }

        $headers = $request->getHeaders();
        $method = $request->getMethod();
        $body = $request->getBody();

        curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
        curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, 30);
        curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_CONNECTTIMEOUT, 10);

        if (!empty($headers)) {
            curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
        }

        switch (strtoupper($method)) {
            case 'POST':
                curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_POST, true);
                curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $body);
                break;
            case 'PUT':
                curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'PUT');
                curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $body);
                break;
            case 'DELETE':
                curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'DELETE');
                break;
            case 'GET':
            default:
                curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_HTTPGET, true);
                break;
        }

        $responseContent = curl_exec($curl);
        $httpStatusCode = curl_getinfo($curl, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
        $curlError = curl_error($curl);

        curl_close($curl);

        if ($responseContent === false) {
            return new Response($httpStatusCode, $curlError ?: 'Unknown cURL error.');
        }

        return new Response($httpStatusCode, $responseContent);
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP function that makes HTTP requests using cURL with support for various configurations including authentication, custom requests, and proxy settings.

Function Description: The function performs HTTP requests to a specified URL with configurable options. It supports basic authentication, Bearer token authentication, custom HTTP methods, POST requests with JSON payloads, and proxy configuration. The function handles response retrieval and error checking, returning the decoded JSON response.

Input:
- $url (string): The target URL for the HTTP request
- $auth (bool, optional): Whether to use authentication (default: true)
- $customRequest (string, optional): Custom HTTP method (e.g., 'PUT', 'DELETE')
- $postFields (array, optional): Data to send in the request body (will be JSON encoded)

Output:
- Returns the decoded JSON response from the server as a PHP object/array
- Returns null if the response cannot be decoded as JSON
matched_results:
<?php

function makeHttpRequest($url, $auth = true, $customRequest = null, $postFields = null, $proxy = null) {
    $ch = curl_init();

    $headers = [];
    if ($auth) {
        // Example of basic authentication
        $username = 'your_username';
        $password = 'your_password';
        $headers[] = 'Authorization: Basic ' . base64_encode("$username:$password");

        // Example of Bearer token authentication
        // $token = 'your_bearer_token';
        // $headers[] = 'Authorization: Bearer ' . $token;
    }

    if ($postFields) {
        $postData = json_encode($postFields);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $postData);
        $headers[] = 'Content-Type: application/json';
    }

    if ($customRequest) {
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, $customRequest);
    }

    if ($proxy) {
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_PROXY, $proxy);
    }

    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);

    $response = curl_exec($ch);
    $httpCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);

    if (curl_errno($ch)) {
        $error_msg = curl_error($ch);
        curl_close($ch);
        throw new Exception("cURL error: $error_msg");
    }

    curl_close($ch);

    if ($httpCode >= 200 && $httpCode < 300) {
        $decodedResponse = json_decode($response, true);
        return $decodedResponse !== null ? $decodedResponse : null;
    } else {
        throw new Exception("HTTP request failed with status code $httpCode");
    }
}

function makeHttpRequest($url, $auth = true, $customRequest = null, $postFields = null, $proxy = null) {

    }

    if ($customRequest) {

    }

        $jsonData = json_encode($postFields);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $jsonData);
        $headers[] = 'Content-Type: application/json';
        $headers[] = 'Content-Length: ' . strlen($jsonData);
    }

    if ($proxy) {

    }

    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);

<?php
function makeHttpRequest($url, $auth = true, $customRequest = null, $postFields = null, $proxy = null) {
    $ch = curl_init();

    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, true);

    if ($auth) {
        $headers = [];
        if (is_array($auth)) {
            if (isset($auth['basic'])) {
                $headers[] = 'Authorization: Basic ' . base64_encode($auth['basic']['username'] . ':' . $auth['basic']['password']);
            } elseif (isset($auth['bearer'])) {
                $headers[] = 'Authorization: Bearer ' . $auth['bearer'];
            }
        }
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
    }

    if ($customRequest) {
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, $customRequest);
    }

    if ($postFields) {
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, json_encode($postFields));
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, array_merge($headers ?? [], ['Content-Type: application/json']));
    }

    if ($proxy) {
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_PROXY, $proxy['url']);
        if (isset($proxy['username']) && isset($proxy['password'])) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_PROXYUSERPWD, $proxy['username'] . ':' . $proxy['password']);
        }
    }

    $response = curl_exec($ch);
    $httpCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);

    if (curl_errno($ch)) {
        curl_close($ch);
        return null;
    }

    curl_close($ch);

    $decodedResponse = json_decode($response, true);
    return json_last_error() === JSON_ERROR_NONE ? $decodedResponse : null;
}

Task Description: Create a set of PHP functions for making HTTP requests using cURL, including GET, POST, and HEAD methods, with configurable headers and timeouts.

Function Description: The functions provide a simple interface for making HTTP requests with cURL in PHP. They handle session initialization, option configuration, execution, and cleanup, while supporting common HTTP methods and header customization.

Input:
- For get(): 
  - $url: string - The target URL for the GET request
  - $header: array - An array of HTTP headers to include in the request
- For post(): 
  - $url: string - The target URL for the POST request
  - $data: mixed - The data to send in the POST request body
  - $header: array - An array of HTTP headers to include in the request
- For gethead(): 
  - $url: string - The target URL for the HEAD request
  - $header: array - An array of HTTP headers to include in the request

Output:
- For get(): string - The response body from the GET request
- For post(): string - The response body from the POST request
- For gethead(): string - The response headers from the HEAD request

<?php

function get($url, $header = [], $timeout = 30) {
    $ch = curl_init();

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP function that makes an HTTP request using cURL with specific configurations, including custom headers and SSL verification settings.

Function Description: The function performs an HTTP GET request to a specified URL using PHP's cURL library. It includes timeout settings, custom user-agent header, disabled SSL verification (for development purposes), and follows redirects. The function returns the response content from the requested URL.

Input: 
- $url (string): The target URL to which the HTTP request will be made

Output: 
- Returns the contents (string) of the HTTP response if successful
- Returns false if the request fails (though error handling is minimal in this basic implementation)
matched_results:
<?php
function fetchUrlContent($url) {
    $ch = curl_init();

    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, 30);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, true);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, false);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, false);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
        'User-Agent: CustomUserAgent/1.0'
    ]);

    $response = curl_exec($ch);

    if (curl_errno($ch)) {
        curl_close($ch);
        return false;
    }

    curl_close($ch);
    return $response;
}
?>

Instruction:
Task Description: Implement an HTTP client class in PHP using cURL to handle HTTP requests and responses, including error handling and response parsing.

Class Description: Qiniu_HttpClient is a PHP class that provides functionality to execute HTTP requests using cURL. It handles request configuration, execution, error checking, and response parsing. The class is designed to work with Qiniu's API services.

Attributes: 
(None - This class doesn't have any persistent attributes)

Methods:

RoundTrip: RoundTrip($req) -> array - Executes an HTTP request and returns the response and error information. 
Input: 
- $req: An object containing request details (URL, headers, body, etc.)
Output: 
- Returns an array with two elements: 
  1. A Qiniu_Response object containing the HTTP response (status code, body, headers) 
  2. A Qiniu_Error object if an error occurred, otherwise null

getReqInfo: getReqInfo($headerContent) -> array - Helper function to extract request information from response headers.
Input:
- $headerContent: String containing raw HTTP response headers
Output:
- Returns an array with two elements:
  1. reqid: The X-Reqid header value
  2. xLog: The X-Log header value
matched_results:
<?php

class Qiniu_HttpClient {

    public function RoundTrip($req) {
        $ch = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $req->url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, $req->method);
        if (!empty($req->headers)) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $req->headers);
        }
        if (!empty($req->body)) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $req->body);
        }

        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        $error = curl_error($ch);
        $errorCode = curl_errno($ch);
        $statusCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);

        $body = substr($response, $headerSize);

        $responseObj = new Qiniu_Response($statusCode, $body, $this->parseHeaders($headerContent));
        return [$responseObj, null];
    }

    private function parseHeaders($headerContent) {
        $headers = [];
        $lines = explode("\r\n", $headerContent);
        foreach ($lines as $line) {
            if (strpos($line, ': ') !== false) {
                list($key, $value) = explode(': ', $line, 2);
                $headers[$key] = $value;
            }
        }
        return $headers;
    }

        $headers = $this->parseHeaders($headerContent);
        $reqid = isset($headers['X-Reqid']) ? $headers['X-Reqid'] : null;
        $xLog = isset($headers['X-Log']) ? $headers['X-Log'] : null;
        return ['reqid' => $reqid, 'xLog' => $xLog];
    }

<?php

class Qiniu_HttpClient {

    public function RoundTrip($req) {
        $ch = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $req->url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, $req->method);
        if (!empty($req->headers)) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $req->headers);
        }
        if (!empty($req->body)) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $req->body);
        }

        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        $error = null;

        if (curl_errno($ch)) {
            $error = new Qiniu_Error(curl_errno($ch), curl_error($ch));
        }

        $headerSize = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
        $headerContent = substr($response, 0, $headerSize);
        $body = substr($response, $headerSize);
        $statusCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);

        curl_close($ch);

        $responseHeaders = $this->getHeadersFromCurlResponse($headerContent);
        $reqInfo = $this->getReqInfo($headerContent);

        $qiniuResponse = new Qiniu_Response($statusCode, $body, $responseHeaders, $reqInfo['reqid'], $reqInfo['xLog']);

        return [$qiniuResponse, $error];
    }

    private function getHeadersFromCurlResponse($headerContent) {
        $headers = [];
        $headerLines = explode("\r\n", $headerContent);
        foreach ($headerLines as $line) {
            $parts = explode(': ', $line, 2);
            if (count($parts) == 2) {
                $headers[$parts[0]] = $parts[1];
            }
        }
        return $headers;
    }

    public function getReqInfo($headerContent) {
        $reqid = null;
        $xLog = null;
        $headerLines = explode("\r\n", $headerContent);
        foreach ($headerLines as $line) {
            if (stripos($line, 'X-Reqid:') === 0) {
                $reqid = trim(substr($line, 8));
            }
            if (stripos($line, 'X-Log:') === 0) {
                $xLog = trim(substr($line, 7));
            }
        }
        return ['reqid' => $reqid, 'xLog' => $xLog];
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP function that extracts article information (title and cover image URL) from a WeChat public article URL using cURL and regular expressions.

Function Description: The function takes a WeChat article URL as input, fetches the HTML content using cURL, then extracts the article title and cover image URL using regular expressions. The cover image URL is processed through a third-party image service (weserv.nl) to get a standardized version. The function returns an associative array containing the extracted information and a success flag.

Input: 
- $url (string): The URL of a WeChat public article (must contain 'mp.weixin.qq.com')

Output: 
- Returns an associative array with these keys:
  - 'title' (string): Extracted article title (empty string if not found)
  - 'cover' (string): Processed cover image URL (empty string if not found)
  - 'success' (bool): True if both title and cover were successfully extracted
matched_results:
<?php
function extractWeChatArticleInfo($url) {
    if (strpos($url, 'mp.weixin.qq.com') === false) {
        return ['title' => '', 'cover' => '', 'success' => false];
    }

    $ch = curl_init();
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, 1);
    $html = curl_exec($ch);
    curl_close($ch);

    if (!$html) {
        return ['title' => '', 'cover' => '', 'success' => false];
    }

    preg_match('/<title>(.*?)<\/title>/', $html, $titleMatches);
    $title = $titleMatches[1] ?? '';

    preg_match('/var cover = "(.*?)";/', $html, $coverMatches);
    $cover = $coverMatches[1] ?? '';

    if ($cover) {
        $cover = 'https://images.weserv.nl/?url=' . urlencode($cover);
    }

    $success = !empty($title) && !empty($cover);

    return ['title' => $title, 'cover' => $cover, 'success' => $success];
}
?>

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP class that handles HTTP requests to the OpenAI API using cURL, with support for different content types, streaming, and proxy configuration.

Class Description: The OpenAi class is designed to interact with OpenAI's API by sending HTTP requests. It manages API keys, request headers, content types, and provides configuration options for timeouts, proxies, and custom URLs. The class supports both JSON and multipart/form-data content types and can handle streaming responses.

Attributes:

engine: [string] - Default engine for API requests (default: "davinci")
model: [string] - Default model for text completions (default: "text-davinci-002")
chatModel: [string] - Default model for chat completions (default: "gpt-3.5-turbo")
headers: [array] - Array of HTTP headers to be sent with requests
contentTypes: [array] - Mapping of content types to their header strings
timeout: [int] - Timeout for cURL requests in seconds (default: 0)
stream_method: [object] - Callback method for handling streamed responses
customUrl: [string] - Custom base URL to override the default API endpoint
proxy: [string] - Proxy server address for requests
curlInfo: [array] - Information about the last cURL request

Methods:

__construct: [function]($OPENAI_API_KEY) -> [void] - Initializes the class with an API key and sets default headers
sendRequest: [function](string $url, string $method, array $opts = []) -> [bool|string] - Sends an HTTP request to the specified URL with given method and options
baseUrl: [function](string &$url) -> [void] - Modifies the URL to use a custom base URL if configured
matched_results:
<?php

class OpenAi {
    private $engine = "davinci";
    private $model = "text-davinci-002";
    private $chatModel = "gpt-3.5-turbo";
    private $headers = [];
    private $contentTypes = [
        'json' => 'application/json',
        'multipart' => 'multipart/form-data'
    ];
    private $timeout = 0;
    private $stream_method = null;
    private $customUrl = '';
    private $proxy = '';
    private $curlInfo = [];

    public function __construct($OPENAI_API_KEY) {
        $this->headers = [
            "Authorization: Bearer $OPENAI_API_KEY",
            "Content-Type: application/json"
        ];
    }

    public function sendRequest($url, $method, $opts = []) {
        $this->baseUrl($url);
        $ch = curl_init();
        $options = [
            CURLOPT_URL => $url,
            CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
            CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => $this->timeout,
            CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => strtoupper($method),
            CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => $this->headers
        ];

        if (isset($opts['contentType']) && array_key_exists($opts['contentType'], $this->contentTypes)) {
            $options[CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER][] = "Content-Type: " . $this->contentTypes[$opts['contentType']];
        }

        if (isset($opts['data'])) {
            if ($opts['contentType'] === 'json') {
                $options[CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS] = json_encode($opts['data']);
            } elseif ($opts['contentType'] === 'multipart') {
                $options[CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS] = $opts['data'];
            }
        }

        if ($this->proxy) {
            $options[CURLOPT_PROXY] = $this->proxy;
        }

        if ($this->stream_method) {
            $options[CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION] = $this->stream_method;
        }

        curl_setopt_array($ch, $options);
        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        $this->curlInfo = curl_getinfo($ch);
        $error = curl_error($ch);
        curl_close($ch);

        if ($error) {
            return false;
        }

        return $response;
    }

    private function baseUrl(&$url) {
        if ($this->customUrl) {
            $url = $this->customUrl . parse_url($url, PHP_URL_PATH);
        }
    }
}

            "Authorization: Bearer $OPENAI_API_KEY",
            "Content-Type: application/json"
        ];
    }

    public function sendRequest($url, $method, $opts = []) {
        $this->baseUrl($url);
        $ch = curl_init();

        $options = [
            CURLOPT_URL => $url,
            CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
            CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => strtoupper($method),
            CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => $this->headers,
            CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => $this->timeout,
        ];

        if (!empty($opts['data'])) {
            if (isset($opts['contentType']) && $opts['contentType'] === 'multipart') {
                $options[CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS] = $opts['data'];
                $this->headers[] = "Content-Type: " . $this->contentTypes['multipart'];
            } else {
                $options[CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS] = json_encode($opts['data']);
            }
        }

        if (!empty($this->proxy)) {
            $options[CURLOPT_PROXY] = $this->proxy;
        }

        if (!empty($opts['stream']) && $opts['stream'] === true && $this->stream_method !== null) {
            $options[CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION] = $this->stream_method;
        }

        curl_setopt_array($ch, $options);
        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        $this->curlInfo = curl_getinfo($ch);

        if (curl_errno($ch)) {
            $response = false;
        }

        curl_close($ch);
        return $response;
    }

    private function baseUrl(&$url) {
        if (!empty($this->customUrl)) {
            $url = $this->customUrl . parse_url($url, PHP_URL_PATH);
        }
    }
}

Task Description: Create a PHP function that makes an HTTP request using cURL with specific configurations for web scraping purposes, including custom headers and SSL verification settings.

Function Description: The function `MCurl` performs an HTTP GET request to a specified URL using PHP's cURL library. It's designed for web scraping with a Baidu spider user agent, follows redirects, ignores SSL verification (for testing purposes), and returns the response body. This is particularly useful when you need to mimic a search engine crawler or bypass certain security restrictions during development.

Input: 
- $url (string): The target URL to which the HTTP request will be made

Output: 
- Returns the response body (string) from the HTTP request if successful
- Returns false if the request fails (though error handling should be added in production code)

Note: The current implementation lacks proper error handling which should be added in a production environment. The SSL verification is disabled (CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER and CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST set to false) which is insecure for production use - this should only be used in development or with trusted connections.

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP class that implements an HTTP client using cURL for fetching remote resources with proper error handling and resource management.

Class Description: The timthumb class provides functionality to download remote files using cURL with features like progress tracking, size limitations, and fallback to file_get_contents when cURL is unavailable. It handles various HTTP status codes and maintains error state.

Attributes:
- $curlFH: [resource|false] - File handle for writing downloaded data
- $curlDataWritten: [int] - Tracks the amount of data written during download
- $lastURLError: [mixed] - Stores the last error encountered during URL fetching

Methods:
- curlWrite($h, $d) -> [int] - Static callback function for cURL write operations that writes data to file and tracks bytes written. Returns bytes processed or 0 if size limit exceeded.
  - $h: [resource] - cURL handle
  - $d: [string] - Data chunk being written

- getURL($url, $tempfile) -> [bool] - Main method to fetch a URL and save it to a temporary file. Returns true on success, false on failure.
  - $url: [string] - URL to fetch
  - $tempfile: [string] - Path to temporary file for storing downloaded content
matched_results:
<?php

class timthumb {
    private $curlFH = false;
    private $curlDataWritten = 0;
    private $lastURLError = null;

    private static function curlWrite($h, $d) {
        $instance = self::getInstance();
        $length = strlen($d);
        if ($instance->curlFH) {
            $written = fwrite($instance->curlFH, $d);
            if ($written === false) {
                return 0;
            }
            $instance->curlDataWritten += $written;
            return $written;
        }
        return 0;
    }

    public function getURL($url, $tempfile) {
        $this->curlFH = fopen($tempfile, 'w');
        if ($this->curlFH === false) {
            $this->lastURLError = 'Failed to open temp file';
            return false;
        }

        if (function_exists('curl_init')) {
            $ch = curl_init($url);
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, true);
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, 'self::curlWrite');
            $data = curl_exec($ch);
            if ($data === false) {
                $this->lastURLError = curl_error($ch);
                curl_close($ch);
                fclose($this->curlFH);
                return false;
            }
            $httpCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
            curl_close($ch);
            fclose($this->curlFH);
            if ($httpCode >= 200 && $httpCode < 300) {
                return true;
            } else {
                $this->lastURLError = 'HTTP error: ' . $httpCode;
                return false;
            }
        } else {
            $data = file_get_contents($url);
            if ($data === false) {
                $this->lastURLError = 'file_get_contents failed';
                fclose($this->curlFH);
                return false;
            }
            $written = fwrite($this->curlFH, $data);
            fclose($this->curlFH);
            if ($written === false) {
                $this->lastURLError = 'Failed to write data to temp file';
                return false;
            }
            return true;
        }
    }

    public function getLastURLError() {
        return $this->lastURLError;
    }

    private static function getInstance() {
        static $instance = null;
        if ($instance === null) {
            $instance = new self();
        }
        return $instance;
    }
}

        }

        $ch = curl_init($url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, [__CLASS__, 'curlWrite']);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, false);

        $result = curl_exec($ch);
        if ($result === false) {
            $this->lastURLError = curl_error($ch);
            curl_close($ch);
            fclose($this->curlFH);
            return false;
        }

        $httpCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
        if ($httpCode >= 400) {
            $this->lastURLError = "HTTP error code: $httpCode";
            curl_close($ch);
            fclose($this->curlFH);
            return false;
        }

        curl_close($ch);
        fclose($this->curlFH);
        return true;
    }

    public function getLastURLError() {
        return $this->lastURLError;
    }

    private static function getInstance() {
        static $instance = null;
        if ($instance === null) {
            $instance = new self();
        }
        return $instance;
    }
}

class timthumb {
    private $curlFH = false;
    private $curlDataWritten = 0;
    private $lastURLError = null;

    private static function curlWrite($h, $d) {
        $instance = self::getInstance();
        $len = strlen($d);
        $written = fwrite($instance->curlFH, $d);
        if ($written === false) {
            return 0;
        }
        $instance->curlDataWritten += $written;
        return $written;
    }

    public function getURL($url, $tempfile) {
        $this->curlFH = fopen($tempfile, 'wb');
        if ($this->curlFH === false) {
            $this->lastURLError = 'Failed to open temporary file for writing';
            return false;
        }

        if (function_exists('curl_init')) {
            $ch = curl_init($url);
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, true);
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, array($this, 'curlWrite'));
            $data = curl_exec($ch);
            if ($data === false) {
                $this->lastURLError = curl_error($ch);
                curl_close($ch);
                fclose($this->curlFH);
                return false;
            }
            curl_close($ch);
        } else {
            $data = file_get_contents($url);
            if ($data === false) {
                $this->lastURLError = 'file_get_contents failed';
                fclose($this->curlFH);
                return false;
            }
            fwrite($this->curlFH, $data);
        }

        fclose($this->curlFH);
        return true;
    }

    public function getLastURLError() {
        return $this->lastURLError;
    }

    private static function getInstance() {
        static $instance = null;
        if ($instance === null) {
            $instance = new self();
        }
        return $instance;
    }
}

<?php

class timthumb {
    private $curlFH = false;
    private $curlDataWritten = 0;
    private $lastURLError = null;

    private static function curlWrite($h, $d) {
        $instance = self::getInstance();
        $length = strlen($d);
        if ($instance->curlDataWritten + $length > 10485760) { // 10MB size limit
            return 0;
        }
        $instance->curlDataWritten += $length;
        return fwrite($instance->curlFH, $d);
    }

    public function getURL($url, $tempfile) {
        $this->curlDataWritten = 0;
        $this->lastURLError = null;

        if (!($this->curlFH = fopen($tempfile, 'w'))) {
            $this->lastURLError = 'Failed to open temporary file for writing';
            return false;
        }

        if (function_exists('curl_init')) {
            $ch = curl_init($url);
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, [__CLASS__, 'curlWrite']);
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, 0);
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, 1);
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, 30);
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, 'Mozilla/5.0');
            $result = curl_exec($ch);
            if ($result === false) {
                $this->lastURLError = curl_error($ch);
            }
            curl_close($ch);
        } else {
            $result = file_put_contents($tempfile, file_get_contents($url));
            if ($result === false) {
                $this->lastURLError = 'file_get_contents failed';
            }
        }

        fclose($this->curlFH);
        return $result !== false;
    }

    public function getLastError() {
        return $this->lastURLError;
    }

    private static function getInstance() {
        static $instance = null;
        if ($instance === null) {
            $instance = new self();
        }
        return $instance;
    }
}

    }

        static $instance = null;
        if ($instance === null) {
            $instance = new self();
        }
        return $instance;
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP class that handles webhook triggering using Guzzle HTTP client, including formatting headers and payload data, and processing responses or errors.

Class Description: The WebhookService class provides functionality to trigger webhooks by sending HTTP requests to specified endpoints. It handles request configuration, response processing, and error handling.

Attributes:
- client: [Client] - Guzzle HTTP client instance used for making requests

Methods:
- __construct() -> [void] - Initializes the Guzzle HTTP client instance
- triggerWebhook(mixed $data) -> [array] - Sends an HTTP request to the specified endpoint with formatted headers and payload
  Parameters:
    - $data: [mixed] - Contains request details including method, endpoint, headers, and payload
  Returns:
    - [array] - Response status ('success' or 'error') and content or error message
- formatHeaders(array $headers) -> [array] - Formats headers array into key-value pairs
  Parameters:
    - $headers: [array] - Raw headers array to be formatted
  Returns:
    - [array] - Formatted headers as key-value pairs
- formatPayload($payload) -> [array|string] - Formats payload data into key-value pairs
  Parameters:
    - $payload: [mixed] - Raw payload data to be formatted
  Returns:
    - [array|string] - Formatted payload as key-value pairs or original string if not array
matched_results:
<?php

use GuzzleHttp\Client;
use GuzzleHttp\Exception\RequestException;

class WebhookService
{
    private $client;

    public function __construct()
    {
        $this->client = new Client();
    }

    public function triggerWebhook($data)
    {
        try {
            $method = $data['method'] ?? 'POST';
            $endpoint = $data['endpoint'] ?? '';
            $headers = $this->formatHeaders($data['headers'] ?? []);
            $payload = $this->formatPayload($data['payload'] ?? []);

            $response = $this->client->request($method, $endpoint, [
                'headers' => $headers,
                'json' => $payload
            ]);

            return [
                'status' => 'success',
                'content' => $response->getBody()->getContents()
            ];
        } catch (RequestException $e) {
            return [
                'status' => 'error',
                'message' => $e->getMessage()
            ];
        }
    }

    private function formatHeaders(array $headers)
    {
        $formattedHeaders = [];
        foreach ($headers as $key => $value) {
            $formattedHeaders[$key] = $value;
        }
        return $formattedHeaders;
    }

    private function formatPayload($payload)
    {
        if (is_array($payload)) {
            return $payload;
        }
        return (string) $payload;
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP function that retrieves a website's favicon.ico file from a given URL, caches it locally with a specified expiration time, and falls back to a default icon if retrieval fails or the file is not an image.

Function Description: The function attempts to fetch a favicon.ico file from a website URL, saves it to a local cache directory, and serves it with proper caching headers. If the remote favicon cannot be retrieved (invalid response, non-image content, or timeout), it falls back to a default icon. The function handles all HTTP operations via cURL and includes proper error checking and resource cleanup.

Input:
- $url: (string) The base URL of the website from which to fetch the favicon
- $cache_time: (int) Duration in seconds for which the cached favicon should be considered valid
- $default_ico: (string) Path to the default favicon file to use when retrieval fails
- $basename: (string, optional) Name of the favicon file to look for (default: "favicon.ico")

Output:
- The function outputs the favicon contents directly to the browser with appropriate headers
- No explicit return value (void function)
- Side effects: Creates/updates cache files in the designated cache directory
matched_results:
<?php

function fetchFavicon($url, $cache_time, $default_ico, $basename = 'favicon.ico') {
    $cache_dir = __DIR__ . '/cache/';
    $cache_file = $cache_dir . md5($url) . '.ico';

    if (!is_dir($cache_dir)) {
        mkdir($cache_dir, 0755, true);
    }

    if (file_exists($cache_file) && (time() - filemtime($cache_file)) < $cache_time) {
        header('Content-Type: image/x-icon');
        readfile($cache_file);
        return;
    }

    $favicon_url = rtrim($url, '/') . '/' . $basename;
    $ch = curl_init($favicon_url);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, true);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, 10);
    $favicon_data = curl_exec($ch);
    $http_code = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
    $content_type = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_CONTENT_TYPE);
    curl_close($ch);

    if ($http_code == 200 && strpos($content_type, 'image') !== false) {
        file_put_contents($cache_file, $favicon_data);

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP class that provides HTTP client functionality using cURL for making GET requests and downloading files from URLs.

Class Description: The HttpClient class encapsulates cURL functionality to perform HTTP GET requests and file downloads. It provides static methods for simple URL fetching and file downloading with proper error handling and resource management.

Attributes: (This class doesn't have any attributes as it only contains static methods)

Methods:

Method1: urlGet(string $url, bool $follow_location = true, int $timeout = 10) -> string|bool - Performs a GET request to the specified URL. Follows redirects by default and allows setting a timeout. Returns the response content or throws an exception on error.

Method2: fileGet(string $url, string $target) -> string|bool - Downloads a file from the specified URL and saves it to the target location. Returns the output or throws an exception on error. Uses a longer default timeout for file downloads.
matched_results:
<?php

class HttpClient {
    
    public static function urlGet(string $url, bool $follow_location = true, int $timeout = 10) {
        $ch = curl_init();
        
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, $follow_location);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, $timeout);
        
        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        $error = curl_error($ch);
        $errno = curl_errno($ch);
        
        curl_close($ch);
        
        if ($errno) {
            throw new Exception("cURL error ({$errno}): {$error}");
        }
        
        return $response;
    }
    
    public static function fileGet(string $url, string $target) {
        $ch = curl_init();
        
        $fp = fopen($target, 'w+');
        if ($fp === false) {
            throw new Exception("Unable to open file: {$target}");
        }
        
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FILE, $fp);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, 60);
        
        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        $error = curl_error($ch);
        $errno = curl_errno($ch);
        
        curl_close($ch);
        fclose($fp);
        
        if ($errno) {
            throw new Exception("cURL error ({$errno}): {$error}");
        }
        
        return $response;
    }
}
